dub-afro-samurai-resurrection-abefa6f0-4.title: (Dub) Afro Samurai Resurrection
dub-afro-samurai-resurrection-abefa6f0-4.description: Afro Samurai found peace after avenging his father. But the master is forced back into the game by sexy Sio, a deadly woman from his past who won't quit until Afro pays for his sins. Starring Samuel L. Jackson and Lucy Liu.

dub-akira-7a8680eb-a5fe-461d-a87f-998c27.title: (Dub) Akira
dub-akira-7a8680eb-a5fe-461d-a87f-998c27.description: Clandestine army activities threaten the war torn city of Neo-Tokyo when a mysterious child with powerful psychic abilities escapes his prison and inadvertently draws a violent motorcycle gang into a heinous web of experimentation.

dub-mass-effect-paragon-lost-af39726a-e4.title: (Dub) Mass Effect: Paragon Lost
dub-mass-effect-paragon-lost-af39726a-e4.description: Mass Effect: Paragon Lost, the prequel to best-selling Mass Effect 3, follows the early career of Alliance Marine, James Vega, as he leads an elite Special Forces squad into battle against mysterious aliens known as The Collectors.

dub-no-game-no-life-zero-57cc98bd-89a5-4.title: (Dub) No Game, No Life: Zero
dub-no-game-no-life-zero-57cc98bd-89a5-4.description: Amid chaos and destruction, a young man named Riku leads humanity toward tomorrow. One day, in the ruins of an Elf city, he meets Shuvi, an exiled "Ex-machina" android who asks him to teach her what it means to have a human heart.

dub-sword-art-online-the-movie-ordinal-s.title: (Dub) Sword Art Online: The Movie - Ordinal Scale
dub-sword-art-online-the-movie-ordinal-s.description: Two years after the SAO incident, a new Augmented-Reality MMO, Ordinal Scale, has become an instant hit. As Kirito and Asuna explore, they soon realize that the line between the virtual world and reality is blurring, and it isn't all fun and games.

sub-akira-64a5a8d0-1406-4178-97a5-264950.title: (Sub) Akira
sub-akira-64a5a8d0-1406-4178-97a5-264950.description: Clandestine army activities threaten the war torn city of Neo-Tokyo when a mysterious child with powerful psychic abilities escapes his prison and inadvertently draws a violent motorcycle gang into a heinous web of experimentation.

sub-fafner-heaven-and-earth-6846f3a9-7ba.title: (Sub) Fafner: Heaven and Earth
sub-fafner-heaven-and-earth-6846f3a9-7ba.description: A hiveminded alien force reengages war with Tatsumiya Island years after Kazuki led a team of mech pilots to destroy them. In an explosive battle over the fate of humankind, the young warriors risk everything to save their only home from assimilation.

sub-k-missing-kings-8fca598e-a61c-46cc-a.title: (Sub) K MISSING KINGS
sub-k-missing-kings-8fca598e-a61c-46cc-a.description: Ever since the School Island Incident, in which the four Kings were involved, the Silver Clansman, Kuroh Yatogami and Neko were on their search for their master Shiro.

sub-ninja-scroll-ae1cee4f-9279-4fa6-a12f.title: (Sub) Ninja Scroll
sub-ninja-scroll-ae1cee4f-9279-4fa6-a12f.description: When Jubei saves a young ninja woman from the unthinkable, he assumes that’s the end of it. To his surprise, it’s only just the beginning.

sub-no-game-no-life-zero-7f0ca32a-b398-4.title: (Sub) No Game, No Life: Zero
sub-no-game-no-life-zero-7f0ca32a-b398-4.description: Amid chaos and destruction, a young man named Riku leads humanity toward tomorrow. One day, in the ruins of an Elf city, he meets Shuvi, an exiled "Ex-machina" android who asks him to teach her what it means to have a human heart.

sub-sword-art-online-the-movie-ordinal-s.title: (Sub) Sword Art Online: The Movie - Ordinal Scale
sub-sword-art-online-the-movie-ordinal-s.description: Two years after the SAO incident, a new Augmented-Reality MMO, Ordinal Scale, has become an instant hit. As Kirito and Asuna explore, they soon realize that the line between the virtual world and reality is blurring, and it isn't all fun and games.

sub-trigun-badlands-rumble-fe622f45-f616.title: (Sub) Trigun: Badlands Rumble
sub-trigun-badlands-rumble-fe622f45-f616.description: Twenty years ago, Vash the Stampede allowed an infamous outlaw named Gasback to escape final justice. Now, on the streets of Macca City, Vash is about to learn a hard truth about consequences - and he might end up paying for the lesson with his life.

100-earthquake-c7aa1812-a912-4cee-b1ab-9.title: 10.0 Earthquake
100-earthquake-c7aa1812-a912-4cee-b1ab-9.description: Los Angeles is about to be hit by a devastating earthquake, and time is running out to save the city from imminent danger.

the-12th-man-92cb9fd6-cce5-4424-89cb-668.title: The 12th Man
the-12th-man-92cb9fd6-cce5-4424-89cb-668.description: Nazis hunt for a lone surviving saboteur in this edge-of-your-seat WWII thriller based on a true-life story. Jonathan Rhys-Meyers stars.

222-2017-7c960cc7-62d1-4398-96fc-a4c0521.description: Dylan Branson (Michiel Huisman) begins to notice the repetition of ominous events that happen at the same time every day. As he’s drawn into a complex relationship with Sarah (Teresa Palmer), Dylan must and take control of time itself.

3-days-to-kill-f5ee7022-c9da-4593-8f1f-7.title: 3 Days to Kill
3-days-to-kill-f5ee7022-c9da-4593-8f1f-7.description: A dying CIA agent trying to reconnect with his estranged daughter is offered an experimental drug that could save his life in exchange for one last assignment.

6-below-miracle-on-the-mountain-05275833.title: 6 Below: Miracle on the Mountain
6-below-miracle-on-the-mountain-05275833.description: When a snowstorm strands former professional hockey player Eric LeMarque (Josh Hartnett) atop the Sierra Nevada Mountains for eight days, he is forced to face his past and come to terms with his personal demons and rediscover the power of faith within him in order to survive.

archie-2-mission-impawsible-964a2016-bf4.title: A.R.C.H.I.E. 2: Mission Impawsible
archie-2-mission-impawsible-964a2016-bf4.description: In this outrageous family comedy-adventure, Michael J. Fox plays Archie, a flying, talking robot dog who becomes a big-top star when his owner runs away to join the circus.

abduction-f5c9dff4-964a-4678-acd4-051f9a.title: Abduction
abduction-f5c9dff4-964a-4678-acd4-051f9a.description: After uncovering a deadly lie, Nathan (Taylor Lautner) is propelled on a lethal, no-holds barred mission to learn the truth.

against-the-wild-2-survive-the-serengeti.title: Against the Wild 2: Survive the Serengeti
against-the-wild-2-survive-the-serengeti.description: After a plane crash, siblings Ryan and Emma find themselves stranded in the Serengeti. Along with a dog named Chinook, they must work together to survive in the untamed wilderness.

air-strike-b69683d1-79ee-4f81-896b-6e57f.title: Air Strike
air-strike-b69683d1-79ee-4f81-896b-6e57f.description: Starring Bruce Willis and Adrien Brody and featuring thrilling dogfight action, this intense epic portrays China's brave battle to stop the Japanese bomber strikes of WWII.

along-with-the-gods-the-last-49-days-26f.title: Along with the Gods: The Last 49 Days
along-with-the-gods-the-last-49-days-26f.description: As the deceased soul Ja-hong and his three afterlife guardians prepare for their remaining trials for reincarnation, the guardians soon come face to face with the truth of their tragic time on Earth 1,000 years earlier.

along-with-the-gods-the-two-worlds-262c6.title: Along With the Gods: The Two Worlds
along-with-the-gods-the-two-worlds-262c6.description: In this action-packed fantasy epic, a firefighter is taken to the afterlife by three guardians, where only after passing seven trials and proving he lived a noble life will he be able to reincarnate.

american-ultra-1f2724d5-52a2-4915-9e41-0.title: American Ultra
american-ultra-1f2724d5-52a2-4915-9e41-0.description: Jesse Eisenberg and Kristen Stewart star in this explosive action-adventure about a small-town slacker.

anthropoid-f2a82b90-a576-4da5-9204-01fcf.title: Anthropoid
anthropoid-f2a82b90-a576-4da5-9204-01fcf.description: Based  on the extraordinary true story of Operation Anthropoid, the WWII mission to assassinate SS General Reinhard Heydrich, the main architect behind the Final Solution and the Reich’s third in command after Hitler and Himmler.

arcadia-ea4612e8-8037-462c-a970-5af3d03e.title: Arcadia
arcadia-ea4612e8-8037-462c-a970-5af3d03e.description: One man fights to give his family a future in a world crippled by disease where medical care is controlled by a totalitarian regime.

the-archer-7829a657-e249-4ffd-aaac-30a56.title: The Archer
the-archer-7829a657-e249-4ffd-aaac-30a56.description: A competitive archer is sent to a prison-like reform camp for girls but escapes with the help of a new friend.

assassination-nation-4709e444-777d-4939-.title: Assassination Nation
assassination-nation-4709e444-777d-4939-.description: After a malicious data hack exposes the secrets of the perpetually American town of Salem, chaos descends and four girls must fight to survive, while coping with the hack themselves.

backtrace-79d2aa6d-4369-439b-8ca8-a79d78.title: Backtrace
backtrace-79d2aa6d-4369-439b-8ca8-a79d78.description: Twenty years after a botched robbery, three grifters kidnap an amnesia patient to jog his memory and find the long-lost money.

barbie-presents-thumbelina-07fd5f3b-a730.title: Barbie Presents: Thumbelina
barbie-presents-thumbelina-07fd5f3b-a730.description: Barbie™ presents the story of Thumbelina, a tiny girl who saves the magical land of the Twillerbees™ and proves that even the smallest person can make a big difference!

black-spurs-ee19139c-ca44-4b9a-a7cb-fa9d.title: Black Spurs
black-spurs-ee19139c-ca44-4b9a-a7cb-fa9d.description: To turn a profit, cowboy turned bounty-hunter plots to ruin a Western town with gambling, loose women and renegades.

blade-of-the-immortal-f4fd8f18-95fb-4867.title: Blade of the Immortal
blade-of-the-immortal-f4fd8f18-95fb-4867.description: Manji, a highly skilled samurai, becomes cursed with immortality after a legendary battle. Haunted by the brutal murder of his sister, Manji knows that only fighting evil will regain his soul. The 100th film by master director Takashi Miike.

blood-diamond-df3e988f-dc56-4644-9769-47.title: Blood Diamond
blood-diamond-df3e988f-dc56-4644-9769-47.description: Leonardo DiCaprio stars in this action drama as Danny Archer, a mercenary smuggler searching for a priceless diamond amid the chaos of Sierra Leone's civil war

blue-city-056e413d-928d-4110-bf7d-8c2c3b.title: Blue City
blue-city-056e413d-928d-4110-bf7d-8c2c3b.description: After a five year absence, a young man returns home with the intent of reconciling with his father. When he learns that his father has been murdered, he seeks revenge.

blurt-ef2f163c-0394-4c19-a020-b2281a2ef0.title: Blurt
blurt-ef2f163c-0394-4c19-a020-b2281a2ef0.description: Nice guy Jeremy (Jace Norman) loses his ability to keep his thoughts to himself and can't help but say everything out loud. The only way to fix his problem will be the hardest thing he'll have to do: win the school election.

bullwhip-4996ada8-fc27-458a-84b6-25aa143.title: Bullwhip
bullwhip-4996ada8-fc27-458a-84b6-25aa143.description: An innocent man can escape hanging only by marrying a hot-tempered half-breed who brandishes a whip.

bumblebee-829bb298-e0d3-49cd-af60-25cc58.title: Bumblebee
bumblebee-829bb298-e0d3-49cd-af60-25cc58.description: Charlie, on the cusp of turning 18 and trying to find her place in the world, discovers Bumblebee, battle-scarred and broken. When Charlie revives him, she quickly learns this is no ordinary, yellow VW bug.

captain-kronos-vampire-hunter-a1b6d310-3.title: Captain Kronos: Vampire Hunter
captain-kronos-vampire-hunter-a1b6d310-3.description: A sword-wielding stranger stalks a new breed of vampire across the European countryside.

cartels-8665ddc7-c864-4a9f-839b-42ae7024.title: Cartels
cartels-8665ddc7-c864-4a9f-839b-42ae7024.description: An elite team of DEA agents and a dangerous drug lord await extraction and find themselves trapped in an ambush!

the-chaser-58341e2e-007e-470d-840d-95631.title: The Chaser
the-chaser-58341e2e-007e-470d-840d-95631.description: In this gripping thriller, an ex-cop-turned-pimp must find a serial killer who is preying on call-girls and save the life of a woman who has gone missing.

chicken-run-8af7202a-f411-4a2f-8d45-218a.title: Chicken Run
chicken-run-8af7202a-f411-4a2f-8d45-218a.description: The creators of Wallace & Gromit bring you an exciting story about a group of chickens led by Rocky (Mel Gibson) who are determined to fly the coop–even if they can’t fly!

the-colony-f19ac13a-262f-4dce-a66f-cfe88.title: The Colony
the-colony-f19ac13a-262f-4dce-a66f-cfe88.description: Years ago, winter came and left. Survivors have tried to build a new society underground, but they soon learn the real danger is not from the ice and cold, but from their fellow survivors.

the-commuter-4c4b381f-c9b8-48ea-a413-6f2.title: The Commuter
the-commuter-4c4b381f-c9b8-48ea-a413-6f2.description: A man who gets caught up in a criminal conspiracy during his daily commute home and works against the clock to stop a deadly attack to save the lives of his fellow train passengers.

conan-the-barbarian-9adea236-510c-4f5e-8.title: Conan the Barbarian
conan-the-barbarian-9adea236-510c-4f5e-8.description: The tale of Conan the Cimmerian and his adventures across the continent of Hyboria on a quest to avenge the murder of his father and the slaughter of his village.

concrete-kids-2a1e469d-3757-4f31-87e2-f1.title: Concrete Kids
concrete-kids-2a1e469d-3757-4f31-87e2-f1.description: Two nine-year-old boys from Venice CA set off on a mission to cross Los Angeles on skateboards at night in an attempt to reach the Staples Center by 8am the next morning for a survival contest.

damascus-cover-c3710dce-49df-421a-8ae2-2.title: Damascus Cover
damascus-cover-c3710dce-49df-421a-8ae2-2.description: A man haunted by the death of his son must smuggle a chemical weapons scientist out of Syria. Within days his mission goes wrong. To survive, Ari reaches out to a deep cover agent and soon discovers that he is a pawn in a much bigger plan.

day-of-the-falcon-3de6e3a2-2b36-49a9-805.title: Day of the Falcon
day-of-the-falcon-3de6e3a2-2b36-49a9-805.description: After years of bloody conflict, the leaders of two rival kingdoms (Antonio Banderas and Mark Strong) reluctantly agree to peace.  But when oil is discovered in the land, war is re-ignited.

daylights-end-bee596f5-08fd-4636-a14c-63.title: Daylight's End
daylights-end-bee596f5-08fd-4636-a14c-63.description: A rogue drifter agrees to guide a band of survivors to sanctuary after a plague turns most of humanity into monsters.

death-wish-e88546e7-7598-4a9d-a0b5-e2958.title: Death Wish
death-wish-e88546e7-7598-4a9d-a0b5-e2958.description: A mild-mannered father is transformed into a killing machine after his family is torn apart by a violent act.

deck-the-halls-3c70f533-31ec-48ce-80d9-d.title: Deck the Halls
deck-the-halls-3c70f533-31ec-48ce-80d9-d.description: Based on the first book in Mary Higgins Clark and daughter Carol Higgins Clark's novels, this story brings together two of the authors' most popular characters: Cleaning-woman-turned-private-eye Alvirah, and Detective Reilly.

the-domestics-69a49ab2-cceb-4aef-a41c-0a.title: The Domestics
the-domestics-69a49ab2-cceb-4aef-a41c-0a.description: A survival love story! A young husband and wife must fight to return home in a post-apocalyptic mid-western landscape ravaged by gangs.

the-eagle-and-the-hawk-02866475-7abc-4e6.title: The Eagle and the Hawk
the-eagle-and-the-hawk-02866475-7abc-4e6.description: In 1863 two U.S. law enforcers discover a plot to overthrow Mexico's ruler and invade Texas. Lots of action and fabulous cinematography by James Wong Howe.

el-camino-hacia-el-dorado-9891674d-cf0a-.title: El Camino Hacia El Dorado
el-camino-hacia-el-dorado-9891674d-cf0a-.description: Al desembarcar en las playas de El Dorado, Tulio, Miguel son confundidos con dioses y son adorados con riquezas. Deben decidir entre huir con el oro o  salvar a los pobladores de El Dorado.

fallen-3b2149a9-b622-4609-9a85-22314fa9d.title: Fallen
fallen-3b2149a9-b622-4609-9a85-22314fa9d.description: Upon entering a mysterious reform school, Luce finds herself drawn into a love triangle and discovers her own love story that has been ongoing for centuries.

the-family-9338685a-6900-42cf-8dd1-a86f9.title: The Family
the-family-9338685a-6900-42cf-8dd1-a86f9.description: A mob family in the Witness Protection Program has trouble adjusting to a new home abroad.

the-french-connection-89837f07-fc23-4b4e.title: The French Connection
the-french-connection-89837f07-fc23-4b4e.description: Gene Hackman stars in this 1971 Best Picture Oscar(R) winner about a maverick cop who stops a huge heroin shipment into New York.

the-fugitive-22c8126a-f521-436b-91f5-b2a.title: The Fugitive
the-fugitive-22c8126a-f521-436b-91f5-b2a.description: Harrison Ford stars as a doctor accused of killing his wife who goes on the lam in search of the real culprit. Tommy Lee Jones co-stars.

fun-size-1db64080-7952-4b45-8cb2-1cdecdd.title: Fun Size
fun-size-1db64080-7952-4b45-8cb2-1cdecdd.description: Wren's Halloween plans go awry when she's made to babysit her brother, who disappears into a sea of trick-or-treaters. With her best friend and two nerds at her side, she needs to find her brother before her mom finds out.

gangster-no-1-9dd4b556-da69-40e3-b4d7-b0.title: Gangster No. 1
gangster-no-1-9dd4b556-da69-40e3-b4d7-b0.description: GANGSTER NO. 1 chronicles the rise and fall of a prominent and ruthless English gangster.

getaway-b2e5229c-903c-402e-b06c-468177d3.title: Getaway
getaway-b2e5229c-903c-402e-b06c-468177d3.description: A washed-up race car driver finds himself in a race against time to save his abducted wife in this heart-pounding thriller.

gintama-f24a3709-c376-4786-989c-f2b104b3.title: Gintama
gintama-f24a3709-c376-4786-989c-f2b104b3.description: Set in the Edo shogunate where power of samurai is on decline as the aliens from outer space have invaded the country and outlawed their swords, it portrays the life of a handyman Gintoki Sakata, whom still carries the heart of a samurai.

the-good-the-bad-the-weird-db7315be-6fa6.title: The Good, the Bad, the Weird
the-good-the-bad-the-weird-db7315be-6fa6.description: In this hilarious, action packed western, three villains race to uncover a buried treasure fighting wild bandits, gangsters and each other along the way.

grace-jones-bloodlight-and-bami-db8a36bd.title: Grace Jones: Bloodlight and Bami
grace-jones-bloodlight-and-bami-db8a36bd.description: A larger-than-life entertainer, an androgynous glam-pop diva – Grace Jones is all these things and more. Sophie Fiennes’s documentary goes beyond the traditional music biography, offering a portrait as stylish and unconventional as its subject.

gridiron-gang-14630f68-9966-4e04-99b6-ff.title: Gridiron Gang
gridiron-gang-14630f68-9966-4e04-99b6-ff.description: Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson (The Rundown, Walking Tall) stars in this gritty and inspirational movie, based on a true story about a group of teenage delinquents given a second chance to redeem themselves by playing football.

half-shell-heroes-blast-to-the-past-1536.title: Half-Shell Heroes: Blast to the Past
half-shell-heroes-blast-to-the-past-1536.description: The Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles find themselves on the adventure of a lifetime when they accidentally time travel back to the Jurassic Era! Rating: TV-Y7

the-hangman-1dd2c1d0-3446-42a5-8502-45bc.title: The Hangman
the-hangman-1dd2c1d0-3446-42a5-8502-45bc.description: A marshal goes after a man wanted for murder but finds himself pitted against an entire Western town.

hector-and-the-search-for-happiness-3d0f.title: Hector and the Search for Happiness
hector-and-the-search-for-happiness-3d0f.description: A psychiatrist searches the globe to find the secret of happiness.

hot-guys-with-guns-c592d92f-ba51-47e7-b3.title: Hot Guys with Guns
hot-guys-with-guns-c592d92f-ba51-47e7-b3.description: Chinatown meets Boystown when an aspiring actor and a grizzled detective team up in this modern take on the old-fashioned detective story.

hotel-mumbai-9a515534-c991-4d00-8338-2b4.title: Hotel Mumbai
hotel-mumbai-9a515534-c991-4d00-8338-2b4.description: A gripping true story that recounts the siege of the Taj Hotel by terrorists in Mumbai. Refusing to leave their guests, hotel staff risk their lives to keep everyone safe as people make unthinkable sacrifices to protect themselves and their families.

i-frankenstein-0572153a-21a4-43b4-a691-1.title: I, Frankenstein
i-frankenstein-0572153a-21a4-43b4-a691-1.description: Frankenstein's creature finds himself caught in an all-out, centuries old war between two immortal clans.

innocent-f1dfa4c0-290c-4e90-91c9-b370896.title: Innocent
innocent-f1dfa4c0-290c-4e90-91c9-b370896.description: Bill Pullman (Independence Day, Torchwood) stars as Rusty Sabich, a judge charged with the murder of his wife, a situation that comes 20 years after he was cleared in the death of his mistress.

inside-out-f3338acf-075c-4842-b3f2-c1481.title: Inside Out
inside-out-f3338acf-075c-4842-b3f2-c1481.description: After being released from prison after serving 13 years, AJ's dreams of living a crime-free life soon come to an end when he discovers his childhood friend, Jack, has been marked for death.

into-the-ashes-ea5b1ae2-5894-4332-851a-d.title: Into the Ashes
into-the-ashes-ea5b1ae2-5894-4332-851a-d.description: After losing his wife, Nick must decide if he will stay on his new path or exact revenge and force his enemies to pay for what they have done.

it-came-from-the-desert-9ce0d112-f7df-46.title: It Came from the Desert
it-came-from-the-desert-9ce0d112-f7df-46.description: A pulpy monster movie inspired by the cult classic 1980s video game "It Came from the Desert," featuring rival motocross heroes and heroines, kegger parties in the desert, secret underground military bases...and of course giant ants!

jackass-3-7620b65a-10bc-4585-9cf0-3ea5f0.title: Jackass 3
jackass-3-7620b65a-10bc-4585-9cf0-3ea5f0.description: Johnny Knoxville and the rest of his friends (Bam Margera, Ryan Dunn, Steve-O) perform outrageous stunts and pranks.

johnny-guitar-fd57074b-f800-478c-b1a3-b4.title: Johnny Guitar
johnny-guitar-fd57074b-f800-478c-b1a3-b4.description: Gambling house operator Vienna seeks control of a town as archrival Emma Small sets out to force Vienna out of town. The timely arrival of Johnny Guitar thwarts Emma's plans, but doesn't prevent a showdown between the women.

johnny-reno-01b517ec-1354-4f1b-97b8-32c5.title: Johnny Reno
johnny-reno-01b517ec-1354-4f1b-97b8-32c5.description: One man stands alone against the fury of mob justice. Threats. Fists. Bullets. Fire. By one means or another, riled-up folks at Stone Junction are going to have their way.

judgment-day-27e05329-49f4-4053-83ca-78a.title: Judgment Day
judgment-day-27e05329-49f4-4053-83ca-78a.description: An FBI agent and an ex-con hunt for a cult leader holding hostage a scientist whose asteroid-destroying weapon can save Earth.

the-kid-1be82071-67ff-4ed7-97ac-29a504cd.title: The Kid
the-kid-1be82071-67ff-4ed7-97ac-29a504cd.description: Vincent D'Onofrio directs this story of Rio, a young fan of Billy the Kid, who asks the fabled gunslinger to help him free his kidnappedsister, Sara, from his uncle's dastardly grip.

kill-order-4f70537e-74be-4678-be47-a5477.title: Kill Order
kill-order-4f70537e-74be-4678-be47-a5477.description: Uncanny abilities awaken within a troubled high school student when a fully-armed tactical team attempts to abduct him from his classroom.

killer-joe-53571f3a-8adf-4e8e-832b-df43d.title: Killer Joe
killer-joe-53571f3a-8adf-4e8e-832b-df43d.description: When a debt puts a young man's life in danger, he turns to putting a hit out on his evil mother in order to collect the insurance.

killers-anonymous-432b5165-f7ff-4382-baf.title: Killers Anonymous
killers-anonymous-432b5165-f7ff-4382-baf.description: Tensions mount at KILLERS ANONYMOUS, a support group for killers, as the members of the group try to unravel a mystery: Which one of them is responsible for the assassination attempt on a U.S. senator that has the police in the city on high alert?

knights-of-the-damned-edcc8eb1-e1e5-4191.title: Knights of the Damned
knights-of-the-damned-edcc8eb1-e1e5-4191.description: On assignment by the King to slay the dragon besieging his kingdom, a group of knights encounters an unstoppable army of the dead.

the-last-airbender-68403fbd-3e11-4979-87.title: The Last Airbender
the-last-airbender-68403fbd-3e11-4979-87.description: The story follows the adventures of Aang, a young successor to a long line of Avatars, who must put his childhood ways aside and stop the Fire Nation from enslaving the Water, Earth and Air nations.

the-last-days-f7ee6e1e-5995-461a-abfe-bb.title: The Last Days
the-last-days-f7ee6e1e-5995-461a-abfe-bb.description: As a mysterious epidemic spreads across the planet trapping humanity indoors, one man sets off on a dangerous quest to save his missing girlfriend.

the-last-man-39adafdd-7d56-4102-8543-c02.title: The Last Man
the-last-man-39adafdd-7d56-4102-8543-c02.description: In this apocalyptic thriller, Hayden Christensen plays a vet suffering from PTSD who takes the advice of a street prophet (Harvey Keitel) and starts preparing for the end of days.

the-last-stand-dfd894db-771a-496d-a491-d.title: The Last Stand
the-last-stand-dfd894db-771a-496d-a491-d.description: After leaving the LAPD wracked with remorse and regret, Sheriff Ray Owens (Schwarzenegger) moved to a sleepy border town that now stands between Gabriel Cortez (Eduardo Noriega), the most notorious drug kingpin in the world and his freedom.

the-last-warrior-038aebfe-ffc7-4f62-be86.title: The Last Warrior
the-last-warrior-038aebfe-ffc7-4f62-be86.description: A 9.5-magnitude earthquake rocks Southern California, causing it to break off from the rest of the continent to form a desert island. The last warrior, Green Beret Nick Preston, leads a military patrol onto the devastated island to help the survivors.

law-of-the-lawless-7f18472e-df3c-4404-a1.title: Law of the Lawless
law-of-the-lawless-7f18472e-df3c-4404-a1.description: In Kansas during the 1880's, Clem Rogers known as the "hanging judge" arrives to try the son of the town's most influential man for murder. He refuses a bribe and is framed for a set-up crime.

lonely-man-the-457f7507-f821-4986-b4b3-9.title: Lonely Man, The
lonely-man-the-457f7507-f821-4986-b4b3-9.description: A gunfighter turns rancher at the mercy of a son who hates him and a gambler who wants to kill him.

lord-of-war-1288cc08-0c86-4f4e-8264-1e32.title: Lord of War
lord-of-war-1288cc08-0c86-4f4e-8264-1e32.description: Oscar winner Nicolas Cage stars in this taut, action-packed tale of a notorious arms dealer who sold weapons to dictators and successfully outran the law for nearly twenty years.

the-lovers-417dff66-7b65-4675-864c-e9733.title: The Lovers
the-lovers-417dff66-7b65-4675-864c-e9733.description: After a dangerous dive into the wreckage of a British merchant ship to save his wife, a marine biologist falls into a coma that transports us back in time to India in 1788, where a young British captain falls for an Indian woman, in this tale of two centuries, two continents and star-crossed lovers linked together by a powerful ring. Stars Josh Hartnett.

the-magic-hockey-skates-971794b1-a6c1-46.title: The Magic Hockey Skates
the-magic-hockey-skates-971794b1-a6c1-46.description: Pint sized nine year old Joey has one dream - to be a Hockey Champion. Joey believes that brand new Rocky Rockets Skates will help him achieve his dream, but to his dismay his Father can only afford some beaten up second hand skates.

a-man-alone-5b542e71-76f2-4b38-bd24-e300.title: A Man Alone
a-man-alone-5b542e71-76f2-4b38-bd24-e300.description: Framed for a robbery, a gunman hides out in the home of the local sheriff and gradually wins his trust and respect. Now they must face the vengeful townspeople in a bloody war.

man-on-a-ledge-1d7b3611-4331-4a17-8aed-8.title: Man on a Ledge
man-on-a-ledge-1d7b3611-4331-4a17-8aed-8.description: While a man teetering on a 21st-floor ledge diverts attention, the world’s greatest diamond heist is underway.

the-man-who-killed-hitler-and-then-the-b.title: The Man Who Killed Hitler and Then the Bigfoot
the-man-who-killed-hitler-and-then-the-b.description: An American war hero who secretly assassinated Adolf Hitler has now been called upon to take out another global threat – Bigfoot.

maze-83691560-3790-44a0-9d55-896329f120c.title: Maze
maze-83691560-3790-44a0-9d55-896329f120c.description: Based on the incredible true story of the 1983 mass break-out of 38 IRA prisoners from the HMP Maze high security prison, one prisoner engineers the largest European prison escape since World War II.

mighty-morphin-power-rangers-the-movie-d.title: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: the Movie
mighty-morphin-power-rangers-the-movie-d.description: The powerless Rangers journey to a distant planet in search of a female warrior who can help them regain their strength.

missing-link-adeda6a5-586d-4d70-b017-6f8.title: Missing Link
missing-link-adeda6a5-586d-4d70-b017-6f8.description: "Missing Link" is a globe-trotting comedy-adventure about a dashing investigator of myths and monsters (Hugh Jackman) and the surprisingly silly and soulful beast he discovers (Zach Galifianakis).

mission-impossible-fallout-ce251951-1503.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
mission-impossible-fallout-ce251951-1503.description: Ethan Hunt and the IMF team join forces with CIA assassin August Walker to prevent a disaster of epic proportions.

the-monkey-king-3-df4c72d8-b637-4c8f-8d4.title: The Monkey King 3
the-monkey-king-3-df4c72d8-b637-4c8f-8d4.description: The Monkey King and his traveling companions must find a way to escape from the clutches of a queen who rules an all-female kingdom. They soon land in even deeper trouble when their shenanigans anger the mighty River God.

monsters-vs-aliens-717efda4-1a4a-4c57-96.title: Monsters vs. Aliens
monsters-vs-aliens-717efda4-1a4a-4c57-96.description: A nearly 50-foot tall woman leads a gaggle of other 1950s throwback monsters into battle against an alien menace in this animated comedy.

mortdecai-4adcbe1b-b3ed-4059-a037-16b4b3.title: Mortdecai
mortdecai-4adcbe1b-b3ed-4059-a037-16b4b3.description: Depp, Paltrow, and McGregor star in this globe-trotting comedy about an unlikely team recruited to find a stolen, priceless painting.

mud-f90c5e8c-7b89-413f-973a-c81585532152.title: Mud
mud-f90c5e8c-7b89-413f-973a-c81585532152.description: After two boys discover a mysterious outlaw named Mud hiding on a deserted island in the Mississippi River, they embark on a dangerous, life-changing odyssey to reunite Mud with his long-lost love.

the-next-three-days-162a83d0-869e-42c3-9.title: The Next Three Days
the-next-three-days-162a83d0-869e-42c3-9.description: John Brennan will stop at nothing to protect his family, but he's never had to put his life and others' on the line. When his wife is convicted of murder, and all appeals efforts are exhausted, the only hope he sees is breaking her out.

no-holds-barred-ae3d5488-7498-4268-985e-.title: No Holds Barred
no-holds-barred-ae3d5488-7498-4268-985e-.description: When world wrestling champion Rip Thomas (Hulk Hogan) refuses to join a competing network, an evil executive creates a new program, "The Battle of the Tough Guys," where rules don't exist and men engage in an all-out brawl for money.

no-way-out-sin-salida-bea7ca8e-1f3e-45b2.title: No Way Out (Sin Salida)
no-way-out-sin-salida-bea7ca8e-1f3e-45b2.description: A former undercover cop (Hector Echavarria) who lost his family and heath to the retribution of a drug cartel tries to start over again, but his past won't stay buried.

the-numbers-station-e93f8453-a0b2-4422-8.title: The Numbers Station
the-numbers-station-e93f8453-a0b2-4422-8.description: A black ops agent (John Cusack) and a code operator (Malin Akerman) in a remote CIA broadcast station find themselves in a life-or-death struggle to stop a deadly plot before it's too late.

once-upon-a-time-in-venice-dc09feb5-5221.title: Once Upon a Time in Venice
once-upon-a-time-in-venice-dc09feb5-5221.description: When Steve Ford's (Bruce Willis) beloved dog, Buddy, is stolen by local thugs, he makes a questionable alliance with their devious leader, Spyder (Jason Momoa) in order to set things straight and get Buddy back where he belongs.

the-osiris-child-c0624e72-9752-4a2a-be7b.title: The Osiris Child
the-osiris-child-c0624e72-9752-4a2a-be7b.description: When a dangerous outbreak threatens to destroy everyone living on a newly colonized planet, Lt. Kane Sommerville goes against orders and leaves his station to rescue his young daughter before it's too late.

overdrive-bddc7313-2771-4444-9762-a05cfc.title: Overdrive
overdrive-bddc7313-2771-4444-9762-a05cfc.description: Scott Eastwood stars in this action-adventure from the writers of 2 Fast 2 Furious and the director of Taken. When two legendary car thieves are caught stealing from a mafia boss, they are given a week to nab a vintage Ferrari, or risk losing everything.

overlord-1139b449-fbd5-4b3d-8810-db94227.title: Overlord
overlord-1139b449-fbd5-4b3d-8810-db94227.description: D-Day invasion finds two paratroopers caught behind enemy lines fighting Nazis and supernatural forces, resulting from a secret Nazi experiment.

the-pagan-king-e9ca279d-d3aa-4dd4-97a3-6.title: The Pagan King
the-pagan-king-e9ca279d-d3aa-4dd4-97a3-6.description: On his deathbed, the reigning king bestows power to an unexpected heir who must find strength within himself to unite his people against the violent crusades which threaten their freedom.

pilgrimage-b92fc88d-a2fd-496b-a639-5f21a.title: Pilgrimage
pilgrimage-b92fc88d-a2fd-496b-a639-5f21a.description: Leaving his Irish monastery for the first time, a young novice departs with a devoted group of monks and a mysterious former Crusader as they attempt to transport a holy relic to Rome.

pokemon-the-movie-hoopa-and-the-clash-of.title: Pokémon the Movie: Hoopa and the Clash of Ages
pokemon-the-movie-hoopa-and-the-clash-of.description: Ash must help Hoopa overcome its own darkness!

pokemon-the-movie-volcanion-and-the-mech.title: Pokémon the Movie: Volcanion and the Mechanical Marvel

pony-express-58710941-4623-4e2c-8593-3f6.title: Pony Express
pony-express-58710941-4623-4e2c-8593-3f6.description: In 1860, Buffalo Bill Cody and Wild Bill Hickok are sent to establish a Pony Express service across California.

the-prince-4b939578-b492-49b0-9bf0-70499.title: The Prince
the-prince-4b939578-b492-49b0-9bf0-70499.description: A former assassin is unwittingly drawn back into the life he gave up when he suspects that his daughter has been kidnapped.

the-princess-of-montpensier-4aaca99f-42c.title: The Princess of Montpensier
the-princess-of-montpensier-4aaca99f-42c.description: The life of a ravishing young princess is torn apart by lust and forbidden desire, in this epic period drama.

the-quake-f8e9082f-4608-4de8-abe0-121a01.title: The Quake
the-quake-f8e9082f-4608-4de8-abe0-121a01.description: From the people that brought you the hit thriller The Wave, this action spectacular forewarns a new catastrophic disaster when the city of Oslo is threatened by a devastating earthquake. Norwegian with English subtitles.

radioflash-02ef5b1b-16b4-40dc-bca6-35e14.title: Radioflash
radioflash-02ef5b1b-16b4-40dc-bca6-35e14.description: In the aftermath of an apocalyptic power outage, a young woman encounters the horrors awaiting her in the darkness as she tries to reunite her family and fight for survival.

rare-exports-a-christmas-tale-3df3e54f-3.title: Rare Exports: A Christmas Tale
rare-exports-a-christmas-tale-3df3e54f-3.description: In this darkly comic gem, it's Christmas Eve in northern Finland, and an archeological dig has just unearthed Santa Claus. But this Santa isn't one you want coming to town.

raze-2430cb0c-13ab-49ac-b8f1-e06ba8a8484.title: Raze
raze-2430cb0c-13ab-49ac-b8f1-e06ba8a8484.description: Abducted women are forced to fight to the death in an ancient ceremony.

the-reunion-4a4adf28-4392-4f94-9ef3-7916.title: The Reunion
the-reunion-4a4adf28-4392-4f94-9ef3-7916.description: After the death of her father, a daughter fulfills his last wish and finds a way to bring her three brothers back together.

richard-the-lionheart-a5dbe7f9-b564-4ac6.title: Richard the Lionheart
richard-the-lionheart-a5dbe7f9-b564-4ac6.description: The legend of Richard the Lionheart is born as Richard battles an unending onslaught of challengers in order to survive the hellish prison he's been stranded in.

righteous-kill-806f629b-e043-4b9e-aadd-b.title: Righteous Kill
righteous-kill-806f629b-e043-4b9e-aadd-b.description: Two veteran New York City detectives (Academy Award-winners Robert De Niro and Al Pacino) hunt a vigilante who may be one of their own.

the-road-to-el-dorado-4d57cb6a-cb8c-4846.title: The Road to El Dorado
the-road-to-el-dorado-4d57cb6a-cb8c-4846.description: When treasure hunters, Tulio (Kevin Kline) and Miguel (Kenneth Branagh) are mistaken for gods, they face a difficult decision: keep the riches or battle the odds to save El Dorado!

robin-hood-b244a5a0-5f3a-49e1-9fcc-99655.title: Robin Hood
robin-hood-b244a5a0-5f3a-49e1-9fcc-99655.description: The Swashbuckling legend of Robin Hood unfolds in the 12th century when the mighty Normans ruled England with an iron fist.

running-with-the-devil-8b7912b5-00a4-40c.title: Running with the Devil
running-with-the-devil-8b7912b5-00a4-40c.description: When a cocaine shipment is compromised, a drug cartel’s CEO, known as The Boss orders his most trusted henchman, The Cook, and his partner, another master drug trafficker known as The Man, on a dangerous journey to audit the company’s supply chain.

santee-8b1287cd-bc0a-48a3-9520-2a05c28dd.title: Santee
santee-8b1287cd-bc0a-48a3-9520-2a05c28dd.description: A lethal bounty hunter seeks to avenge his son's death - if the son of one of his victims lets him live long enough.

a-score-to-settle-6f744f8c-5901-4058-a7e.title: A Score to Settle
a-score-to-settle-6f744f8c-5901-4058-a7e.description: With only a short time to live, Frankie Carver is released from prison, vowing to track down every last member of the gang that betrayed him.

sinbad-legend-of-the-seven-seas-94c87481.title: Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas
sinbad-legend-of-the-seven-seas-94c87481.description: Sinbad the sailor must retrieve the stolen Book of Peace from a goddess with a penchant for chaos in this mythological animated tale.

spirit-stallion-of-the-cimarron-55dcf474.title: Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron
spirit-stallion-of-the-cimarron-55dcf474.description: A wild horse yearns to be free after he is captured by a nasty U.S. colonel in this 2002 Oscar(R)-nominee for Best Animated Feature.

the-spy-next-door-b36f50ec-380e-44d8-a2c.title: The Spy Next Door
the-spy-next-door-b36f50ec-380e-44d8-a2c.description: Jackie Chan is a former superspy who wants to settle down with his girlfriend, but first has to battle Russian terrorists.

the-spy-who-dumped-me-0e6bc923-85ea-4a21.title: The Spy Who Dumped Me
the-spy-who-dumped-me-0e6bc923-85ea-4a21.description: After being dumped by her boyfriend who is a spy, a woman and her friend become embroiled in a conspiracy.

star-trek-ii-the-wrath-of-khan-16833873-.title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
star-trek-ii-the-wrath-of-khan-16833873-.description: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Admiral Kirk escapes the tedium of his desk job to embark on another space mission and crosses path with his old enemy, Khan, who is on a mission to destroy the Enterprise, even if it means universal Armageddon. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy.

star-trek-iii-the-search-for-spock-22cd9.title: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock
star-trek-iii-the-search-for-spock-22cd9.description: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Admiral Kirk and his crew risk their careers when they steal the decommissioned Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis planet to recover Captain Spock's body. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy.

star-trek-v-the-final-frontier-cf26e9db-.title: Star Trek V: The Final Frontier
star-trek-v-the-final-frontier-cf26e9db-.description: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Captain Kirk and his crew must deal with Spock's long-lost half-brother who hijacks the Enterprise for an obsessive search for God at the center of the galaxy. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy.

star-trek-vi-the-undiscovered-country-bf.title: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country
star-trek-vi-the-undiscovered-country-bf.description: The crews of the Enterprise and the Excelsior must stop a plot to prevent a peace treaty between the Klingon Empire and the Federation.

star-trek-insurrection-dbfb8ec6-bb3a-4fd.title: Star Trek: Insurrection
star-trek-insurrection-dbfb8ec6-bb3a-4fd.description: When the crew of the Enterprise learn of the federation plot against the inhabitants of a unique planet, Capt. Picard begins an open rebellion.

star-trek-the-motion-picture-e5b2e09b-d2.title: Star Trek: The Motion Picture
star-trek-the-motion-picture-e5b2e09b-d2.description: This first Star Trek film reunites the U.S.S. Enterprise's original crew. Capt. James T. Kirk now an admiral, and his crew must save humanity from an alien ship steadily approaching Earth and destroying everything in its path.

stung-8d45b888-76f4-4fda-99d0-a3d8e58b2a.title: Stung
stung-8d45b888-76f4-4fda-99d0-a3d8e58b2a.description: A swanky garden party turns into a nightmare when giant killer wasps attack in this blood-splattered horror comedy.

super-04fe8ba5-ad58-4dda-981d-03744f8fbb.title: Super
super-04fe8ba5-ad58-4dda-981d-03744f8fbb.description: When sad-sack loser Frank (Rainn Wilson) sees his ex-addict wife (Liv Tyler) willingly snatched by a seductive drug dealer (Kevin Bacon), he finds himself bereft and wholly unable to cope. But soon he decides to fight back under the guise of a DIY superhero called Crimson Bolt. With a hand-made suit, a wrench, and a crazed sidekick named Boltie (Ellen Page), the Crimson Bolt beats his way through the mean streets of crime in hopes of saving his wife.  The rules were written a long time ago: You are not supposed to molest children, cut lines or key cars; if you do, prepare to face the wrath of the Crimson Bolt!

tangerines-ab06ff2c-ef4d-446d-9f76-1002b.title: Tangerines
tangerines-ab06ff2c-ef4d-446d-9f76-1002b.description: During the growing conflict between separatists in the wake of the Soviet Union's break-up, two immigrant farmers make the dangerous decision to remain in a war torn area long enough to harvest their tangerine crop.

a-taxi-driver-30ffb310-a407-450f-9f2a-2a.title: A Taxi Driver
a-taxi-driver-30ffb310-a407-450f-9f2a-2a.description: In this powerful drama based on a true story, a down-on-his-luck taxi driver hired by a foreign journalist finds himself in a life-or-death struggle in the midst of the Gwangju Uprising.

tetsuo-the-bullet-man-ec853fe8-eade-4ed6.title: Tetsuo: The Bullet Man
tetsuo-the-bullet-man-ec853fe8-eade-4ed6.description: Calm office worker Anthony, son of an American father and a Japanese mother, lives in Tokyo with his wife Yuriko and their little son Tom. Since Anthony’s mother died of cancer, his scientist father has been overly fearful for their health and rigidly subjects Anthony and Tom to monthly physicals. Walking home, Tom is killed in a hit and run before Anthony’s eyes. Losing their boy pushes Yuriko over the edge and triggers violent emotions in Anthony, whose body begins to transform. Little by little, his cells turn into iron. When the driver who killed Tom reappears and Anthony learns the truth about his father’s past experiments on human guinea pigs and about his mother’s death, Anthony mutates into a mass of metal, a human weapon fuelled by an uncontrollable rage.

the-thousand-faces-of-dunjia-d35e920e-03.title: The Thousand Faces of Dunjia
the-thousand-faces-of-dunjia-d35e920e-03.description: A young constable discovers a secret society whose members use supernatural powers to protect mankind. They must soon band together to battle an ancient creature that threatens to destroy the world.

tiny-toon-adventures-night-ghoulery-f577.title: Tiny Toon Adventures: Night Ghoulery
tiny-toon-adventures-night-ghoulery-f577.description: A framework that's more than slightly similar to Rod Serling's "Night Gallery" and several other tales of horror and hilarity with a typical Tiny Toons twist.

transformers-dark-of-the-moon-a844c5b4-7.title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon
transformers-dark-of-the-moon-a844c5b4-7.description: When Apollo 11 landed the Moon in 1969, the government discovered an alien spacecraft with technology it kept secret from the Autobots. Presented by FXM

true-grit-046ebf1c-229b-431e-a446-29ac1b.title: True Grit
true-grit-046ebf1c-229b-431e-a446-29ac1b.description: A tough U.S. Marshal helps a stubborn young woman track down her father's murderer.

the-villainess-9b6a6ba5-ace0-4925-a47c-0.title: The Villainess
the-villainess-9b6a6ba5-ace0-4925-a47c-0.description: Bloody revenge is at the heart of this stylish action-thriller that doses the classic femme fatale story with a shot of adrenaline as it follows a former assassin who will stop at nothing to cut ties to her past.

walking-with-the-enemy-ab131cb8-9a77-463.title: Walking With the Enemy
walking-with-the-enemy-ab131cb8-9a77-463.description: During World War II, a young Hungarian (Jonas Armstrong) disguises himself as a Nazi officer to save his family and thousands of his countrymen from the death camps. Meanwhile, Hungary's regent (Ben Kingsley) takes great risks to save his country.

warpath-701c3cdb-2b45-47ec-ba75-95fd01a1.title: Warpath
warpath-701c3cdb-2b45-47ec-ba75-95fd01a1.description: Action-packed Western film involving O'Brien's hunt for the outlaws who murdered his girlfriend.

warrior-59b05290-3dc3-4a68-a37e-dae176ea.title: Warrior
warrior-59b05290-3dc3-4a68-a37e-dae176ea.description: WARRIOR tells the inspirational story of an estranged family that finds redemption in the unlikeliest of places-the MMA ring.

the-wave-1be35372-4c1d-49dd-bc34-abadc6d.title: The Wave
the-wave-1be35372-4c1d-49dd-bc34-abadc6d.description: Although anticipated, no one is really ready when the mountain pass above the scenic, narrow Norwegian fjord Geiranger collapses and creates an 85-meter high violent tsunami. A geologist is one of those caught in the middle of it.

the-way-back-5cfd7cea-c2a9-4a21-a5c9-e0c.title: The Way Back
the-way-back-5cfd7cea-c2a9-4a21-a5c9-e0c.description: Four-time Oscar nominee Ed Harris, Jim Sturgess and Oscar nominee Saoirse Ronan and Colin Farrell star in this epic saga of survival from six-time Oscar-nominee Peter Weir. Inspired by an incredible true story.

we-die-young-7805bb6f-dc03-4f09-affc-2ac.title: We Die Young
we-die-young-7805bb6f-dc03-4f09-affc-2ac.description: Lucas, a 14-year-old boy inducted into the gang life in Washington D.C., is determined that his 10-year-old brother won't follow the same path. When an Afghanistan war veteran comes into the neighborhood, an opportunity arises.

wild-card-64ee2687-1ed2-418e-8686-334b9d.title: Wild Card
wild-card-64ee2687-1ed2-418e-8686-334b9d.description: Nick Wild is a Las Vegas bodyguard with lethal professional skills and a personal gambling problem. When a friend is beaten by a sadistic thug, Nick strikes back, only to find out the thug is the son of a powerful mob boss

wolf-warrior-2-2b0bbdda-8380-461a-a038-c.title: Wolf Warrior 2
wolf-warrior-2-2b0bbdda-8380-461a-a038-c.description: China's deadliest special forces operative settles into a quiet life on the sea. When sadistic mercenaries begin targeting nearby civilians, he must leave his newfound peace behind and return to his duties as a soldier and protector.

woman-at-war-53c9c0b4-c367-4f4e-9174-2bd.title: Woman at War
woman-at-war-53c9c0b4-c367-4f4e-9174-2bd.description: Halla declares a one-woman-war on the local aluminum industry. But as she prepares to abandon her role as environmental activist to become a mother, she decides to plot one final attack to deal the aluminum industry a crippling blow.

loving-vincent-f02944b8-42d0-4936-b684-3.title: Loving Vincent
loving-vincent-f02944b8-42d0-4936-b684-3.description: Mystery surrounds the death of famed painter Vincent van Gogh in 1890 France.

animaniacs-wakkos-wish-3d5832a3-16f0-4ff.title: Animaniacs: Wakko’s Wish
animaniacs-wakkos-wish-3d5832a3-16f0-4ff.description: Wakko picks the only magical falling star capable of granting his wish, but the entire Animaniac clan must battle its way across a vast snowy country and outrace the evil King Salazar to reach the star and get his wish.

annihilation-22c89819-1d6b-4f3e-b375-564.title: Annihilation
annihilation-22c89819-1d6b-4f3e-b375-564.description: A biologist signs up for a dangerous, secret expedition where the laws of nature don't apply.

another-time-02489369-a723-4353-bd42-3c1.title: Another Time
another-time-02489369-a723-4353-bd42-3c1.description: The top investment manager at his firm is assigned to help the stunning owner of a recently acquired company. He realizes he has fallen for her, and he has to go back in time to meet her before she becomes engaged.

antz-fe6124f8-c15f-4bbb-aeec-2ed5e545b30.title: Antz
antz-fe6124f8-c15f-4bbb-aeec-2ed5e545b30.description: A small worker ant switch places with a soldier ant to win the heart of the beautiful princess. A comedy-adventure featuring Sharon Stone, Sylvester Stallone and Woody Allen.

bad-company-bc238013-01af-47f2-8132-e5d7.title: Bad Company
bad-company-bc238013-01af-47f2-8132-e5d7.description: Adventurous tale of two young drifters who wildly rob their way West during the Civil War.

barbie-her-sisters-in-the-great-puppy-ad.title: Barbie & Her Sisters in The Great Puppy Adventure
barbie-her-sisters-in-the-great-puppy-ad.description: Barbie™, her sisters, and their adorable new puppy pals find unexpected mystery and adventure while searching for long-lost treasure in their hometown of Willows.

barbie-and-the-diamond-castle-383e72a0-d.title: Barbie and the Diamond Castle
barbie-and-the-diamond-castle-383e72a0-d.description: In this animated movie, Barbie (Kelly Sheridan) wants to teach her little sister, Stacie (Chantal Strand), the true value of friendship. So she and her best friend, Teresa (Cassidy Ladden), weave a music-infused fairy tale about Liana and Alexa, two peasant girls who have little else but each other and their love of song. When a magic mirror reveals an evil plan to destroy the Diamond Castle and end all music worldwide, Liana and Alexa bravely set out to save the day.

barbie-in-a-mermaid-tale-2-d6893666-1657.title: Barbie in a Mermaid Tale 2
barbie-in-a-mermaid-tale-2-d6893666-1657.description: Surf’s up for Barbie™ as she returns as Merliah™, the surfing champ who’s also a mermaid princess, in this new sea-quel™ where she learns anything is possible when you stay true to yourself!

barbie-a-fashion-fairytale-ff5b9c91-026d.title: Barbie: A Fashion Fairytale
barbie-a-fashion-fairytale-ff5b9c91-026d.description: Fired from her most recent acting job, Barbie gets even more bad news when her longtime boyfriend, Ken, rudely breaks up with her over the phone. To mend her broken heart, Barbie visits her fashion-designer aunt Millicent in Paris, but her aunt has her own problems: To the delight of her longtime rival, Jacqueline, Millicent's design firm has gone broke. However, her assistant, Marie-Alecia, has a plan, and, with the help of some magical fashion fairies, she and Barbie try to save the day.

barbie-a-perfect-christmas-fa4581ad-e109.title: Barbie: A Perfect Christmas
barbie-a-perfect-christmas-fa4581ad-e109.description: Join Barbie™ and her sisters in this heartwarming, musical adventure where they discover what truly makes A Perfect Christmas – being together!

barbie-mariposa-her-butterfly-fairy-frie.title: Barbie: Mariposa & her Butterfly Fairy Friends
barbie-mariposa-her-butterfly-fairy-frie.description: Join Barbie™ in an all-new world of Butterfly Fairies! When the Queen falls ill, it's up to brave Mariposa™ and her friends to journey beyond the safe borders of the city to find a cure.

barbie-the-pearl-princess-22286942-6067-.title: Barbie: The Pearl Princess
barbie-the-pearl-princess-22286942-6067-.description: Join Lumina, the Mermaid princess, and her best friend Kuda, a pink sea horse, as she calls on her magical pearl powers for an unforgettable adventure in a beautiful mermaid world!

curious-george-641bb394-f4d5-4037-abdf-1.title: Curious George
curious-george-641bb394-f4d5-4037-abdf-1.description: The Man in the Yellow Hat is an oddball museum employee who looks after his pet monkey, an inquisitive and wonderful creature whose enthusiasm often gets the best of him.

curious-george-2-follow-that-monkey-6238.title: Curious George 2: Follow That Monkey!
curious-george-2-follow-that-monkey-6238.description: The world’s most beloved and inquisitive monkey is back in Curious George 2: Follow That Monkey, the fun-filled sequel to the hit animated movie.

curious-george-3-back-to-the-jungle-458d.title: Curious George 3: Back to the Jungle
curious-george-3-back-to-the-jungle-458d.description: Curious George goes on an epic adventure to space that crash lands in the jungles of Africa leading to an unforgettable journey with some new animal friends.

curious-george-royal-monkey-18e4e064-a13.title: Curious George: Royal Monkey
curious-george-royal-monkey-18e4e064-a13.description: Join your favorite monkey as he takes on his most regal role yet, trading places with a royal monkey!

daphne-velma-159a9f72-f6a6-4b3f-9cd8-511.title: Daphne & Velma
daphne-velma-159a9f72-f6a6-4b3f-9cd8-511.description: Daphne and Velma, two mystery-solving teens, investigate what is causing some of the brightest students at their high school to become "zombie-fied."

the-day-shall-come-dd87db2c-bf28-48aa-84.title: The Day Shall Come
the-day-shall-come-dd87db2c-bf28-48aa-84.description: A revolutionist becomes the target of an overzealous FBI agent's desperate ploy to expose terrorism in this hilarious farce about homeland insecurities. Anna Kendrick co-stars.

dive-olly-dive-and-the-octopus-rescue-ae.title: Dive Olly Dive and the Octopus Rescue
dive-olly-dive-and-the-octopus-rescue-ae.description: When Charley the Octopus inadvertently enters a “Star Finder” variety show and boogies himself to fame and fortune, it’s not all it's cracked up to be and it’s down to our heroes Olly and Beth to daringly rescue their friend.

double-double-toil-and-trouble-92b47ad1-.title: Double, Double, Toil and Trouble
double-double-toil-and-trouble-92b47ad1-.description: Determined twins (Mary-Kate Olsen, Ashley Olsen) try to trick an evil aunt (Cloris Leachman) out of a magic moonstone and save their family home.

embrace-of-the-serpent-d538313a-9d3f-4d3.title: Embrace of the Serpent
embrace-of-the-serpent-d538313a-9d3f-4d3.description: At once blistering and poetic, the ravages of colonialism cast a dark shadow over the South American landscape in EMBRACE OF THE SERPENT, the third feature by Ciro Guerra. Filmed in stunning black-and-white, SERPENT centers on Karamakate, an Amazonian shaman and the last survivor of his people, and the two scientists who, over the course of 40 years, build a friendship with him. The film was inspired by the real-life journals of two explorers (Theodor Koch-Grünberg and Richard Evans Schultes) who traveled through the Colombian Amazon during the last century in search of the sacred and difficult-to-find psychedelic Yakruna plant. 2016 Academy Award Nominee - Best Foreign Language Film

escape-from-mr-lemoncellos-library-b1a1c.title: Escape from Mr. Lemoncello's Library
escape-from-mr-lemoncellos-library-b1a1c.description: When twelve lucky kids win an invitation into legendary gamemaker Lemoncello's extraordinary, high-tech library, they have no idea what's in store. By navigating an elaborate scavenger hunt, they must compete to be the first to find their way out. Rating: TV-G

fantastica-a-boonie-bears-adventure-facc.title: Fantastica: A Boonie Bears Adventure
fantastica-a-boonie-bears-adventure-facc.description: In the cartoon multiverse known as Fantastica, the intrepid robot Coco discovers the location of an ancient artifact. But with a group of thieves hot on Coco’s trail, Coco will have to rely on a group of friends to help protect Fantastica.

free-willy-3-the-rescue-674cdc88-1458-42.title: Free Willy 3: The Rescue
free-willy-3-the-rescue-674cdc88-1458-42.description: A 10-year-old boy whose father is running an illegal whaling operation is caught in a dilemma when Willy and his pod are threatened.

hey-arnold-the-jungle-movie-184d64ce-5ae.title: Hey Arnold! The Jungle Movie
hey-arnold-the-jungle-movie-184d64ce-5ae.description: Arnold and his class win a service trip to San Lorenzo. But when their trip takes a turn for the worst, their only hope of getting home may be retracing the dangerous path that led to Arnold's parents' disappearance.

how-to-eat-fried-worms-7b2b9310-ca9b-477.title: How to Eat Fried Worms
how-to-eat-fried-worms-7b2b9310-ca9b-477.description: On his first day at a new school, eleven-year-old Billy goes up against the school bully in a challenge that ends up with a total gross-out date...to eat 10 worms in one day!

how-to-train-your-dragon-the-hidden-worl.title: How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World
how-to-train-your-dragon-the-hidden-worl.description: When the appearance of a Light Fury dragon coincides with the darkest threat they have faced, Hiccup and Toothless must journey to a hidden world and discover their destinies.

hunt-for-the-wilderpeople-0524cf65-0da9-.title: Hunt for the Wilderpeople
hunt-for-the-wilderpeople-0524cf65-0da9-.description: Raised on hip-hop and foster care, defiant city kid Ricky gets a fresh start in the New Zealand countryside. He quickly finds himself at home with his new foster family: the loving Aunt Bella, the cantankerous Uncle Hec, and dog Tupac. When a tragedy strikes that threatens to ship Ricky to another home, both he and Hec go on the run in the bush. As a national manhunt ensues, the newly branded outlaws must face their options: go out in a blaze of glory or overcome their differences and survive as a family.  Equal parts road comedy and rousing adventure story, director Taika Waititi (WHAT WE DO IN THE SHADOWS, upcoming THOR: RAGNORAK) masterfully weaves lively humor with emotionally honest performances by Sam Neill and Julian Dennison....

the-jungle-bunch-the-movie-1b19b414-59b1.title: The Jungle Bunch: The Movie
the-jungle-bunch-the-movie-1b19b414-59b1.description: Raised in Africa, a penguin (John Lithgow) must return to the Antarctic to save his family and friends from the invading walruses.

the-ladybug-3aa31aa3-0531-4bda-a1a3-8f13.title: The Ladybug
the-ladybug-3aa31aa3-0531-4bda-a1a3-8f13.description: Seven-spotted ladybug Rube sets out on a wild and crazy adventure to visit Golden Canyon, the legendary bug utopia and home to a kingdom of insects he once saw on television.

legends-of-oz-dorothys-return-b6f9cad1-6.title: Legends of Oz: Dorothy's Return
legends-of-oz-dorothys-return-b6f9cad1-6.description: Shortly after a tornado rips through her Kansas home, Dorothy returns to Oz to save her friends from a villainous jester.

luis-and-the-aliens-dc4702a7-c36a-4ba7-9.title: Luis and the Aliens
luis-and-the-aliens-dc4702a7-c36a-4ba7-9.description: 12-year-old Luis befriends a trio of awkward aliens who’ve gotten stuck on Earth after watching too much home-shopping network. With a neglectful father at home, Luis decides to escape with the aliens so he can avoid being sent away to a boarding school.

moll-flanders-45c69f1b-2314-49af-891b-b1.title: Moll Flanders
moll-flanders-45c69f1b-2314-49af-891b-b1.description: The unwavering hope and determination of a poverty-stricken young girl who goes from childhood in an orphanage to teen life on the street to eventually finding love with an unconventional artist.

monos-351c7f48-df41-46cc-a94c-2e639f71d9.title: Monos
monos-351c7f48-df41-46cc-a94c-2e639f71d9.description: A young group of soldiers and rebels keep watch over an American hostage, Doctora. After an ambush drives the squadron into the jungle, both the mission and the intricate bonds between the group begin to disintegrate.

my-little-pony-a-very-minty-christmas-b2.title: My Little Pony: A Very Minty Christmas
my-little-pony-a-very-minty-christmas-b2.description: Clumsy Minty Pony (Tabitha St. Germain) breaks the holiday candy cane that guides Santa Claus to Ponyville every year; includes bonus episode "Dancing in the Clouds."

my-little-pony-the-princess-promenade-36.title: My Little Pony: The Princess Promenade
my-little-pony-the-princess-promenade-36.description: The ponies' annual Spring Promenade goes awry when a 1,000-year-old dragon awakens and fulfills a royal prophecy.

my-little-pony-twinkle-wish-adventure-46.title: My Little Pony: Twinkle Wish Adventure
my-little-pony-twinkle-wish-adventure-46.description: All the ponies cannot wait for the Winter Wishes festival where the Wishing Star grants each pony one special wish. But when the Wishing Star disappears, they go on a journey to find it. But will they make it back in time for the festival?

national-lampoons-european-vacation-171d.title: National Lampoon's European Vacation
national-lampoons-european-vacation-171d.description: After winning a European vacation on a game show, Clark Griswold (Chevy Chase) convinces his reluctant family to accompany him. His wife, Ellen (Beverly D'Angelo), is excited, but daughter Audrey (Dana Hill) is reluctant to leave her boyfriend behind, while teen son Rusty (Jason Lively) dreams of meeting girls. After arriving in London, the clan encounters one disaster after another as they travel through France, Germany and Italy, while Clark's attempts to cheer everyone up make things worse.

national-lampoons-vacation-8efce5c4-382b.title: National Lampoon's Vacation
national-lampoons-vacation-8efce5c4-382b.description: National Lampoon's Vacation (1983) stars Chevy Chase and Beverly D'Angelo. The Griswolds (Chevy Chase, Beverly D'Angelo) and family head by station wagon for the California fun park Walley World.

naz-maalik-5f5768a8-2ec3-40f8-91bb-af5a8.title: Naz & Maalik
naz-maalik-5f5768a8-2ec3-40f8-91bb-af5a8.description: Two closeted teens from Bed-Stuy unwittingly find themselves in the crosshairs of the War on Terror when surveillance footage of their secretive behavior is wildly misinterpreted in this smart indie comedy.

the-nightingale-76bfebaf-d8ab-4566-b354-.title: The Nightingale
the-nightingale-76bfebaf-d8ab-4566-b354-.description: Director Jennifer Kent ("The Babadook") tells the sweeping tale of a young woman's quest for revenge set in 1825 against the perilous and unforgiving terrain of Tasmania.

ozzy-55129da1-124c-417e-9b5a-ebf8b020d85.title: Ozzy
ozzy-55129da1-124c-417e-9b5a-ebf8b020d85.description: The lovable Ozzy’s pampered life is thrown into turmoil after his family drops him at Blue Creek before their vacation. Ozzy quickly learns that Blue Creek is a dog prison and he’ll need to rely on some new friends to help him break out and get back home.

the-pirates-band-of-misfits-e6d238ac-60f.title: The Pirates! Band Of Misfits
the-pirates-band-of-misfits-e6d238ac-60f.description: Set sail for a fun-filled pirate adventure with the biggest band of misfits on the seven seas!

pokemon-the-movie-diancie-and-the-cocoon.title: Pokémon the Movie: Diancie and the Cocoon of Destruction
pokemon-the-movie-diancie-and-the-cocoon.description: When Destruction rises, can Life prevail?

prospect-1f6c675c-8e74-42cd-8dae-88a958a.title: Prospect
prospect-1f6c675c-8e74-42cd-8dae-88a958a.description: A teenage girl and her father travel to a remote moon on the hunt for elusive riches. But there are others roving the moon's toxic forest and the job quickly devolves into a desperate fight to escape.

racetime-98699ccc-e23f-42ea-81fc-2e5daec.title: Racetime
racetime-98699ccc-e23f-42ea-81fc-2e5daec.description: After losing a rigged sled race, Frankie challenges newcomer Zac to one last showdown. With the stakes higher than ever, Zac will stop at nothing to win the race.

rango-3f5ddc74-2c3f-403a-b1a6-02852b5473.title: Rango
rango-3f5ddc74-2c3f-403a-b1a6-02852b5473.description: A chameleon that aspires to be a swashbuckling hero finds himself in a Western town plagued by bandits and is forced to literally play the role in order to protect it.

regular-show-the-movie-c01e4abd-0602-470.title: Regular Show: The Movie
regular-show-the-movie-c01e4abd-0602-470.description: After accidentally creating a Timenado, two slacker groundskeepers have to go back in time and battle an evil volleyball coach in order to save the universe...and their friendship.

saving-christmas-224e1443-2b70-4f6e-9781.title: Saving Christmas
saving-christmas-224e1443-2b70-4f6e-9781.description: A boy attempts to scientifically prove Santa's existence.

the-secret-of-the-nutcracker-070a36aa-e7.title: The Secret of the Nutcracker
the-secret-of-the-nutcracker-070a36aa-e7.description: In this innovative version of the world famous Christmas story, 12-year-old Clara takes a magical journey on Christmas Eve to find her father in a World War II Prisoner of War camp.

sherlock-gnomes-3b42cd57-439c-498b-b636-.title: Sherlock Gnomes
sherlock-gnomes-3b42cd57-439c-498b-b636-.description: Garden gnomes, Gnomeo & Juliet, recruit renown detective, Sherlock Gnomes, to investigate the mysterious disappearance of other garden ornaments.

the-snow-queen-3-fire-and-ice-9c1de080-7.title: The Snow Queen 3: Fire and Ice
the-snow-queen-3-fire-and-ice-9c1de080-7.description: After heroically defeating both the Snow Queen and the Snow King, Gerda, a selfless adventurer, is struggling with the disappearance of her parents. In order to find them, Gerda and her friends go on a dangerous mission.

the-swan-princess-a-royal-family-tale-2e.title: The Swan Princess: A Royal Family Tale
the-swan-princess-a-royal-family-tale-2e.description: Shortly after the Royal Family adopts a young girl named Alise, she is taken away into the forest. Princess Odette, Derek and their woodland friends, must work together to find a way to bring her home to the castle.

the-swan-princess-a-royal-myztery-dd018e.title: The Swan Princess: A Royal Myztery
the-swan-princess-a-royal-myztery-dd018e.description: Your favorite characters are back in an all-new royal adventure! It seems that a mysterious "Z" is appearing as a mark on the palace residents. Who is behind the mark and what does it mean?

the-swan-princess-princess-tomorrow-pira.title: The Swan Princess: Princess Tomorrow, Pirate Today
the-swan-princess-princess-tomorrow-pira.description: With her parents away for the summer, fun-loving, young Princess Alise must spend her time with Queen Uberta, training to be the perfect, proper royal. But what she really wants is to become a swashbuckling pirate!

the-swan-princess-royally-undercover-4db.title: The Swan Princess: Royally Undercover
the-swan-princess-royally-undercover-4db.description: When mysterious visitors arrive in the Kingdom, Princess Alise, Lucas and their friends go undercover on a secret spy adventure.

the-swan-princess-the-mystery-of-the-enc.title: The Swan Princess: The Mystery of the Enchanted Treasure
the-swan-princess-the-mystery-of-the-enc.description: The spirited animals of Swan Lake help their prince and princess save the kingdom from a sinister sorceress.

swindle-82256567-e857-4c37-8069-68fd19bf.title: Swindle
swindle-82256567-e857-4c37-8069-68fd19bf.description: Griffin Bing wants to swindle a swindler, right a wrong, take back property unethically obtained by deceptive means (whatever sounds fancier) and sets off to recruit the ultimate crew. He is owed favors all over school and it's time to call them in! Rating: TV-G

tiny-christmas-b9c85044-ed0d-4842-b4c7-0.title: Tiny Christmas
tiny-christmas-b9c85044-ed0d-4842-b4c7-0.description: On Christmas Eve, a clumsy elf accidentally shrinks two kids into mini-size. The kids are scooped up into Santa's sack and dropped off across the street. To make it home for Christmas (just one house away!), the tiny kids have to work together.  Rating: TV-G

turtle-tale-c5b691f3-3a01-4142-b179-4576.title: Turtle Tale
turtle-tale-c5b691f3-3a01-4142-b179-4576.description: This uproarious family adventure follows two mismatched turtles who joke and bicker as they search for their friend, who vanished from a Florida animal park.

uglydolls-b5e5d373-1f2d-4cc5-9d2c-3b7a68.title: UglyDolls
uglydolls-b5e5d373-1f2d-4cc5-9d2c-3b7a68.description: An animated adventure in which the free-spirited UglyDolls confront what it means to be different, struggle with a desire to be loved, and ultimately discover who you truly are is what matters most.

wonder-park-efc1a934-97fc-41ec-8d52-612d.title: Wonder Park
wonder-park-efc1a934-97fc-41ec-8d52-612d.description: Wonder Park tells the story of a magnificent amusement park where the imagination of a wildly creative girl named June comes alive.

zapped-f6b9b356-a4a8-4a35-a204-8802c8e62.title: Zapped
zapped-f6b9b356-a4a8-4a35-a204-8802c8e62.description: Zoey discovers a smartphone app that magically controls boys.

dub-dragon-age-dawn-of-the-seeker-cfeeef.title: (Dub) Dragon Age: Dawn of the Seeker
dub-dragon-age-dawn-of-the-seeker-cfeeef.description: A brash young Seeker - Cassandra - is accused of treason as she fights a conspiracy that threatens the realm's most powerful religious order. With her life on the line, she must clear her name and expose those working to destroy the Divine.

dub-grave-of-the-fireflies-87e3ac1b-67e2.title: (Dub) Grave of the Fireflies
dub-grave-of-the-fireflies-87e3ac1b-67e2.description: In the final months of World War II, 14-year-old Seita and his sister Setsuko are orphaned. With no surviving relatives and their emergency rations depleted, they struggle to survive in this heartbreaking story detailing the true casualties of war.

sub-fairy-tail-the-movie-phoenix-prieste.title: (Sub) Fairy Tail the Movie: Phoenix Priestess
sub-fairy-tail-the-movie-phoenix-prieste.description: Natsu and his mighty team of mages face evil rising from the embers in this action-packed feature-length exclusive! When a prince seeking immortality unleashes an ancient force, a raging war becomes the fiercest inferno the wizards have ever faced!

sub-grave-of-the-fireflies-6887a224-9db8.title: (Sub) Grave of the Fireflies
sub-grave-of-the-fireflies-6887a224-9db8.description: In the final months of World War II, 14-year-old Seita and his sister Setsuko are orphaned. With no surviving relatives and their emergency rations depleted, they struggle to survive in this heartbreaking story detailing the true casualties of war.

sub-legend-of-heroes-trails-in-the-sky-0.title: (Sub) Legend of Heroes: Trails in the Sky
sub-legend-of-heroes-trails-in-the-sky-0.description: Ten years ago, an invasion by the Erebonians almost shattered the Kingdom of Liberl. For Estelle Bright it’s all ancient history. But history repeats; as Estelle and her brother find themselves in the wrong place when mayhem breaks out.

sub-sword-art-online-extra-edition-a5e0a.title: (Sub) Sword Art Online Extra Edition
sub-sword-art-online-extra-edition-a5e0a.description: Kirito and the others decide to go on an underwater quest to allow Yui to see a whale, but face a shocking revelation… Suguha is afraid of water. So, Asuna and the other girls decide to teach Suguha how to swim. Meanwhile, Kirito is meeting somebody.

black-cop-87c8a486-7ef4-422e-ada4-d01a81.title: Black Cop
black-cop-87c8a486-7ef4-422e-ada4-d01a81.description: A police officer is pushed to the edge after being profiled and assaulted by his colleagues, setting him on a skewed mission of vengeance on the privileged. A satire on police, social media and racial tension

the-cookout-62fec702-5d16-49a2-8b08-7687.title: The Cookout
the-cookout-62fec702-5d16-49a2-8b08-7687.description: A raucous backyard cookout riles snooty residents in a gated community.

detroit-3f4dbeaf-8976-45b1-993b-2b362621.title: Detroit
detroit-3f4dbeaf-8976-45b1-993b-2b362621.description: From the Academy Award winning director of THE HURT LOCKER and ZERO DARK THIRTY, DETROIT tells the gripping story of one of the most terrifying moments during the civil unrest that rocked Detroit in the summer of '67.

for-colored-girls-80ac31e2-0232-4b69-a0d.title: For Colored Girls
for-colored-girls-80ac31e2-0232-4b69-a0d.description: Each of the women portray one of the characters represented in the collection of twenty poems, revealing different issues that impact women in general and women of color in particular.

the-gospel-according-to-andre-70b899bd-9.title: The Gospel According to André
the-gospel-according-to-andre-70b899bd-9.description: This intimate portrait for André Leon Tally, a fixture in the world of fashion, takes viewers on a journey from André’s roots growing up to becoming one of the most influential tastemakers and fashion curators of our times.

john-q-0e679094-3088-4620-bef8-d4dc8e0b3.title: John Q
john-q-0e679094-3088-4620-bef8-d4dc8e0b3.description: Denzel Washington stars as John Q, a man whose young son needs an emergency heart transplant. When he discovers his insurance won't cover it, he will do anything to keep his son alive.

kiki-97142e45-c687-4799-a23f-d2f509c7762.title: Kiki
kiki-97142e45-c687-4799-a23f-d2f509c7762.description: 25 years after 'Paris Is Burning' introduced the art of voguing to the world, Kiki revisits New York City's thriving underground ballroom scene. It's a larger-than-life world in which LGBTQ youths of color are empowered by staging elaborate dance competitions that showcase their dynamic choreography, fabulous costumes, and fierce attitude. It's also a safe haven for struggling, at-risk teens who find acceptance, support, and friendship within the Kiki community. Granted intimate access to the scene, filmmaker Sara Jordenö introduces viewers to some of Kiki culture's most prominent personalities, going beyond the glamour of the balls to highlight the serious challenges facing queer black and Latino young people. Bringing together heartrending personal stories with incredible displays of creative expression, Kiki is 'exhilarating…an indelible, must-see ode to gay New York' (Manohla Dargis, The New York Times).

monsters-and-men-be1f7523-0b88-44e7-8b7e.title: Monsters and Men
monsters-and-men-be1f7523-0b88-44e7-8b7e.description: A bystander films the death of a black man at the hands of police, which sparks rising tensions in a New York neighborhood as some are moved to take a stand.

queen-collective-ballet-after-dark-a3fb9.title: Queen Collective: Ballet After Dark
queen-collective-ballet-after-dark-a3fb9.description: After surviving a violent attack, Tyde-Courtney Edwards founds a group for survivors of sexual abuse and domestic violence. From Queen Latifah, Tribeca, and P&G, the Queen Collective is a program accelerating gender and racial equality behind the camera.

queen-collective-if-there-is-light-ed73a.title: Queen Collective: If There Is Light
queen-collective-if-there-is-light-ed73a.description: Fourteen year-old Janiyah wrestles with her life in New York as her mom tries to move her family out of the shelter system. From Queen Latifah, Tribeca, and P&G, the Queen Collective is a program accelerating gender and racial equality behind the camera.

santa-hunters-170a86c1-145c-4357-a2bc-f4.title: Santa Hunters
santa-hunters-170a86c1-145c-4357-a2bc-f4.description: Alex is on a mission to prove Santa is real. With the help of his family and some elaborate traps, they catch the big guy in action. But when they realize Santa is losing his magic they must find a way to restore it before they destroy Christmas!

sorry-to-bother-you-c66b772e-75e9-43b1-b.title: Sorry to Bother You
sorry-to-bother-you-c66b772e-75e9-43b1-b.description: In an alternate present-day version of Oakland, telemarketer Cassius Green discovers a magical key to professional success, propelling him into a macabre universe.

support-the-girls-4d5ae6ed-09bb-4532-83b.title: Support the Girls
support-the-girls-4d5ae6ed-09bb-4532-83b.description: Regina Hall (Girls Trip) stars as the hardworking manager of a "sports bar with curves" who runs the joint like a family, even as sketchy employees, bad customers and an even worse boss put her good nature to the test.

whose-streets-3e8f4b7a-75d4-4484-9843-e6.title: Whose Streets?
whose-streets-3e8f4b7a-75d4-4484-9843-e6.description: Told by the activists and leaders who live and breathe this movement for justice, Whose Streets? is an unflinching look at the Ferguson uprising. When unarmed teenager Michael Brown is killed by police and left lying in the street for hours, it marks a breaking point for the residents of St. Louis, Missouri. Grief, long-standing racial tensions and renewed anger bring residents together to hold vigil and protest this latest tragedy. Empowered parents, artists, and teachers from around the country come together as freedom fighters. As the National Guard descends on Ferguson with military grade weaponry, these young community members become the torchbearers of a new resistance. Filmmakers Sabaah Folayan and Damon Davis know this story because they are the story. Whose Streets? is a powerful battle cry from a generation fighting, not for their civil rights, but for the right to live.

the-furies-ce2cd51e-90d0-46e8-8df6-c6514.title: The Furies
the-furies-ce2cd51e-90d0-46e8-8df6-c6514.description: Western depicting the clash between a self-made cattle king of the Old West and his equally iron-willed daughter. Based on Niven Busch's novel.

heathers-358a31d7-a435-403a-8f38-1d02cae.title: Heathers
heathers-358a31d7-a435-403a-8f38-1d02cae.description: Westerburg High School's elite clique of popular girls is "The Heathers," comprised of the powerful Heather Chandler, the green-with-envy Heather Duke, and the cowardly Heather McNamara. Rounding out the foursome is Veronica Sawyer (Winona Ryder), who is so fed up with the Heathers and the entire peer pressure cooker that she starts running with J.D. (Christian Slater), a mysterious - and possibly psychotic - motorcycle-riding newcomer. But what begins as their noble effort to rid Westerburg of its bad apples ends up taking a real toll. And their teen rebellion produces a serious and mounting body count. Shannen Doherty co-stars in this cruelly hilarious dark comedy, which became one of the biggest cult classics of the '80s.

national-lampoons-christmas-vacation-4b1.title: National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation
national-lampoons-christmas-vacation-4b1.description: Clark Griswold, who dragged his family through the horrors of traveling in two previous films, has decided to stay home for the holiday--and the neighborhood will never be the same.

tall-stranger-7fd0b539-659f-419e-84f4-55.title: Tall Stranger
tall-stranger-7fd0b539-659f-419e-84f4-55.description: In the post-Civil War Colorado Territory, a rancher rescued from death by a wagon-train demonstrates his gratitude by guiding the train to the newly-opened land. He also finds the rustlers who shot him, as well as true love.

12-dog-days-till-christmas-65eba98a-4a38.title: 12 Dog Days Till Christmas
12-dog-days-till-christmas-65eba98a-4a38.description: A troubled teen sentenced to community service at a dog shelter helps find homes for unadopted strays and, in the process, discovers romance, family, and responsibility for himself.

35-and-ticking-0a310cff-043a-4aa4-a180-2.title: 35 and Ticking
