35-and-ticking-0a310cff-043a-4aa4-a180-2.description: Four friends are approaching the age of 35 and struggling to build families they've dreamed of. They try to rectify their romantic lives and futures while their biological clocks tick away.

5050-8bbdc2a6-c308-4319-afb8-0b010f76db5.description: Joseph Gordon-Levitt and Seth Rogen team up to beat the odds in a film that Peter Travers ofRolling Stone calls "achingly hilarious and heartfelt."

action-point-2058fbc9-3d3e-4a96-b492-4c3.title: Action Point
action-point-2058fbc9-3d3e-4a96-b492-4c3.description: A daredevil designs and operates his own theme park with his friends.

adam-2019-88217e5e-f148-48b3-a3f3-b0fd45.title: Adam (2019)
adam-2019-88217e5e-f148-48b3-a3f3-b0fd45.description: Directed by trans filmmaker Rhys Ernst, this adaptation tells the thought-provoking story of a cisgender male, who, after falling in love with a lesbian, goes on a journey of learning about LGBTQ culture.

the-alchemist-cookbook-51e14e46-b6ff-4db.title: The Alchemist Cookbook
the-alchemist-cookbook-51e14e46-b6ff-4db.description: Young outcast Sean has isolated himself in a trailer in the woods with his cat Kaspar. When he turns from chemistry to black magic to crack nature’s secret, things go awry and he awakens something far more sinister and dangerous.

all-about-e-2b04c2ed-e31f-482a-8ead-03ff.title: All About E
all-about-e-2b04c2ed-e31f-482a-8ead-03ff.description: A sexy young DJ, E, and her gay best friend, Matt, are forced to run when E stumbles on some cash. But E finds she has burnt too many bridges and there is nowhere to run but outback Australia into the arms of the ex-girlfriend, Trish, who broke her heart.

all-square-dada6723-2926-4897-ac70-77568.title: All Square
all-square-dada6723-2926-4897-ac70-77568.description: A down-on-his-luck bookie befriends an ex-girlfriend's son and begins taking bets on his youth league baseball games, creating chaos in the community.

along-for-the-ride-a5cf7470-aa45-466b-b2.title: Along for the Ride
along-for-the-ride-a5cf7470-aa45-466b-b2.description: Filmmaker Nick Ebeling profiles the professional exile and eventual re-emergence of Dennis Hopper following the making of "The Last Movie."

alright-now-b5a804d5-a4f8-4234-9603-8da7.title: Alright Now
alright-now-b5a804d5-a4f8-4234-9603-8da7.description: ALRIGHT NOW follows a rock musician (Cobie Smulders, “How I Met Your Mother”) who drunkenly enrolls in college after she breaks up with her boyfriend and her rock band falls apart....what could go wrong?

anchor-and-hope-79620973-5f56-4d2c-823c-.title: Anchor and Hope
anchor-and-hope-79620973-5f56-4d2c-823c-.description: A lesbian couple, living a simple life, decide to have a child. A comedy starring Oona Chaplin and her mother Geraldine Chaplin.

and-so-it-goes-fa6e712d-0d20-434f-bfda-f.title: And So It Goes
and-so-it-goes-fa6e712d-0d20-434f-bfda-f.description: A self-absorbed realtor enlists the help of his neighbor when he's suddenly left in charge of the granddaughter he never knew existed until his estranged son drops her off at his home.

anna-and-the-apocalypse-cbf741af-9160-4e.title: Anna and the Apocalypse
anna-and-the-apocalypse-cbf741af-9160-4e.description: A zombie apocalypse threatens the sleepy town of Little Haven - at Christmas – forcing Anna and her friends to fight, slash and sing their way to survival, facing the undead in a desperate race to reach their loved ones.

the-art-of-self-defense-50a1948f-390f-40.title: The Art of Self-Defense
the-art-of-self-defense-50a1948f-390f-40.description: A random assault turns a mild-mannered accountant into a lethal martial artist in The Art of Self-Defense, an audaciously original dark comedy that takes the idea of toxic masculinity to absurd extremes.

bachelor-party-cfd138ce-e3bb-4eb3-b82e-c.title: Bachelor Party
bachelor-party-cfd138ce-e3bb-4eb3-b82e-c.description: Tom Hanks says goodbye to singlehood with a wild night complete with hookers, male strippers, wall-to-wall booze and a drugged-out mule.

bad-roomies-fa0e5dec-d59f-4da7-b463-262a.title: Bad Roomies
bad-roomies-fa0e5dec-d59f-4da7-b463-262a.description: Two guys find a beautiful young woman to take the place of their missing roommate. Everything seems fine until a horrible mistake on drunken night leads all three on a downward spiral.

barefoot-4aa23a86-a186-4c21-8754-f32847a.title: Barefoot
barefoot-4aa23a86-a186-4c21-8754-f32847a.description: The "black sheep" son of a wealthy family meets a young psychiatric patient who's been raised in isolation her entire life. He takes the woman home for his brother's wedding to convince his family that he's changed his life.

the-beach-bum-9767f4e7-4490-48ff-a9b8-68.title: The Beach Bum
the-beach-bum-9767f4e7-4490-48ff-a9b8-68.description: Moondog is a fun-loving, pot-smoking, beer-drinking writer who lives life on his own terms in Florida. If he can put down the drugs for just one minute, he may finally be able to put his talent to good use and finish the next great American novel.

the-bellboy-e2cad8d4-8cf5-4174-acb6-982f.title: The Bellboy
the-bellboy-e2cad8d4-8cf5-4174-acb6-982f.description: Stanley is a quiet bellboy just doing his job at the Fountainbleau Hotel in Miami Beach. One day, Jerry Lewis, the big star, arrives at the hotel and some of the staff notices the striking resemblance between them.

benjamin-adaf5a53-6ed5-47d3-b7e7-1b2cd07.title: Benjamin
benjamin-adaf5a53-6ed5-47d3-b7e7-1b2cd07.description: A family calls in an intervention for Benjamin, their teenage son whom they believe to be hooked on crystal meth. Soon, it becomes clear that those who are confronting Benjamin's problem also have many problems of their own.

bernie-the-dolphin-6c730c93-eb13-4432-89.title: Bernie the Dolphin
bernie-the-dolphin-6c730c93-eb13-4432-89.description: In this heartwarming family adventure, the search for a missing dolphin leads two kids to uncover a real-estate development plan that endangers the sea life on a Florida beach.

big-time-adolescence-387ba517-ec86-4799-.title: Big Time Adolescence
big-time-adolescence-387ba517-ec86-4799-.description: A seemingly bright and mostly innocent 16-year-old named Mo (Griffin Gluck) attempts to navigate high school under the guidance of his best friend Zeke (Pete Davidson), an unmotivated-yet-charismatic college dropout. Although Zeke genuinely cares about Mo, things start to go awry as he teaches Mo nontraditional life lessons in drug dealing, partying, and dating. Meanwhile, Mo’s well-meaning dad (Jon Cryer) tries to step in and take back the reins of his son’s upbringing.

big-time-movie-e8017db4-1e5c-4532-88ce-b.title: Big Time Movie
big-time-movie-e8017db4-1e5c-4532-88ce-b.description: Big Time Rush is off to London on their first world tour, but as soon as they arrive they're mixed up in a mission to save the world. With their bags switched at their airport, the boys are stuck with a fearsome device that could destroy the world.

the-big-wedding-99adb5de-e9c4-47ed-8694-.title: The Big Wedding
the-big-wedding-99adb5de-e9c4-47ed-8694-.description: To the amusement of their adult children and friends, long-divorced couple Don and Ellie Griffin (De Niro and Keaton) are once again forced to play the happy couple for the sake of their adopted son's wedding.

billboard-dad-15d82f96-7c2f-4794-a7a5-d7.title: Billboard Dad
billboard-dad-15d82f96-7c2f-4794-a7a5-d7.description: Two sisters (Mary-Kate Olsen, Ashley Olsen) print a personals ad on a billboard to find a match for their newly single father.

book-club-bea3dcef-dc93-42d2-b247-bf7acd.title: Book Club
book-club-bea3dcef-dc93-42d2-b247-bf7acd.description: Four friends' lives are turned upside down to hilarious ends when their book club tackles the infamous Fifty Shades of Grey.

booksmart-032a0523-9fda-41bf-97c1-a44097.title: Booksmart
booksmart-032a0523-9fda-41bf-97c1-a44097.description: Booksmart is a comedy about two academic superstars and best friends on a mission to cram four years of fun into one night.

a-boy-named-charlie-brown-5bd66dfb-b2db-.title: A Boy Named Charlie Brown
a-boy-named-charlie-brown-5bd66dfb-b2db-.description: Charlie Brown, Snoopy and the Peanuts gang in their feature film debut! Charlie has a chance to win the respect of his friends when he enters a school spelling bee and winds up in the big city for the finals.

breakup-at-a-wedding-0d90b0df-ff72-44bf-.title: Breakup at a Wedding
breakup-at-a-wedding-0d90b0df-ff72-44bf-.description: A videographer captures an engaged couple's decision to proceed with a sham wedding after the bride calls off the ceremony and decides to break up with her partner, who secretly hopes that his surprise gift will ultimately change her mind.

bridget-joness-baby-3b655116-8123-4220-b.title: Bridget Jones's Baby
bridget-joness-baby-3b655116-8123-4220-b.description: Bridget Jones's Baby (2016) stars Renée Zellweger and Colin Firth. Befuddled mom-to-be Bridget Jones (Renée Zellweger) must figure out which of the two men (Colin Firth, Patrick Dempsey) in her life is the father of her child.

bridget-joness-diary-5118ce8c-ea12-49af-.title: Bridget Jones's Diary
bridget-joness-diary-5118ce8c-ea12-49af-.description: Bridget Jones (Renee Zellweger) begins keeping a diary that details her life as a single screwball and search for love in this hit comedy.

bridget-jones-the-edge-of-reason-3e347e6.title: Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason
bridget-jones-the-edge-of-reason-3e347e6.description: Beloved screwball Bridget Jones (Renee Zellweger) struggles to make love last in this sequel with Hugh Grant and Colin Firth.

a-brilliant-young-mind-fa31c44f-ab8b-4fa.title: A Brilliant Young Mind
a-brilliant-young-mind-fa31c44f-ab8b-4fa.description: A socially awkward teenage math prodigy finds new confidence and new friendships when he lands a spot on the British squad at the International Mathematics Olympiad.

buffalo-66-5bad32c2-edd7-4f83-a283-b035f.title: Buffalo '66
buffalo-66-5bad32c2-edd7-4f83-a283-b035f.description: Billy is released after five years in prison. In the next moment, he kidnaps teenage student Layla and visits his parents with her, pretending she is his girlfriend and they will soon marry (and forcing her to say the same).

bunny-and-the-bull-0a79da68-4a4f-4ba9-9b.title: Bunny and the Bull
bunny-and-the-bull-0a79da68-4a4f-4ba9-9b.description: A shut-in loses track of the real and unreal as he uses his imagination to relive a traumatic road trip he took with his friend (Simon Farnaby).

csa-confederate-states-of-america-81999b.title: C.S.A.: Confederate States of America
csa-confederate-states-of-america-81999b.description: Kevin Willmott's bold, satirical and wildly funny film, Confederate States of America, poses the question: What if the South had won the Civil War?

the-cabin-in-the-woods-fcc104f4-8914-4ff.title: The Cabin in the Woods
the-cabin-in-the-woods-fcc104f4-8914-4ff.description: In this twisted thriller, five friends arrive at a secluded cabin with clear instructions for their anticipated mountain getaway. But when the rigid rules are broken, punishment is swift and everyone will pay.

cantinflas-e10e2c9f-7d7d-4994-a6c1-dbbfa.title: Cantinflas
cantinflas-e10e2c9f-7d7d-4994-a6c1-dbbfa.description: Cantinflas is the untold story of Mexico's greatest and most beloved comedy film star of all time.

captain-fantastic-b52728f0-e380-449a-aeb.title: Captain Fantastic
captain-fantastic-b52728f0-e380-449a-aeb.description: A father raising his six kids in the Pacific Northwest is forced to leave.

changeland-ad8dc165-0105-4031-9972-8515d.title: Changeland
changeland-ad8dc165-0105-4031-9972-8515d.description: Directed by and starring Seth Green, the film follows two estranged best friends on a life-changing trip to Thailand. This epic journey reminds them that there's no problem that friendship and a few rounds in a Thai boxing ring can't fix.

the-chateau-33a84368-dcfc-4683-8f58-e9ce.title: The Chateau
the-chateau-33a84368-dcfc-4683-8f58-e9ce.description: Two mismatched brothers venture to France to claim a property they have inherited. This comedy stars Paul Rudd and Romany Malco.

cherry-pop-bd9b14b1-3b1e-4058-80f2-4b875.title: Cherry Pop
cherry-pop-bd9b14b1-3b1e-4058-80f2-4b875.description: Cherry Pop, directed by Assaad Yacoub, follows one wild, crazy night at a drag club. The matriarch of the show Zaza refuses to come out of her dressing room, while a young newcomer, The Cherry, is tormented by the regular troupe of back-stabbing queens.

a-christmas-kiss-ii-493981ed-4d46-4978-8.title: A Christmas Kiss II
a-christmas-kiss-ii-493981ed-4d46-4978-8.description: A passionate, mistletoe-instigated kiss in an elevator inspires a millionaire playboy and his sister’s relationship, gun-shy executive assistant to take a romantic leap of faith at Christmas.

christmas-with-the-andersons-8a8334b6-8b.title: Christmas With the Andersons
christmas-with-the-andersons-8a8334b6-8b.description: The Anderson family always goes all out for Christmas, but this year will be different when Michael loses his job just before the holidays. With wacky Aunt Katie visiting, though, she helps remind them Christmas can be fun with no money.

a-cinderella-christmas-cd3fe1d1-46ba-473.title: A Cinderella Christmas
a-cinderella-christmas-cd3fe1d1-46ba-473.description: The Christmasquerade Ball gives hardworking Angie a chance to let loose. She quickly charms Nicholas but has to go suddenly, leaving him only one clue to find her in this modern, holiday take on the classic fairytale.

cinderfella-b02d9dad-eee2-4dae-aa50-92a7.title: Cinderfella
cinderfella-b02d9dad-eee2-4dae-aa50-92a7.description: Fowler is a clumsy simpleton who has to care for his step mother and her two stuck-up sons Maximilian and Rupert. Only in the realms of fantasy can he find comfort. One day a good spirit appears and helps him win the heart of a beautiful princess.

the-cleanse-1c4752ea-ceca-4a9c-8d4a-f101.title: The Cleanse
the-cleanse-1c4752ea-ceca-4a9c-8d4a-f101.description: A heartbroken man attending a spiritual retreat discovers the regimen releases more than toxins.

colossal-1ad56ab4-f08b-45cd-b28e-4b51539.title: Colossal
colossal-1ad56ab4-f08b-45cd-b28e-4b51539.description: Gloria is an out-of-work party girl forced to leave her life in New York City, and move back home. When reports surface that a giant creature is destroying Seoul, she gradually comes to the realization that she is somehow connected to this phenomenon.

the-con-is-on-a62db821-8156-447b-a25e-81.title: The Con Is On
the-con-is-on-a62db821-8156-447b-a25e-81.description: This stylish, star-studded caper comedy stars Uma Thurman and Tim Roth as a con-artist couple cooking up a jewel-theft scam in LA to pay off a sexy, deadly British gangster.

crash-pad-3a3d1492-efae-46a4-975c-7eb961.title: Crash Pad
crash-pad-3a3d1492-efae-46a4-975c-7eb961.description: A man thinks he has found true love with an older woman until he finds out she is married and using him to get revenge on her husband.

daddys-home-2-d26b9299-a978-4cb8-b2fc-98.title: Daddy's Home 2
daddys-home-2-d26b9299-a978-4cb8-b2fc-98.description: When it comes to raising their kids, Dusty and Brad finally have this co-parenting thing down. That is, until Dusty's macho dad (Mel Gibson) and Brad's sweet-natured father (John Lithgow) come to town, throwing the whole family into complete chaos.

damsel-e048d040-f9c1-4500-99b2-203ec78f4.title: Damsel
damsel-e048d040-f9c1-4500-99b2-203ec78f4.description: Samuel Alabaster (Robert Pattinson), an affluent pioneer, ventures across the American Frontier to marry Penelope (Mia Wasikowska). As Samuel traverses the Wild West with a drunkard named Parson Henry (David Zellner), their once-simple journey grows treacherous.

dangerous-curves-386acc6c-7bc8-45e1-bfc8.title: Dangerous Curves
dangerous-curves-386acc6c-7bc8-45e1-bfc8.description: A young man charged with delivering a billionaire's Porsche takes an ill-advised side trip and winds up in deep trouble.

danny-roane-first-time-director-4056a68e.title: Danny Roane: First Time Director
danny-roane-first-time-director-4056a68e.description: After being blackballed from Hollywood because of his drunken antics, Danny Roane a washed up TV actor sobers up to direct his first feature film. As the pressure builds, Roane turns to the bottle again and attempts to finish his movie.

deck-the-halls-ea85d5a4-eb8d-4a70-94e4-f.title: Deck the Halls
deck-the-halls-ea85d5a4-eb8d-4a70-94e4-f.description: Holly (Gabrielle Carteris, Beverly Hills, 90210) returns to her hometown with her eight-year old son, Ben, to work for her father's toy business. Soon after, Ben watches a man (Steve Bacic, Big Love) move in next door with a sleigh, red suit, and lots of Christmas goodies. Ben begins to believe that their new neighbor is Santa Claus, and devises a plan to set up his mom with Santa Claus.

destiny-turns-on-the-radio-2a42d251-58a9.title: Destiny Turns on the Radio
destiny-turns-on-the-radio-2a42d251-58a9.description: Johnny Destiny burns into Las Vegas in his hot Dodge RoadRunner, stopping only to pick up a stranger stranded in the desert. But then, things aren't always as they seem.

disaster-movie-unrated-cc8cc1fb-6a46-411.title: Disaster Movie (Unrated)
disaster-movie-unrated-cc8cc1fb-6a46-411.description: "Disaster Movie" follows the comic misadventures of three buxom non-brainiacs during one fateful night as they try to make they way to safety while every known natural disaster and catastrophic event hits the city.

dog-days-1f227c43-e2dd-4f7b-87a9-7469ccc.title: Dog Days
dog-days-1f227c43-e2dd-4f7b-87a9-7469ccc.description: Dog Days is a hilarious and heartfelt comedy that follows the lives of multiple dog owners and their beloved fluffy pals around Los Angeles. When these human and canines’ paths start to intertwine, their lives begin changing in ways they never expected.

a-dogwalkers-christmas-tale-1d9b4524-fcb.title: A Dogwalker's Christmas Tale
a-dogwalkers-christmas-tale-1d9b4524-fcb.description: Luce is a reluctant dog walker this Christmas, but as she makes friends at the local dog park, including Dean, a handsome dog walker, she must take sides when her boss announces plans to bulldoze the park in the new year to build a spa.

downsizing-fa3aa03b-b165-40f2-9a72-19a57.title: Downsizing
downsizing-fa3aa03b-b165-40f2-9a72-19a57.description: When scientists find a way to shrink humans to five inches tall, Paul Safranek and his wife Audrey decide to ditch their stressed out lives in order to get small and live large in a luxurious downsized community.

drinking-buddies-ecc74afc-2e14-4e7e-839c.title: Drinking Buddies
drinking-buddies-ecc74afc-2e14-4e7e-839c.description: Although they're both dating other people, two co-workers (Olivia Wilde, Jake Johnson) hang out together in bars and try to ignore their mutual attraction.

drop-dead-sexy-2e939474-64d9-4c5e-ac28-2.title: Drop Dead Sexy
drop-dead-sexy-2e939474-64d9-4c5e-ac28-2.description: When a financial scam goes awry, a group of would-be criminals (Jason Lee, Crispin Glover) turns to kidnapping and blackmail.

earth-girls-are-easy-ddb15a00-0d51-4dac-.title: Earth Girls Are Easy
earth-girls-are-easy-ddb15a00-0d51-4dac-.description: Three furry, colorful aliens crash-land in L.A. and are introduced to American pop culture by a ditsy manicurist.

egg-94bb67ef-c67c-451d-96c0-465e2daba67e.title: Egg
egg-94bb67ef-c67c-451d-96c0-465e2daba67e.description: An unflinching comedy about why women choose motherhood, why they revere it, fear it, and why some women forgo it. Starring Christina Hendricks ("Mad Men"), Alysia Reiner ("Orange Is the New Black"), and Anna Camp (Pitch Perfect).

electric-love-825db452-e08e-44d0-976c-9e.title: Electric Love
electric-love-825db452-e08e-44d0-976c-9e.description: “Electric Love” follows four couples as they traverse the modern dating scene in Los Angeles utilizing popular dating apps like Tinder and Grindr.

elvira-mistress-of-the-dark-ad4e456a-eb7.title: Elvira: Mistress of the Dark
elvira-mistress-of-the-dark-ad4e456a-eb7.description: Cassandra Peterson stars in this sexy comedy hit, filled with wild wisecracks, campy chaos and scary movie spoofs.

the-escort-3b099a17-08de-42be-9543-fe4a5.title: The Escort
the-escort-3b099a17-08de-42be-9543-fe4a5.description: Desperate for a good story, a sex-addicted journalist throws himself into the world of high-class escorts when he starts following a Stanford-educated prostitute.

eves-christmas-cefd775a-2580-400c-9183-d.title: Eve's Christmas
eves-christmas-cefd775a-2580-400c-9183-d.description: On Christmas Eve, a high-powered executive's guardian angel offers her a chance to live her life again with a different spin.

faintheart-4746cd0a-7a5d-42f8-a21b-ac262.title: Faintheart
faintheart-4746cd0a-7a5d-42f8-a21b-ac262.description: In this hilarious British romantic comedy, a geeky father obsessed with battle re-enactments suddenly must discover the true meaning of chivalry.

a-fairly-odd-christmas-1f1754b2-74e5-43c.title: A Fairly Odd Christmas
a-fairly-odd-christmas-1f1754b2-74e5-43c.description: Santa's been hit in the head and thinks he's the Easter Bunny! To save Christmas, Timmy and the gang will have to journey through the North Pole, and face talking penguins and dangerous Ginger Bread Men, all without magic!

a-fairly-odd-movie-grow-up-timmy-turner-.title: A Fairly Odd Movie: Grow Up, Timmy Turner!
a-fairly-odd-movie-grow-up-timmy-turner-.description: Perpetual fifth-grader Timmy Turner, 23, has tried everything to stay a kid and keep his fairy Godparents. But will he grow up at last and save Dimmsdale, or will he stay a kid forever? Find out in A Fairly Odd Movie: Grow Up, Timmy Turner! Rating: TV-PG

a-fairly-odd-summer-d0d0bfe3-3423-42cf-9.title: A Fairly Odd Summer
a-fairly-odd-summer-d0d0bfe3-3423-42cf-9.description: When the source of all fairy magic, the Abracadabrium, accidentally falls into the wrong hands, it's up to Timmy, Tootie, Marty, and Mitzy to get it back and save the fairies in this live action Hawaiian adventure filled with lots of fairly odd madness!

the-female-brain-74387d4c-3eb2-47ee-9ed7.title: The Female Brain
the-female-brain-74387d4c-3eb2-47ee-9ed7.description: What makes a woman swipe right for Mr. Wrong? Sofía Vergara and Whitney Cummings star in this fresh, witty look at the science behind our romantic missteps.

fighting-with-my-family-65b529e8-e83e-40.title: Fighting with My Family
fighting-with-my-family-65b529e8-e83e-40.description: Former wrestler Ricky makes a living performing with his family. When they get the chance to audition for WWE, the family's dream seems to be coming true.  However, they find out that becoming a WWE Superstar demands more than they ever imagined possible.

finding-your-feet-7478b123-fc1c-4f7b-924.title: Finding Your Feet
finding-your-feet-7478b123-fc1c-4f7b-924.description: On the eve of retirement, a middle-class snob discovers her husband has been having an affair, and is forced to live with her bohemian sister on an impoverished inner-city estate.

flower-7cf34839-b00c-4c45-92e6-72680f723.title: Flower
flower-7cf34839-b00c-4c45-92e6-72680f723.description: A rebellious, quick-witted teenage girl (Zoey Deutch) living with her single mom (Kathryn Hahn) conspires with her troubled stepbrother to expose a high school teacher's (Adam Scott) dark secret.

freak-show-eb34b57a-04cb-4e3e-8dca-8709f.title: Freak Show
freak-show-eb34b57a-04cb-4e3e-8dca-8709f.description: Billy Bloom is talented, fierce and fearless but does he have what it takes to win homecoming queen? Bette Midler, Abigail Breslin star in this fabulous comedy.

friends-with-kids-090cc6cc-4075-4657-8ee.title: Friends With Kids
friends-with-kids-090cc6cc-4075-4657-8ee.description: In the wake of their friends' marriages and eventual offspring, longtime pals Julie (Jennifer Westfeldt) and Jason (Adam Scott) decide to have a child together without becoming a couple. By becoming "time-share" parents, they reason, they can experience the joys of parenthood without significantly curbing their personal freedom. However, when Julie and Jason both become involved with others, they discover that they secretly harbor romantic feelings for each other.

fun-in-acapulco-f69601d8-0064-4360-bf02-.title: Fun in Acapulco
fun-in-acapulco-f69601d8-0064-4360-bf02-.description: Fun In Acapulco portrays Elvis as a sexy lifeguard by day who transforms himself into a popular entertainer at night by singing at a local Mexican resort.

fun-with-dick-and-jane-29d0da11-d46e-4e7.title: Fun With Dick and Jane
fun-with-dick-and-jane-29d0da11-d46e-4e7.description: A rising business exec tells his wife to quit her job just when his company folds due to cooked books. As their debts mount, they become klutzy, yet successful criminals - now it's payback time!

furry-vengeance-446c40bb-c194-4e93-bad6-.title: Furry Vengeance
furry-vengeance-446c40bb-c194-4e93-bad6-.description: A developer building a subdivision in Oregon is opposed by a critter army.

gary-owen-i-agree-with-myself-6140dd13-f.title: Gary Owen: I Agree with Myself
gary-owen-i-agree-with-myself-6140dd13-f.description: Fearless and happy-go-lucky stand-up comedian Gary Owen flips every accepted, politically correct approach to family, race, gender and politics in his hilarious comedy special.

get-big-f47063df-650d-4ed9-bd85-a92ef2dc.title: Get Big
get-big-f47063df-650d-4ed9-bd85-a92ef2dc.description: "Get Big" follows the misadventures of two friends, Alec and Nate, as they reconnect to attend a high school classmate's wedding.

getting-grace-eb735d36-9c64-4660-96a3-9d.title: Getting Grace
getting-grace-eb735d36-9c64-4660-96a3-9d.description: Grace, a teenage girl dying of cancer, crashes a funeral home to find out what will happen to her after she dies, but ends up teaching awkward funeral director Bill how to celebrate life.

gilbert-gottfried-dirty-jokes-49063898-e.title: Gilbert Gottfried: Dirty Jokes
gilbert-gottfried-dirty-jokes-49063898-e.description: Recorded live in New York City, Gilbert Gottfried at his most shocking and hilarious!  Definitely not for children ... may even be unsuitable for adults!

girl-in-progress-5a4d2a84-8cc3-4a2d-9e42.title: Girl in Progress
girl-in-progress-5a4d2a84-8cc3-4a2d-9e42.description: Grace (Eva Mendes) is a single mom. She is too busy juggling work, bills, and the very married Dr. Hartford (Matthew Modine), to give her daughter, Ansiedad (Cierra Ramirez) the attention she desperately needs.

girl-most-likely-c7d84f48-adff-44b8-b108.title: Girl Most Likely
girl-most-likely-c7d84f48-adff-44b8-b108.description: Imogene is a failed New York playwright awkwardly navigating the transition from Next Big Thing to Last Year's News. After both her career and relationship hit the skids, she's forced to make the humiliating move back home.

girlfriends-of-christmas-past-7bd7b35b-8.title: Girlfriends of Christmas Past
girlfriends-of-christmas-past-7bd7b35b-8.description: Expecting a proposal, Livvy gets dumped instead. She finds two more women her ex wronged and the trio decide on payback. Meanwhile, Livvy meets Carter and sparks begin to fly. Can she forget about revenge and let a Christmas romance bloom?

girls-just-want-to-have-fun-246b9130-abb.title: Girls Just Want to Have Fun
girls-just-want-to-have-fun-246b9130-abb.description: Sarah Jessica Parker, Helen Hunt and Shannen Doherty star in the outrageous '80s comedy hit that's totally packed with outrageous '80s fashions, music, dance moves, and more!

girls-girls-girls-8edd8973-0552-4ffa-989.title: Girls! Girls! Girls!
girls-girls-girls-8edd8973-0552-4ffa-989.description: Fishing boat captain, popular with the ladies, sings at night to earn enough to buy his own boat.

the-good-guy-f0b05dc0-cc28-4b2f-8ea4-7f0.title: The Good Guy
the-good-guy-f0b05dc0-cc28-4b2f-8ea4-7f0.description: The girlfriend of a hotshot Wall Street trader finds herself falling for his protege.

a-good-old-fashioned-orgy-fca0293e-3da9-.title: A Good Old Fashioned Orgy
a-good-old-fashioned-orgy-fca0293e-3da9-.description: In this outrageous comedy, a group of thirtysomethings who have been friends since high school and are known for throwing lavish parties decide to arrange an orgy in an effort to hold on to their dwindling youth.

good-time-max-4e684068-ddb2-4c0d-b51a-42.title: Good Time Max
good-time-max-4e684068-ddb2-4c0d-b51a-42.description: Not exactly cut out for a desk job, Max converts his co-workers into meth-heads and party hounds in this hilarious comedy from the tripped-out mind of James Franco.

grabbers-61bd939d-96ec-4748-a39c-076a132.title: Grabbers
grabbers-61bd939d-96ec-4748-a39c-076a132.description: In this comic sci-fi thriller, the inhabitants of a small island discover they must get drunk in order to survive an invasion of bloodsucking aliens.

greener-grass-dc44128f-3f72-4a53-9fce-47.title: Greener Grass
greener-grass-dc44128f-3f72-4a53-9fce-47.description: Suburbia has never been so hilariously absurd as it is in GREENER GRASS – where one eccentric housewife is driven mad by her eagerness to please. SNL's Beck Bennett co-stars.

half-magic-244e673b-9c17-4d97-9038-f8c95.title: Half Magic
half-magic-244e673b-9c17-4d97-9038-f8c95.description: Three women use their newly formed sisterhood to fight against sexism, bad relationships and low self-esteem. Through embracing their wild adventures, they learn the secret to ultimate fulfillment.

happy-accidents-6ccee05d-deab-4678-81db-.title: Happy Accidents
happy-accidents-6ccee05d-deab-4678-81db-.description: A young woman finds love and happiness until her new boyfriend announces he is from the year 2470. Marisa Tomei and Vincent D'Onofrio star.

hearts-beat-loud-cef998af-9aa4-4d76-b8f8.title: Hearts Beat Loud
hearts-beat-loud-cef998af-9aa4-4d76-b8f8.description: In Red Hook, Brooklyn, a father and daughter become an unlikely songwriting duo in the last summer before she leaves for college.

hello-i-must-be-going-fa6eda24-ce5d-4c25.title: Hello I Must Be Going
hello-i-must-be-going-fa6eda24-ce5d-4c25.description: A divorcee (Melanie Lynskey) moves back in with her parents and begins a clandestine affair with a 19-year-old suitor (Christopher Abbott).

high-rise-c9903a98-112e-48f3-a31e-4afcd4.title: High-Rise
high-rise-c9903a98-112e-48f3-a31e-4afcd4.description: Tom Hiddleston stars as Dr. Robert Laing, the newest resident of a luxurious apartment in a high-tech skyscraper whose lofty location places him amongst society's upper class. Laing quickly settles in and meets the other tenants: Charlotte (Sienna Miller), a bohemian single mother; Wilder (Luke Evans), a charismatic documentarian who lives with his pregnant wife Helen (Elisabeth Moss); and Mr. Royal (Jeremy Irons), the buildings enigmatic architect. Life seems like paradise to the solitude-seeking Laing. But, as power outages become more frequent and building flaws emerge, mainly on the lower floors, social strata begins to crumble and the building descends into a class war.

his-and-her-christmas-060c0b40-e097-45e3.title: His and Her Christmas
his-and-her-christmas-060c0b40-e097-45e3.description: A chance meeting between rival newspaper journalists with rival Christmas columns is an epic disaster--and maybe love at first sight.

hitch-5fccd7b5-b39c-4223-a65b-10ea753ffc.title: Hitch
hitch-5fccd7b5-b39c-4223-a65b-10ea753ffc.description: A New York man has a secret identity moonlighting as a dating doctor who specializes in planning dates for lovesick men.  He, himself, is adrift to the wonders of love until he meets and falls in love with a tabloid journalist who seeks his services in order to expose the doc as a scam artist, which jeopardizes uncovering his secret identity, until she finds out things about him as well as herself.

hollys-holiday-d66b1082-147c-491c-a47c-7.title: Holly's Holiday
hollys-holiday-d66b1082-147c-491c-a47c-7.description: Holly Maddux longs for a man like the mannequin in a nearby store. After she slips and hits her head, she wakes to a perfect gentleman by her side. Holly hits it off with her new man but must choose between the perfect life and real love.

i-love-you-both-2f7bd87a-1a62-4c80-b9e3-.title: I Love You Both
i-love-you-both-2f7bd87a-1a62-4c80-b9e3-.description: A pair of co-dependent twins (Doug Archibald and Kristin Archibald) are charmed by the same guy (Lucas Neff) at a party. When they both start dating him, they must figure out which of them he likes better without upsetting their brother-sister bond.

i-tonya-f5636efa-9f93-453c-b3a7-e7b377c0.title: I, Tonya
i-tonya-f5636efa-9f93-453c-b3a7-e7b377c0.description: Based on the unbelievable but true events, I, Tonya is a dark comedic tale of American figure skater, Tonya Harding, and one of the most sensational scandals in sports history.

in-a-relationship-10541b3d-1aa7-46ed-ac0.title: In a Relationship
in-a-relationship-10541b3d-1aa7-46ed-ac0.description: Owen and Hallie have been together for years, but when Owen wavers on Hallie’s proposition to move in together, they make the rash decision to call it quits.

ingrid-goes-west-08e5e1c7-3cb4-41e8-b80f.title: Ingrid Goes West
ingrid-goes-west-08e5e1c7-3cb4-41e8-b80f.description: Ingrid (Plaza) is an unstable young woman who secretly moves to LA to befriend Taylor (Olsen) — a woman with a fabulous boyfriend, a cute terrier, and a ton of online followers. Ingrid's plan is threatened when Taylor’s brother arrives in town.

instant-family-a1e6fb9c-2e75-4455-afd6-9.title: Instant Family
instant-family-a1e6fb9c-2e75-4455-afd6-9.description: A couple who decides to start a family and adopt through the foster-care system, find themselves raising three wild kids who have no interest in being parented.

the-interview-9e8cb163-3f38-494b-bf6a-09.title: The Interview
the-interview-9e8cb163-3f38-494b-bf6a-09.description: Dave Skylark and producer Aaron Rapoport run the celebrity tabloid show "Skylark Tonight." When they land an interview with a surprise fan, North Korean dictator Kim Jong-un, they are recruited by the CIA.

its-a-disaster-709a417a-0d50-4c4c-8ab0-1.title: It's a Disaster
its-a-disaster-709a417a-0d50-4c4c-8ab0-1.description: After gathering for Sunday brunch at one of their homes, four couples realize they are stranded together as the world may be coming to an end during an apocalyptic crisis. Nevertheless, they continue to deal with their various relationship issues.

joshy-cf3b552a-dc63-4f9e-a471-31bafed20b.title: Joshy
joshy-cf3b552a-dc63-4f9e-a471-31bafed20b.description: Joshy and his friends turn a getaway into a weekend of debauchery in this wickedly amusing portrayal of male bonding and emotional incompetence.

juliet-naked-b73f843c-dec5-416b-bb4a-887.title: Juliet, Naked
juliet-naked-b73f843c-dec5-416b-bb4a-887.description: Annie (the long-suffering girlfriend of Duncan) develops an unlikely transatlantic romance with the once admired, now washed up, singer-songwriter, Tucker Crowe, who also happens to be the subject of Duncan's musical obsession.

kirk-camerons-saving-christmas-9285a16e-.title: Kirk Cameron's Saving Christmas
kirk-camerons-saving-christmas-9285a16e-.description: Kirk Cameron's Saving Christmas is a story that provides a biblical basis for our time-honored celebrations and the inspiration to stand strongly against a culture that wants to eliminate the faith elements of the holy season

the-last-word-5686117d-b64b-4286-9698-0e.title: The Last Word
the-last-word-5686117d-b64b-4286-9698-0e.description: Harriet is a retired businesswoman who tries to control everything around her. When she decides to write her own obituary, a young journalist takes up the task of finding out the truth, resulting in a life-altering friendship.

the-layover-3f5186d2-4029-4474-a077-5e55.title: The Layover
the-layover-3f5186d2-4029-4474-a077-5e55.description: Best friends Kate Upton and Alexandra Daddario turn on each other while competing for a hunky fireman in this comedy.

leap-year-44e1b023-61fb-4a50-b539-7293bd.title: Leap Year
leap-year-44e1b023-61fb-4a50-b539-7293bd.description: Amy Adams and Matthew Goode star in Leap Year, a romantic comedy that follows one woman’s determined quest to get married to the perfect guy…despite what fate has in store for her.

lemon-2b999e7a-5702-4e3a-aecf-e45e980d15.title: Lemon
lemon-2b999e7a-5702-4e3a-aecf-e45e980d15.description: Lemon: a person or thing that proves to be defective, imperfect, or unsatisfactory. Isaac Lachmann is a lemon. His career is going nowhere. His girlfriend of ten years is leaving him. Isaac Lachmann now just watches as his life unravels.

let-the-sunshine-in-9d3ebde1-4ac1-496c-8.title: Let the Sunshine In
let-the-sunshine-in-9d3ebde1-4ac1-496c-8.description: Juliette Binoche and Gerard Depardieu star in this charming romantic comedy about a woman looking for love in all the wrong places.

lewis-black-old-yeller-live-at-the-borga.title: Lewis Black: Old Yeller - Live at the Borgata
lewis-black-old-yeller-live-at-the-borga.description: Lewis Black takes what makes us crazy and makes it funny. It's a night of live comedy you won't forget... but if you do, it's probably because you're taking a drug that lowers your cholesterol.

life-partners-f093f4a1-5f73-4e05-ae01-f0.title: Life Partners
life-partners-f093f4a1-5f73-4e05-ae01-f0.description: A 29-year-old lawyer (Gillian Jacobs) and her lesbian best friend (Leighton Meester) experience a dramatic shift in their longtime bond after one enters a serious relationship.

literally-right-before-aaron-95a8068a-f2.title: Literally, Right Before Aaron
literally-right-before-aaron-95a8068a-f2.description: Adam (Justin Long) is definitely still in love with his ex (Cobie Smulders). So when he shows up at her wedding to prove that he's moved on, a series of funny and awkward encounters only confirms he's more in love with her than ever.

the-little-death-abf1ccb0-d673-4492-8340.title: The Little Death
the-little-death-abf1ccb0-d673-4492-8340.description: A game of sexual role-playing convinces a man that he wants to become a full-time actor, in one of several stories of suburbanites exploring erotic fetishes.

little-monsters-1110bd42-c856-4ba3-8093-.title: Little Monsters
little-monsters-1110bd42-c856-4ba3-8093-.description: A film dedicated to all the kindergarten teachers who motivate children to learn, instill them with confidence and stop them from being devoured by zombies.

looking-for-eric-74254cc2-1184-44a2-aeb2.title: Looking for Eric
looking-for-eric-74254cc2-1184-44a2-aeb2.description: A British mailman gets relationship advice from soccer star Eric Cantona.

lost-in-london-d24d9270-3a19-4972-83af-5.title: Lost in London
lost-in-london-d24d9270-3a19-4972-83af-5.description: A comedy that draws a new line between real and surreal, Woody Harrelson takes a live misadventure through London for an honest look at fame, family, and faith.

lowlife-aa89a471-367b-4858-a334-7c900afd.title: Lowlife
lowlife-aa89a471-367b-4858-a334-7c900afd.description: The lives of a luchador, an ex-con and an addict collide when an organ harvesting scheme goes awry.

lucky-2017-fb72ac50-d007-447f-a6e9-f6fb2.title: Lucky (2017)
lucky-2017-fb72ac50-d007-447f-a6e9-f6fb2.description: Having out lived and out smoked all of his contemporaries, the fiercely independent Lucky finds himself at the precipice of life, thrust into a journey of self-exploration, leading towards that which is so often unattainable: enlightenment

a-madea-family-funeral-0377d9a0-dfc3-45e.title: A Madea Family Funeral
a-madea-family-funeral-0377d9a0-dfc3-45e.description: Tyler Perry steps into the role of the hilarious matriarch Madea for the last time!

madeas-big-happy-family-8f7f28e8-04e7-42.title: Madea's Big Happy Family
madeas-big-happy-family-8f7f28e8-04e7-42.description: When Shirley receives distressing news about her health, it's up to her Aunt Madea to gather the clan and make things right the only way she knows how: with tough love and laughter.

madeas-witness-protection-77b31e79-e5ba-.title: Madea's Witness Protection
madeas-witness-protection-77b31e79-e5ba-.description: A Wall Street investment banker has been set up in a Ponzi scheme, forcing him to be put under witness protection with his family in Madea's house.

major-league-ii-96d80762-8a27-40e1-9c79-.title: Major League II
major-league-ii-96d80762-8a27-40e1-9c79-.description: The Indians are now a World Series contender. But last year's hunger is now replaced with complacency, and bad decisions by the new owner threaten to tear the team apart.

the-march-sisters-at-christmas-d2f8a175-.title: The March Sisters at Christmas
the-march-sisters-at-christmas-d2f8a175-.description: A modern retelling of Louisa May Alcott's "Little Women" follows four sisters who learn their mother plans on selling their home after the holidays. In an effort to keep the family together, the sisters try to restore the house.

married-by-christmas-16c707f3-9df5-4970-.title: Married by Christmas
married-by-christmas-16c707f3-9df5-4970-.description: Carrie and Katie realize their family’s company will be inherited by the first sister to marry. With Katie’s Christmas Eve wedding already planned, workaholic Carrie sets out to elope before it’s too late.

mash-bcbd5f72-f904-47b1-9cf7-41858aba5e4.title: MASH
mash-bcbd5f72-f904-47b1-9cf7-41858aba5e4.description: Two screwball Army surgeons stitch together casualties while keeping each other in stitches during the Korean war.

the-massively-mixed-up-middle-school-mys.title: The Massively Mixed-Up Middle School Mystery
the-massively-mixed-up-middle-school-mys.description: If it's a middle school puzzle you need cracked, look no further than the sports shed where the Junior Eye Detective Agency's got you covered. Everett, Alyssa, and Riley explore the ins and outs of their bizarre middle school.  Rating: TV-PG

measure-of-a-man-70a1a8cc-ad70-4eee-994f.title: Measure of a Man
measure-of-a-man-70a1a8cc-ad70-4eee-994f.description: A bullied teen experiences a turning point summer in which he learns to stand up for himself.

meet-wally-sparks-6a4d650a-79e9-40ad-84f.title: Meet Wally Sparks
meet-wally-sparks-6a4d650a-79e9-40ad-84f.description: WALLY SPARKS! Love him, hate him, just tune in! And millions do. But when advertisers and the FCC begin complaining about Wally's outrageous antics, the network president (Burt Reynolds) gives Wally an ultimatum.

the-men-who-stare-at-goats-5be13037-8a67.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
the-men-who-stare-at-goats-5be13037-8a67.description: In this quirky dark comedy inspired by a real-life story, astonishing revelations about a top-secret wing of the U.S. military come to light when a reporter encounters an enigmatic Special Forces operator on a mind-boggling mission.

middle-men-9e80d5f5-db55-4cbb-b460-fea22.title: Middle Men
middle-men-9e80d5f5-db55-4cbb-b460-fea22.description: Businessman Jack Harris had the perfect life - a beautiful family and a successful career fixing problem companies. When Jack agrees to help steer two entrepreneurs business, he soon finds himself caught between a 23-year-old porn star and the FBI.

middle-of-nowhere-6418725d-f8ce-4fd9-875.title: Middle of Nowhere
middle-of-nowhere-6418725d-f8ce-4fd9-875.description: A restless troublemaking teenager falls for a tightly wound co-worker as they team up to earn big money and escape their families.

mister-america-c659f88e-6b64-4cf1-baba-3.title: Mister America
mister-america-c659f88e-6b64-4cf1-baba-3.description: Mister America follows Tim Heidecker's misguided attempt to enter the world of politics. After winning a controversial court case, he launches a campaign for San Bernardino District Attorney despite a complete lack of experience.

monsters-at-large-99eb02a2-cf13-41f2-8fb.title: Monsters at Large
monsters-at-large-99eb02a2-cf13-41f2-8fb.description: In this spooky family comedy, a teen task force that fights imaginary monsters finds itself face to face with the real thing. But you’ll be laughing too hard to be scared!

morning-glory-1ef8bd7e-d35d-41ef-8a8f-9f.title: Morning Glory
morning-glory-1ef8bd7e-d35d-41ef-8a8f-9f.description: An upstart television producer accepts the challenge of reviving a struggling morning show program with warring co-hosts.

most-likely-to-murder-4d3814c4-6ec4-4650.title: Most Likely to Murder
most-likely-to-murder-4d3814c4-6ec4-4650.description: When a former high school hero returns home to find no one cares about him anymore he becomes obsessed with solving a mysterious local death to prove he’s still cool.

music-from-another-room-0f9de4f3-064c-49.title: Music From Another Room
music-from-another-room-0f9de4f3-064c-49.description: A romantic comedy that follows the exploits of Danny, a young man who grew up believing he was destined to marry the girl he helped deliver as a five year old boy when his neighbor went into emergency labor.

my-best-friends-wedding-b84b39cb-2031-4a.title: My Best Friend's Wedding
my-best-friends-wedding-b84b39cb-2031-4a.description: A writer realizes that she is in love with her best friend and tries to stop him from marrying another woman, a guileless heiress.

my-dad-is-scrooge-f2ec5546-7963-4027-892.title: My Dad is Scrooge
my-dad-is-scrooge-f2ec5546-7963-4027-892.description: The animals of Woodsley Farm help Oliver and his little sister shock their Dad into embracing the holiday spirit while trying to save the farm.

my-santa-d5cf235f-5a6f-4e01-9b47-08f1bd5.title: My Santa
my-santa-d5cf235f-5a6f-4e01-9b47-08f1bd5.description: Single mother Jen dislikes the holidays, but she starts to rediscover the magic of Christmas after meeting a handsome mall Santa, Chris. Jen is unaware that Chris is actually the son of the real Santa, on a mission to find his Mrs. Claus.

mystery-team-034316a7-d903-4103-884e-cb9.title: Mystery Team
mystery-team-034316a7-d903-4103-884e-cb9.description: At age 7, pint-sized sleuths Jason, Duncan and Charlie solved all manner of kiddie mysteries in Oakdale. Now, at 18, the Mystery Team is about to leave their Encyclopedia Brown-style tactics in the dust with their latest case: a real murder.

the-myth-of-the-american-sleepover-78b14.title: The Myth of the American Sleepover
the-myth-of-the-american-sleepover-78b14.description: A gang of high-school students spend a decadent night full of sex, drugs and bad behavior.

national-lampoons-dirty-movie-37a7ebaf-d.title: National Lampoon's Dirty Movie
national-lampoons-dirty-movie-37a7ebaf-d.description: An outrageous cut-rate producer, Charlie LaRue (Christopher Meloni) is about to fulfill his lifelong dream to make a movie about the most offensive, dirtiest jokes ever told.

national-lampoons-dorm-daze-2-college-at.title: National Lampoon's Dorm Daze 2: College at Sea
national-lampoons-dorm-daze-2-college-at.description: This time the turf hits the surf as the students of Billingsley U ditch campus life for fun, sun and high times on the high seas.

naughty-nice-ba2ec049-0dbf-4e4e-9c8a-df0.title: Naughty & Nice
naughty-nice-ba2ec049-0dbf-4e4e-9c8a-df0.description: When a cynical Los Angeles DJ is exiled to a quaint mountain town for the holiday season, the small-town charm and holiday cheer—not to mention his pretty new co-host—begin to melt his icy demeanor.

no-strings-attached-95234d78-653a-4991-a.title: No Strings Attached
no-strings-attached-95234d78-653a-4991-a.description: A guy and girl try to keep their relationship strictly physical, but it's not long before they learn that they want something more.

nobodys-fool-425b7e3f-2a5d-447a-b0f7-42b.title: Nobody's Fool
nobodys-fool-425b7e3f-2a5d-447a-b0f7-42b.description: A woman is released from prison and reunites with her sister. She soon discovers that her sister is in an online relationship with a man who may not be what he seems.

non-fiction-22816e33-7d74-413e-9e64-362f.title: Non-Fiction
non-fiction-22816e33-7d74-413e-9e64-362f.description: Juliette Binoche and Guillame Canet star in this witty, seductive tale of sex, lies, and literature from acclaimed director Olivier Assayas (Personal Shopper, Carlos).

the-oath-d43e04d3-14ec-41e4-9c86-abd87ca.title: The Oath
the-oath-d43e04d3-14ec-41e4-9c86-abd87ca.description: A controversial White House policy turns family member against family member in a savagely funny dark comedy about surviving life and Thanksgiving in the age of political tribalism.

the-oath-en-espanol-8ebe3211-66b2-4082-b.title: The Oath en Espanol
the-oath-en-espanol-8ebe3211-66b2-4082-b.description: Una polémica ley de la Casa Blanca produce un enfrentamiento politico entre los miembros de una misma familia en una salvaje y divertida comedia de humor negro, enseñándonos cómo sobrevivir el Día de Acción de Gracias en la era del tribalismo político.

odd-thomas-e950353a-a37b-45c4-a53e-8c93d.title: Odd Thomas
odd-thomas-e950353a-a37b-45c4-a53e-8c93d.description: Small-town fry cook Odd Thomas (Anton Yelchin) is an ordinary guy with a paranormal secret: he sees dead people, everywhere.

oh-lucy-5ba8483e-bca7-4695-9043-72deda65.title: Oh Lucy!
oh-lucy-5ba8483e-bca7-4695-9043-72deda65.description: Stagnating in late middle age, a Tokyo ‘office lady’ discovers her alter ego in an English class, sending her on a comedic odyssey through desire, passion, betrayal, and ultimately the open freeways of Southern California.

overboard-4e91d5ff-47cd-49e0-bb85-f489d6.title: Overboard
overboard-4e91d5ff-47cd-49e0-bb85-f489d6.description: A selfish, rich playboy, Leonardo, fires a hard-working single mother, Kate, hired to clean his yacht. After getting amnesia Kate convinces him he is her husband as payback and puts him to work.

the-overbrook-brothers-fef4f7ad-ae1c-48c.title: The Overbrook Brothers
the-overbrook-brothers-fef4f7ad-ae1c-48c.description: After uncovering a long-buried secret on Christmas Eve, two brothers embark on a hilarious mad-cap cross-country journey to discover the surprising truth about their past.

the-overnight-174619b3-08c1-47bd-885a-69.title: The Overnight
the-overnight-174619b3-08c1-47bd-885a-69.description: Alex (Adam Scott), Emily (Taylor Schilling) and their son RJ are new to LA. A chance meeting introduces them to the mysterious Kurt (Jason Schwartzman), Charlotte and Max. A family "playdate" becomes increasingly interesting as the night goes on.

the-party-5dc58fdc-db6f-4545-882e-b952f3.title: The Party
the-party-5dc58fdc-db6f-4545-882e-b952f3.description: "Deliciously wicked fun" ensues when a group of friends get together to discover secrets, sex & lies.

the-partys-just-beginning-8b6cf39b-e053-.title: The Party's Just Beginning
the-partys-just-beginning-8b6cf39b-e053-.description: A surreal coming of age story told from the perspective of a young Scottish woman (Karen Gillan) trying to cope with the suicide of her best friend and struggling to confront what's truly haunting her.

passport-to-paris-80547b06-1398-4060-a87.title: Passport to Paris
passport-to-paris-80547b06-1398-4060-a87.description: Eager to see Paris but tired of their chaperon, identical twins (Ashley Olsen, Mary-Kate Olsen) tour France with two French teenagers.

the-patsy-259598a9-fae3-453c-b686-cf2b63.title: The Patsy
the-patsy-259598a9-fae3-453c-b686-cf2b63.description: When a star comedian dies, his comedy team, decides to train a nobody to fill the shoes of the Star in a big TV show. They decide to choose a bellboy who can't do anything right. The big TV show is getting closer, and the bellboy gets worse all the time.

periods-e55ca057-fd6a-4b77-b762-b5d4cec9.title: Periods
periods-e55ca057-fd6a-4b77-b762-b5d4cec9.description: Featuring Zachary Quinto (Star Trek 2, Margin Call), Penn Badgley (Easy A, Gossip Girl), Willie Garson (White Collar), and youtube star Grace Helbig, this raucous comedy chronicles the historical journey from the big bang to the end of humanity.

permanent-12a52012-5cd7-4b25-940e-d548a9.title: Permanent
permanent-12a52012-5cd7-4b25-940e-d548a9.description: Set in 1982, Permanent centers around the newly relocated Dickson family. In this hilariously awkward story the Dicksons are struggling through major life changes together all the while trying desperately to emerge intact on the other side.

person-to-person-e80fcad1-aa13-4f22-9116.title: Person to Person
person-to-person-e80fcad1-aa13-4f22-9116.description: A record collector and his roommate, a teenager and her best friend, and a rookie reporter and her metal-head supervisor. A day in the life of an eclectic group of New Yorkers. Starring Abbi Jacobson, Michael Cera, Tavi Gevinson and more.

the-pink-panther-2-e7a764ef-1c0f-4628-ba.title: The Pink Panther 2
the-pink-panther-2-e7a764ef-1c0f-4628-ba.description: Insp. Jacques Clouseau teams up with a squad of International detectives who are just as bumbling as he is. Their mission: Stop a globe-trotting thief who specializes in stealing historical artifacts.

playin-for-love-6cec4c57-405b-44f5-ae8c-.title: Playin' For Love
playin-for-love-6cec4c57-405b-44f5-ae8c-.description: Coach Banks is used to calling all the shots on and off the court. But that's about to change when he meets Talisa McCoy, a single mom, with her own ideas on a winning team.and the perfect man.

playing-it-cool-be24631b-6271-48cf-8d05-.title: Playing It Cool
playing-it-cool-be24631b-6271-48cf-8d05-.description: A young man meets and instantly falls in love with an engaged woman.

please-stand-by-7544fe5e-eaf6-4dd0-9004-.title: Please Stand By
please-stand-by-7544fe5e-eaf6-4dd0-9004-.description: Dakota Fanning stars as a woman who escapes a group home hoping to get her Star Trek script produced in Hollywood. On the way she must conquer a new world full of challenges. Also starring Toni Collette and Patton Oswalt.

plus-one-75af256b-c89f-4028-9d1b-500e600.title: Plus One
plus-one-75af256b-c89f-4028-9d1b-500e600.description: Long-time friends Alice and Ben agree to be one another’s plus ones as they power through an endless parade of insufferable weddings.

the-pom-pom-girls-9fbeea3d-8614-4c7c-8b8.title: The Pom Pom Girls
the-pom-pom-girls-9fbeea3d-8614-4c7c-8b8.description: High-school seniors try to score on and off the field in this raunchy teen comedy set in the 1970’s.

puzzle-37e998fe-96ce-496a-b850-3de3d1740.title: Puzzle
puzzle-37e998fe-96ce-496a-b850-3de3d1740.description: In this delightful and charming comedy, a frustrated housewife who longs for escape finds true bliss when she discovers a passion for puzzles.

rags-fe74310f-3b3b-4f1c-be8e-ed9ba5e7567.title: Rags
rags-fe74310f-3b3b-4f1c-be8e-ed9ba5e7567.description: A boy Cinderella story with a hip-hop attitude. Charlie is a teenager with dreams of leaving his life sweeping floors for music stardom. Kadee Worth is at the top of the charts, but is caged by her record executive father. Rating: TV-G

the-ramen-girl-6e7e6e43-3c30-437d-89e5-0.title: The Ramen Girl
the-ramen-girl-6e7e6e43-3c30-437d-89e5-0.description: An American girl abandoned by her boyfriend in Tokyo finds her calling in an unlikely place: a local ramen house. Run by a tyrannical chef who doesn't speak a word of English. Abby learns how to put passion and spirit into her life as well as her cooking.

random-tropical-paradise-cd4a0e15-2afc-4.title: Random Tropical Paradise
random-tropical-paradise-cd4a0e15-2afc-4.description: Harry Fluder's (Bryan Greenberg) life was working out exactly as planned: great job, loyal friends, and the perfect fiancee - until he caught his perfect fiancee having sex with one of his loyal friends at their wedding. With the wedding cancelled and honeymoon already paid for, Bowie (Brooks Whelan), Harry's best man, convinces Harry to take him along on a "homie-moon." What is supposed to be a refreshing weekend of rest and relaxation turns into an all-out bonkers adventure of epic proportions of sex, drugs, and mafia intrigue. Kyle Kinane, Spencer Grammer, Joe Pantoliano, Brittany Furlan and more round out this madcap comedy's stellar cast.

reality-6d1efa13-aaf0-40ef-bad9-579ac815.title: Reality
reality-6d1efa13-aaf0-40ef-bad9-579ac815.description: Napoleon Dynamite's Jon Heder stars in this wonderfully weird and hilarious Hollywood satire, featuring a mysterious VHS tape, killer TVs and a giant rat.

red-dog-true-blue-3fa413bf-7a25-4de5-a8a.title: Red Dog: True Blue
red-dog-true-blue-3fa413bf-7a25-4de5-a8a.description: When eleven-year-old Mick is shipped off to his grandfather's cattle station in the remote Pilbara region of Western Australia, he prepares himself for a life of dull hardship

the-relationtrip-90f61149-ba23-41fe-8bb0.title: The Relationtrip
the-relationtrip-90f61149-ba23-41fe-8bb0.description: As everyone around them is finding love, Beck and Liam are emotionally hibernating through adulthood. After bonding over their mutual disinterest in relationships, they go away together on a 'friend' trip. And that's when things get weird.

results-10fceca4-b4c8-435b-83d9-99abb0d4.title: Results
results-10fceca4-b4c8-435b-83d9-99abb0d4.description: Personal trainers (Cobie Smulders and Guy Pearce) are tasked with getting a newly wealthy and highly unmotivated client (Kevin Corrigan) into shape in this smart and funny comedy about love and fitness.

robo-dog-05d4da78-1781-48a9-9511-4627dfd.title: Robo-Dog
robo-dog-05d4da78-1781-48a9-9511-4627dfd.description: Tom Austin creates the most incredible canine the world has ever seen! But Tom's ex-boss Mr. Willis, finds out that Robo-Dog is powered by a technologically advanced super battery, and he plots to steal it for himself.

robo-dog-airborne-05f93870-54c8-4b38-b75.title: Robo-Dog: Airborne
robo-dog-airborne-05f93870-54c8-4b38-b75.description: When a cool, cuddly, robotic dog runs off and has his memory chip erased, a clever boy and genius creator-dad must track down the perfect pooch and bring him home.

rodeo-juliet-6e922bd4-a007-4541-9b1d-2c7.title: Rodeo & Juliet
rodeo-juliet-6e922bd4-a007-4541-9b1d-2c7.description: A city girl is forced to go to the country where she meets a special horse and a young cowboy who teaaches her to barrel race while her mother reconnects with her former fiancé.

the-romantics-47fce37f-94cc-4366-aab5-a9.title: The Romantics
the-romantics-47fce37f-94cc-4366-aab5-a9.description: Seven close friends reunite for the wedding of two of their friends. Problems arise because the bride and the maid of honor have had a long rivalry over the groom.

ron-white-a-little-unprofessional-5901fd.title: Ron White: A Little Unprofessional
ron-white-a-little-unprofessional-5901fd.description: Ron White delivers more than an hour of all new material with his signature, irreverent storytelling style and the best comedic timing in the business.

rosy-7896ccc9-9701-4db3-ba53-50fe0653570.title: Rosy
rosy-7896ccc9-9701-4db3-ba53-50fe0653570.description: A socially awkward man kidnaps an aspiring actress so she can get to know him, but he soon gets much more than he bargained for.

sabrina-down-under-46ccf3bb-9734-482c-80.title: Sabrina Down Under
sabrina-down-under-46ccf3bb-9734-482c-80.description: Sabrina aspires to learn about marine biology; when she discovers that the island's marine mammals are falling ill, including a handsome merman and his mermaid sister, she takes up an ecological cause on behalf of all of the inhabitants of the sea.

saint-ec040a0b-827f-42bd-8d8b-56246484bd.title: Saint
saint-ec040a0b-827f-42bd-8d8b-56246484bd.description: A horror-Comedy that puts a dark twist on the legend of St Nicholas, a murderous Santa Claus with claws goes on a rampage under the December 5th full moon.

say-anything-afff461b-164d-4132-bb73-6b5.title: Say Anything...
say-anything-afff461b-164d-4132-bb73-6b5.description: John Cusack stars as an aimless high-school graduate who tries to win the hand of the class brain in this teen classic.

second-chance-christmas-d11935a7-1d09-45.title: Second Chance Christmas
second-chance-christmas-d11935a7-1d09-45.description: A woman’s husband uses her memory loss as a chance to make her fall in love with him again at Christmas.

sex-guaranteed-896b8bc7-06f6-4e3f-82ec-8.title: Sex, Guaranteed
sex-guaranteed-896b8bc7-06f6-4e3f-82ec-8.description: Kevin has sworn off sex to win back his former fiancé when he meets a beautiful escort named Zade. Over the course of a legendary party, Zade just might provide the spark that this heartbroken idealist needs to turn his life around.

shriek-if-you-know-what-i-did-last-frida.title: Shriek If You Know What I Did Last Friday The 13th
shriek-if-you-know-what-i-did-last-frida.description: In every horror movie, there is a phone waiting to ring...a victim waiting to scream and a killer waiting to strike. And the only way to survive is to stay one step ahead of the killer...even if the killer's a klutz!

a-simple-favor-8dd2698c-6c5f-40dc-bceb-9.title: A Simple Favor
a-simple-favor-8dd2698c-6c5f-40dc-bceb-9.description: "A Simple Favor," directed by Paul Feig, centers around Stephanie (Anna Kendrick), a mommy vlogger who seeks to uncover the truth behind her best friend Emily's (Blake Lively) disappearance.

the-sisters-brothers-63a014b2-9980-457a-.title: The Sisters Brothers
the-sisters-brothers-63a014b2-9980-457a-.description: Based on Patrick Dewitt’s acclaimed novel, Eli and Charlie Sisters are hired to kill a prospector who has stolen from their boss. The story, a genre-hybrid with comedic elements, takes place in Oregon in 1851.

the-skeleton-twins-94eebca4-0289-4f41-bf.title: The Skeleton Twins
the-skeleton-twins-94eebca4-0289-4f41-bf.description: Starring Kristen Wiig, Bill Hader, and Luke Wilson. Having both coincidentally cheated death on the same day, estranged twins reunite with the possibility of mending their relationship.

snoopy-come-home-4bbf37c4-2b3d-42ce-9717.title: Snoopy Come Home
snoopy-come-home-4bbf37c4-2b3d-42ce-9717.description: This charming Peanuts feature centers around the world's most independent pooch. Snoopy leaves Charlie Brown to visit his former owner Lila in the hospital, then returns with her to her apartment house.

so-this-is-christmas-99f47eff-5d17-4bbc-.title: So This Is Christmas
so-this-is-christmas-99f47eff-5d17-4bbc-.description: Eighteen-year-old Ashley's life is headed in the wrong direction. She's been hanging out with a bad crowd and seeking an escape from the drama at home.

some-kind-of-wonderful-2d5581e7-d158-41f.title: Some Kind of Wonderful
some-kind-of-wonderful-2d5581e7-d158-41f.description: A young tomboy, Watts (Mary Stuart Masterson), discovers that her feelings for her best friend, Keith (Eric Stoltz), run deeper than just friendship when he gets a date with Amanda (Lea Thompson), the most popular girl in school. Amanda's ex, Hardy (Craig Scheffer), who is from the rich section of town, is unable to let go of her, and plans to get back at Keith.

someone-else-cb9b9ed8-35b4-48b6-a1ba-82b.title: Someone Else
someone-else-cb9b9ed8-35b4-48b6-a1ba-82b.description: David constantly stresses over his love life and feels a choice must be made, stay with his too-agreeable girlfriend, Lisa, or go after exciting and tricky Nina.

splitting-adam-40eee4ef-fa23-4ddf-8545-b.title: Splitting Adam
splitting-adam-40eee4ef-fa23-4ddf-8545-b.description: After stumbling across a cloning machine, Adam Baker creates multiple versions of himself and finds the answer to handling his many summer responsibilities! Rating: TV-G

the-square-58c65ed4-51c2-4a93-a008-57e7e.title: The Square
the-square-58c65ed4-51c2-4a93-a008-57e7e.description: Christian is the respected curator of a contemporary art museum, a divorced but devoted father of two who drives an electric car and supports good causes. His next show is “The Square”, an installation which invites passersby to altruism, reminding them of their role as responsible fellow human beings. But sometimes, it is difficult to live up to your own ideals: Christian’s foolish response to the theft of his phone drags him into shameful situations. Meanwhile, the museum's PR agency has created an unexpected campaign for “The Square”. The response is overblown and sends Christian, as well as the museum, into an existential crisis.

status-update-52ba21c1-e9be-4ca4-a1d0-10.title: Status Update
status-update-52ba21c1-e9be-4ca4-a1d0-10.description: A teenager discovers a magical app that makes his social media updates come true.

stellas-last-weekend-f50d4e3f-84d1-46bd-.title: Stella's Last Weekend
stellas-last-weekend-f50d4e3f-84d1-46bd-.description: Brothers Jack (Nat Wolff) and Oliver (Alex Wolff) reunite to put their beloved dog to sleep. While their zany mother plans a party to celebrate Stella’s life, things go hilariously awry when the brothers discover they love the same girl.

step-dogs-6d148dab-8f3c-41ad-b541-8ae898.title: Step Dogs
step-dogs-6d148dab-8f3c-41ad-b541-8ae898.description: Two very different dogs move into together when their owners get married. But when thieves try to break into their house, these four-legged foes must team up to defend their home.

still-smokin-7f2a3ab5-f308-4619-8ec9-85a.title: Still Smokin
still-smokin-7f2a3ab5-f308-4619-8ec9-85a.description: In this fourth Cheech and Chong adventure, the duo's view of humor, drugs, and sex are let loose in Amsterdam. Still Smokin' finds the two comedians arriving in the Netherlandish capital to go the city's first film festival.

suburbicon-9ebdde78-8b05-4c38-a44b-e77d8.title: Suburbicon
suburbicon-9ebdde78-8b05-4c38-a44b-e77d8.description: From director George Clooney, the small idyllic town of Suburbicon is the perfect place for Gardner Lodge (Academy Award  winner Matt Damon) to make a home. But beneath this tranquil surface lies a disturbing reality, where nothing is as it seems.

the-sweet-life-6274859f-122a-450a-aa79-5.title: The Sweet Life
the-sweet-life-6274859f-122a-450a-aa79-5.description: The classic story of “Boy Meets Girl” … until Girl convinces Boy to drive to San Francisco with her … so they can throw themselves off the Golden Gate Bridge.  Only they fall in love along the way.

swimming-with-men-8c0e1b1a-e636-4273-b23.title: Swimming With Men
swimming-with-men-8c0e1b1a-e636-4273-b23.description: It's sink or synchro for a ragtag group of middle-aged men chasing aquatic glory. The Trip series' Rob Brydon stars in this hilariously offbeat ode to following your calling.

swimming-with-sharks-72407c6e-050e-4577-.title: Swimming With Sharks
swimming-with-sharks-72407c6e-050e-4577-.description: A motion picture executive's assistant puts up with his abusive boss up to a point and then completely snaps, in this ultra-dark comedy from first-time director (and former Hollywood assistant) George Huang.

swingers-a25806c3-c6d8-4c61-b9a2-f362a3e.title: Swingers
swingers-a25806c3-c6d8-4c61-b9a2-f362a3e.description: Director Doug Liman's career-making look into the psyche of 20-something males stars Jon Favreau as a struggling comedian, whose pathetic love life prompts his Hollywood wannabe pals to pump up his nightlife and immerse him in cocktail culture.

switching-goals-5e5861f1-cad8-408c-9e3e-.title: Switching Goals
switching-goals-5e5861f1-cad8-408c-9e3e-.description: Mary-Kate and Ashley Olsen executive produce and star in the rousing comedy of two sisters who hatch the ultimate scheme to find out how their other half lives--by Switching Goals.

tangerine-1b2783de-343e-490e-8c01-dec49b.title: Tangerine
tangerine-1b2783de-343e-490e-8c01-dec49b.description: It's Christmas Eve in Tinseltown and Sin-Dee (newcomer Kitana Kiki Rodriguez) is back on the block. Upon hearing that her pimp boyfriend (James Ransone, STARLET, "Generation Kill") hasn't been faithful during the 28 days she was locked up, the working girl and her best friend, Alexandra (newcomer Mya Taylor), embark on a mission to get to the bottom of the scandalous rumor. Their rip-roaring odyssey leads them through various subcultures of Los Angeles, including an Armenian family dealing with their own repercussions of infidelity. Director Sean Baker’s prior films (STARLET, PRINCE OF BROADWAY) brought rich texture and intimate detail to worlds seldom seen on film. TANGERINE follows suit, bursting off the screen with energy and style. A decidedly modern Christmas tale told on the streets of L.A., TANGERINE defies expectation at every turn.

this-beautiful-fantastic-d39d39f6-2064-4.title: This Beautiful Fantastic
this-beautiful-fantastic-d39d39f6-2064-4.description: A contemporary fairy tale set against the backdrop of a London garden, its an unlikely friendship between a reclusive young woman who dreams of writing children's books and a cranky widower.

time-freak-9ed2fb48-a269-4b8c-9567-186a1.title: Time Freak
time-freak-9ed2fb48-a269-4b8c-9567-186a1.description: Physics prodigy Stillman (Asa Butterfield) is destined for great things, only to be derailed when his girlfriend, Debbie (Sophie Turner) suddenly dumps him.

too-funny-to-fail-the-life-death-of-the-.title: Too Funny to Fail: The Life & Death of The Dana Carvey Show
too-funny-to-fail-the-life-death-of-the-.description: Why did "The Dana Carvey Show," with a writer’s room and cast including then unknowns Steve Carell, Stephen Colbert, Robert Smigel, and more, flop so spectacularly? "Too Funny to Fail" tells the true story of genius misfits who set out to make comedy history.

tragedy-girls-5ae9d464-1072-4896-8f22-9d.title: Tragedy Girls
tragedy-girls-5ae9d464-1072-4896-8f22-9d.description: Best friends Sadie and McKayla are on a mission to boost their social media fandom as amateur crime reporters hot on the trail of a deranged local serial killer. After they manage to capture the killer and secretly hold him hostage, they realize the best way to up get scoops on future victims would be to, you know, murder people themselves. As the @TragedyGirls become an overnight sensation and panic grips their small town, can their friendship survive the strain of national stardom? Will they get caught? Will their accounts get verified?

the-treasure-4cbf8a6e-018a-4985-9b81-a91.title: The Treasure
the-treasure-4cbf8a6e-018a-4985-9b81-a91.description: A hunt for buried treasure sends two men on a surprising comic caper in this Cannes prize-winning charmer.

the-truth-about-christmas-741b00e6-c54d-.title: The Truth About Christmas
the-truth-about-christmas-741b00e6-c54d-.description: An encounter with a Santa results in a drastic change.

two-family-house-e938f7b2-47e2-436d-90c2.title: Two Family House
two-family-house-e938f7b2-47e2-436d-90c2.description: Blue-collar Italian-American Buddy Visalo (Michael Rispoli) has a record of failed business ventures. After buying a rundown home, his new scheme is to transform the bottom floor into a neighborhood bar.

tyler-perrys-boo-2-a-madea-halloween-5f7.title: Tyler Perry's Boo 2! A Madea Halloween
tyler-perrys-boo-2-a-madea-halloween-5f7.description: Madea and friends scare up big laughs on a hell-arious journey to rescue her niece from a haunted campground in this screamingly funny follow-up to Tyler Perry's comedy hit.

tyrel-ca80b5eb-6763-4ef2-98f4-7260e66948.title: Tyrel
tyrel-ca80b5eb-6763-4ef2-98f4-7260e66948.description: Tyler (Jason Mitchell) is the lone black man on a weekend getaway with hard partying white strangers. As the testosterone and alcohol get out of hand, Tyler's trip begins to feel like a nightmare.

under-the-tree-29a9769b-b6f8-4536-aae2-4.title: Under the Tree
under-the-tree-29a9769b-b6f8-4536-aae2-4.description: After moving back home, a man gets sucked into a dispute between his parents and their neighbors over an old and beautiful tree. What starts as a typical spat unexpectedly and violently reaches a boiling point, soon spiraling out of control.

under-the-tuscan-sun-61acbc71-eb53-4edb-.title: Under the Tuscan Sun
under-the-tuscan-sun-61acbc71-eb53-4edb-.description: A recently divorced San Francisco writer impulsively buys a villa during a trip to Italy and embarks on a life-changing adventure.

undrafted-57d25db7-aa58-4487-b52d-9b139f.title: Undrafted
undrafted-57d25db7-aa58-4487-b52d-9b139f.description: When twelve ragtag teammates set out to play what should be a meaningless summer intramural baseball game, it ends up becoming the most important game of their lives.

the-unicorn-8ed27e90-be83-460e-a1c2-b4b4.title: The Unicorn
the-unicorn-8ed27e90-be83-460e-a1c2-b4b4.description: An engaged couple, Caleb (Nick Rutherford) and Malory (Lauren Lapkus), set out on a wild night after discovering the secret to a happy marriage, but this experience inadvertently tests their relationship in ways they never imagined.

unmade-beds-46a555cb-57bc-4de0-a41f-1e2a.title: Unmade Beds
unmade-beds-46a555cb-57bc-4de0-a41f-1e2a.description: A London apartment becomes the center of sexual and reckless play for a group of twenty-somethings as they swap lovers and identities in search of their true selves.

up-in-the-air-9a329b50-80f2-4ca6-b85e-8e.title: Up in the Air
up-in-the-air-9a329b50-80f2-4ca6-b85e-8e.description: Ryan Bingham  is living the high life. Flying all over the world on business, he never stops moving...until he meets Alex, a fellow passenger and learns that life isn't about the journey, but the connections made along the way.

vampires-bb8f75f6-ba06-424d-aa0f-13d8db3.title: Vampires
vampires-bb8f75f6-ba06-424d-aa0f-13d8db3.description: A filmmaking crew attempts to document a real-life family of vampires, with bloody results.

vegas-vacation-19a73b49-3441-4f2b-8e95-d.title: Vegas Vacation
vegas-vacation-19a73b49-3441-4f2b-8e95-d.description: Vegas Vacation (1997) stars Chevy Chase and Beverly D'Angelo. Clark (Chevy Chase) and Ellen Griswold's (Beverly D'Angelo) disastrous family outing includes a visit with boorish Cousin Eddie (Randy Quaid).

venus-in-fur-02dead97-6c46-452d-9120-a91.title: Venus in Fur
venus-in-fur-02dead97-6c46-452d-9120-a91.description: Based on the Tony ® Award-winning Broadway play by David Ives, VENUS IN FUR is the latest film from master filmmaker Roman Polanski. Alone in a Paris theater after a long day of auditioning actresses for his new play, writer-director Thomas (Mathieu Amalric) complains that no actress he's seen has what it takes to play the lead female character: a woman who enters into an agreement with her male counterpart to dominate him as her slave. Thomas is about to leave the theater when actress Vanda (Emmanuelle Seigner) bursts in, a whirlwind of erratic - and, it turns out, erotic - energy. At first she seems to embody everything Thomas has been lamenting. She is pushy, foul-mouthed, desperate and ill-prepared - or so it seems. When Thomas finally, reluctantly, agrees to let her try out for the part, he is stunned and captivated by her transformation. Not only is Vanda a perfect fit (even sharing the character's name), but she apparently has researched the role exhaustively, learned her lines by heart and even bought her own props. The likeness proves to be much more than skin-deep. As the extended "audition" builds momentum, Thomas moves from attraction to obsession until, with Vanda taking an ever more dominant role, the balance of power shifts completely.

veronica-mars-5b7f9916-1a7d-4251-a8b4-c3.title: Veronica Mars
veronica-mars-5b7f9916-1a7d-4251-a8b4-c3.description: On the eve of her law-school graduation, Veronica turns amateur sleuth once again after ex-boyfriend, Logan, becomes a murder suspect.

a-very-brady-christmas-8447e16e-ddf0-4ca.title: A Very Brady Christmas
a-very-brady-christmas-8447e16e-ddf0-4ca.description: Deck the halls with love and laughter as the Brady Bunch comes home for Christmas! Mike, Carol and the whole gang are back, in a warm and wonderful two hour special featuring all of the characters from the popular series - plus their new families.

a-very-sordid-wedding-f8392c78-c96f-4102.title: A Very Sordid Wedding
a-very-sordid-wedding-f8392c78-c96f-4102.description: Seventeen years after family matriarch Peggy tripped over G.W.’s wooden legs in Sordid Lives, same-sex marriage equality has barreled into Winters, Texas and not everyone is ready to accept it. An anniversary memorial service is being planned in honor of Peggy at the bar while the Southside Baptist Church plans an "Anti-Equality" rally to protest the abomination of gay marriage and work to defend their religious freedom. The beloved cast of colorful characters are all on a collision course for shenanigans and fireworks on the big night. Along the way a bisexual serial killer shows up, a drag queen country medley is performed and a beauty-salon-versus-the-bigots battle turns getting your hair done into the front lines of the equality battle.  Friendships are tested and families are reunited as fear and bigotry are confronted with acceptance and understanding on the way to a surprise wedding with (almost) everyone in attendance.

vice-9e2359f5-c334-43e2-b9cc-c4beeea666a.title: Vice
vice-9e2359f5-c334-43e2-b9cc-c4beeea666a.description: The untold true story of Vice President Dick Cheney, a Washington insider who changed the course of history.

villains-ac3b54d9-7008-4cb3-b808-3fd1370.title: Villains
villains-ac3b54d9-7008-4cb3-b808-3fd1370.description: A pair of amateur criminals break into a suburban home and stumble upon a dark secret that two sadistic homeowners will do anything to keep from getting out.

waiting-to-exhale-8654c4dc-67ba-4754-af2.title: Waiting to Exhale
waiting-to-exhale-8654c4dc-67ba-4754-af2.description: Four successful African-American women endure the ups and downs of modern love in this witty, often hilarious film based on the best-selling novel by Terry McMillan.

waynes-world-2-a898d950-6c0d-41df-9e37-2.title: Wayne's World 2
waynes-world-2-a898d950-6c0d-41df-9e37-2.description: Wayne and Garth try to organize a marathon rock concert called Waynestock.

we-have-a-pope-eea0f1c9-333b-4333-a477-d.title: We Have a Pope
we-have-a-pope-eea0f1c9-333b-4333-a477-d.description: A comic and fictional exploration of the emotional struggles of a newly-elected pope coming to terms with the demands of his position.

what-men-want-57be3d85-8308-4a76-95f2-c7.title: What Men Want
what-men-want-57be3d85-8308-4a76-95f2-c7.description: A woman is boxed out by the male sports agents in her profession, but gains an unexpected edge over them when she develops the ability to hear their thoughts.

when-harry-met-sally-77f05a3e-a92f-4ffc-.title: When Harry Met Sally
when-harry-met-sally-77f05a3e-a92f-4ffc-.description: Can a man and a woman be friends, or does sex always get in the way? Meg Ryan and Billy Crystal star as two best friends of the opposite sex in this blockbuster, heartwarming romantic comedy.

when-jeff-tried-to-save-the-world-3de4b1.title: When Jeff Tried to Save the World
when-jeff-tried-to-save-the-world-3de4b1.description: When the manager of an old-school bowling alley discovers the owner's plans to sell, saving Winky's World means pulling himself out of the gutter, too.

whered-you-go-bernadette-3ff159e6-e8b7-4.title: Where'd You Go, Bernadette
whered-you-go-bernadette-3ff159e6-e8b7-4.description: Cate Blanchett stars as Bernadette, a loving mother and wife who embarks on journey to rediscover herself.

white-night-wedding-4e4fa92d-4c76-4d42-b.title: White Night Wedding
white-night-wedding-4e4fa92d-4c76-4d42-b.description: In this uproarious comedy, a middle-aged professor has some second thoughts about marrying a woman half his age.

wild-rose-3554101e-7fbe-4f8e-b046-9874f9.title: Wild Rose
wild-rose-3554101e-7fbe-4f8e-b046-9874f9.description: WILD ROSE tells the complicated story of musician Rose-Lynn, a woman from Scotland who is on a quest to become a country music star, while also grappling with the responsibilities of being recently released from prison and a young mother.

wolfcop-7ca624da-353e-4462-ae27-85c47623.title: WolfCop
wolfcop-7ca624da-353e-4462-ae27-85c47623.description: One evening during the late shift, Lou investigates a mysterious disturbance at the edge of town and wakes up with a pentagram carved in his chest, heightened senses and body hair that’s growing at an alarming rate.

the-year-of-spectacular-men-bb0a5eb9-9c1.title: The Year of Spectacular Men
