the-year-of-spectacular-men-bb0a5eb9-9c1.description: Izzy has a bad case of pre-real-world millennial-itis. She falls in and out of some not so romantic romances, and figures out that when it totally feels like the end of your story, it’s often just the beginning.

you-laugh-but-its-true-33a94315-4f02-46c.title: You Laugh But It's True
you-laugh-but-its-true-33a94315-4f02-46c.description: In the world of stand-up comedy in South Africa, Trevor Noah uses his experiences during Apartheid to prepare for the biggest show of his life.

accomplices-202b16ab-6e26-45bc-a127-6a2d.title: Accomplices
accomplices-202b16ab-6e26-45bc-a127-6a2d.description: A dangerous affair between two sexy teens turns deadly when they enter a world of kinky love and sordid prostitution.

the-blue-room-15f045f4-c4d4-435b-aece-10.title: The Blue Room
the-blue-room-15f045f4-c4d4-435b-aece-10.description: Two adulterous lovers go from pillow talk to possible murder in this sexy, brain-teasing thriller. Mathieu Amalric (The Diving Bell and the Butterfly, Grand Budapest Hotel) directs and stars as Julien, a middle-aged salesman embroiled in a steamy love affair with a married woman who, after a round of kinky sex, makes a startling suggestion. Suddenly Julien is caught up in a police investigation—but just what exactly happened? Based on a novel by celebrated crime writer Georges Simenon, this beguiling cinematic puzzle keeps the audience guessing every step of the way.

breaking-the-girls-12d554f9-52d9-474b-83.title: Breaking the Girls
breaking-the-girls-12d554f9-52d9-474b-83.description: As the friendship between 2 beautiful women deepens, they embark on a murderous pact that escalates beyond their control in a twisted tale of seduction and betrayal.

a-ciambra-a4556c4a-c1a9-4b16-a2ab-7f380d.title: A Ciambra
a-ciambra-a4556c4a-c1a9-4b16-a2ab-7f380d.description: A teenage boy must grow up fast to survive life on the margins of Southern Italy in this bracing work of raw realism from executive producer Martin Scorsese.

dept-q-the-keeper-of-lost-causes-bbba10a.title: Dept Q: The Keeper of Lost Causes
dept-q-the-keeper-of-lost-causes-bbba10a.description: Police inspector Carl Morck and his assistant investigate a cold case involving a missing woman.

dept-q-a-conspiracy-of-faith-775bad49-f1.title: Dept. Q: A Conspiracy of Faith
dept-q-a-conspiracy-of-faith-775bad49-f1.description: Department Q goes on the hunt for a serial killer when a desperate message, written in blood by two children, is found 14 years after they were kidnapped.

dept-q-the-absent-one-a549324e-590b-47f1.title: Dept. Q: The Absent One
dept-q-the-absent-one-a549324e-590b-47f1.description: The brutal, 20-year-old murder of a pair of twins is double the trouble for the detectives of Department Q in this gripping second installment in the blockbuster crime series.

destroyer-ce4caede-64c2-4c95-a013-4e2584.title: Destroyer
destroyer-ce4caede-64c2-4c95-a013-4e2584.description: Destroyer is a gritty, riveting and complex crime thriller starring Oscar-winner Nicole Kidman in a virtuoso performance as a hardened detective worn down by the rigors of her job and the aftermath of an undercover FBI sting gone horribly wrong.

diary-of-a-hitman-d2701d62-d946-4c41-a7b.title: Diary of a Hitman
diary-of-a-hitman-d2701d62-d946-4c41-a7b.description: A hired killer struggles with his conscience when asked to perform his last hit on a young woman and her baby.

dogman-2018-540a3bd9-fec0-444f-889f-a323.title: Dogman (2018)
dogman-2018-540a3bd9-fec0-444f-889f-a323.description: Marcello is coerced into the petty criminal schemes of the local bully. When Simoncino’s abuse finally brings Marcello to a breaking point, he decides to stand up for his own dignity through an act of vengeance, with unintended consequences.

good-morning-killer-7aafbc24-7d3d-4dbb-8.title: Good Morning Killer
good-morning-killer-7aafbc24-7d3d-4dbb-8.description: This thriller stars Catherine Bell as FBI Special Agent Ana Gray, an undercover operative tracking down a serial kidnapper. As Ana develops a rapport with the kidnapper's latest victim, the suspect suddenly changes his pattern.

the-guilty-085512b6-bef1-464d-960e-039bf.title: The Guilty
the-guilty-085512b6-bef1-464d-960e-039bf.description: When a 911 dispatcher and former cop answers an emergency call from a kidnapped woman, he has to find a way to save her using just his phone and his wits in this pulse pounding, award-winning crime thriller. Danish, subtitled in English.

hannie-caulder-20413006-d396-4b0e-a680-7.title: Hannie Caulder
hannie-caulder-20413006-d396-4b0e-a680-7.description: A woman begins a lonely search for the bank robbers who murdered her husband.

hide-f73da136-650e-4f63-9654-f58207be5bd.title: Hide
hide-f73da136-650e-4f63-9654-f58207be5bd.description: In this movie based on Lisa Gardner's book, Carla Gugino plays Boston Police Detective D.D. Warren, who is called to the grounds of an abandoned mental hospital where a buried chamber is discovered.

hornets-nest-aaaac786-d8c0-4628-9b8e-ecc.title: Hornet's Nest
hornets-nest-aaaac786-d8c0-4628-9b8e-ecc.description: Robbie Amell, Michael Boatman and Michael Silver co-star in the first in this adaptation of the first novel in Cornwell's series of mysteries featuring reporter Andy Brazil, Police Chief Judy Hammer and her top deputy.

hounds-of-love-f16852b2-a4d3-4152-b835-8.title: Hounds of Love
hounds-of-love-f16852b2-a4d3-4152-b835-8.description: When Vicki Maloney is randomly abducted from a suburban street by a disturbed couple, she realizes she must drive a wedge between them if she is to survive.

if-beale-street-could-talk-a862614d-c49e.title: If Beale Street Could Talk
if-beale-street-could-talk-a862614d-c49e.description: Based on the novel by James Baldwin, "If Beale Street Could Talk" is a soulful drama about a young couple fighting for justice in the name of love and the promise of the American dream.

in-the-fade-43b6a68b-a0a5-47c3-8a04-49be.title: In the Fade
in-the-fade-43b6a68b-a0a5-47c3-8a04-49be.description: Katja’s husband and son are killed in a bomb attack. The mind numbing reasons behind the senseless act and eventual trial against the two suspects, a couple from the neo-Nazi scene, push Katja to the edge with no alternative but justice.

the-landing-b86228bf-3b9f-460b-aab7-5209.title: The Landing
the-landing-b86228bf-3b9f-460b-aab7-5209.description: A riveting investigation into the end of Apollo 18, the last US mission to the moon. Interviews conducted for the flight's 25th anniversary reveal new mysteries around the controversial tragedy that almost destroyed an American institution.

the-limehouse-golem-7ea30e09-f9fa-47f4-9.title: The Limehouse Golem
the-limehouse-golem-7ea30e09-f9fa-47f4-9.description: With the Limehouse Golem serial killer on the loose and taunting the police with messages written in blood, Inspector Kildare (Bill Nighy) must rely on help from a troubled witness (Olivia Cooke) to bring the killer to justice.

the-lincoln-lawyer-46cf23f6-caf6-4623-bc.title: The Lincoln Lawyer
the-lincoln-lawyer-46cf23f6-caf6-4623-bc.description: Michael "Mick" Haller, is a slick, charismatic Los Angeles criminal defense attorney who operates out of the back of his Lincoln Continental sedan.

mommy-group-murder-7ae45443-ef89-4225-99.title: Mommy Group Murder
mommy-group-murder-7ae45443-ef89-4225-99.description: A new mom joins a local mommy group to help her deal with the stress that motherhood is putting on her and her marriage. But she soon learns that membership comes at a price.

natural-born-killers-d983e63b-6929-4830-.title: Natural Born Killers
natural-born-killers-d983e63b-6929-4830-.description: A young couple blast their way across the country--and into media stardom--in Oliver Stone's controversial look at violence and the media.

out-of-blue-ac524ca5-c6f0-4e8d-8bd9-21ee.title: Out of Blue
out-of-blue-ac524ca5-c6f0-4e8d-8bd9-21ee.description: Patricia Clarkson is a New Orleans detective whose hunt for a killer draws her into a mystery of cosmic proportions in this tantalizing noir thriller.

paranoid-park-2b54a240-73ae-418c-9ae8-32.title: Paranoid Park
paranoid-park-2b54a240-73ae-418c-9ae8-32.description: In this thriller from Gus Van Sant, a teen skater accidentally kills a security guard and slips into an inner world of mesmerizing paranoia.

racer-and-the-jailbird-52dd81c4-72c5-416.title: Racer and the Jailbird
racer-and-the-jailbird-52dd81c4-72c5-416.description: Loyalties are tested when a gangster and race car driver fall in love.

ricochet-db1d1050-8f5c-4a1a-b1bf-5e2bab3.title: Ricochet
ricochet-db1d1050-8f5c-4a1a-b1bf-5e2bab3.description: Two homicide detectives find their careers – and lives – on the line when they get caught up in a case of murder and betrayal in high-society Savannah.

savage-youth-71c590ca-4333-41c7-a51e-b8b.title: Savage Youth
savage-youth-71c590ca-4333-41c7-a51e-b8b.description: The lives of six troubled teens in a racially-divided town take a violent turn when drugs and broken hearts intermix. Based on true events.

shoplifters-66391a03-6d2c-4876-90d1-bb82.title: Shoplifters
shoplifters-66391a03-6d2c-4876-90d1-bb82.description: On the margins of Tokyo, a dysfunctional band of outsiders is united by fierce loyalty and a penchant for petty theft. When the young son is arrested, secrets are exposed that upend their tenuous, below-the-radar existence.

silent-witness-7db00618-a085-4daa-9f77-7.title: Silent Witness
silent-witness-7db00618-a085-4daa-9f77-7.description: In SILENT WITNESS, Dermot Mulroney stars as a prominent defense attorney who returns to his small hometown to defend an old friend accused of murder. Also starring Anne Heche.

southie-57c9c26d-f10c-47f2-9927-f00d1bea.title: Southie
southie-57c9c26d-f10c-47f2-9927-f00d1bea.description: Three years ago when Danny Quinn left Southie, a tough Irish working-class neighborhood in South Boston, he left behind a world of crime and betrayal. Upon his return, Danny is forced to make a risky decision.

the-standoff-at-sparrow-creek-aa512259-5.title: The Standoff at Sparrow Creek
the-standoff-at-sparrow-creek-aa512259-5.description: An ex-cop realizes that the shooter at a police funeral is one of his fellow militiamen and must use extreme measures to prevent further bloodshed.

the-tall-man-3e915f0e-d809-4d3f-8581-5d4.title: The Tall Man
the-tall-man-3e915f0e-d809-4d3f-8581-5d4.description: Starring Jessica Biel. In an isolated town, children are vanishing without a trace and the locals believe a mysterious entity known as "The Tall Man" is responsible. Town nurse Julia is a skeptic, until her own child disappears.

tenderness-9d4936fb-6d4b-41b9-bc5d-81cdd.title: Tenderness
tenderness-9d4936fb-6d4b-41b9-bc5d-81cdd.description: Lori Cranston (Sophie Traub) is a confused fifteen-year-old dreamer in search of an escape from her troubled home life. She discovers and becomes enthralled with Eric (Jon Foster), a young man with a violent past.

terminal-bd0b22d2-7438-40a5-88a8-80d2fe4.title: Terminal
terminal-bd0b22d2-7438-40a5-88a8-80d2fe4.description: Margot Robbie, Simon Pegg and Mike Myers star in this twisted tale of two assassins carrying out a sinister mission, a teacher battling a fatal illness, an enigmatic janitor and a waitress leading a dangerous double life.

7852-hitchcocks-shower-scene-0d953879-7c.title: 78/52: Hitchcock's Shower Scene
7852-hitchcocks-shower-scene-0d953879-7c.description: Just when you thought it was safe to go back in the shower... Discover how Alfred Hitchcock's Psycho changed film history forever with one shocking scene.

above-and-beyond-nasas-journey-to-tomorr.title: Above and Beyond: NASA's Journey to Tomorrow
above-and-beyond-nasas-journey-to-tomorr.description: Directed, produced, and narrated by Academy Award®-nominated and Emmy®-winning Rory Kennedy, the film examines the ways NASA has changed not only our vision of the universe, but also our planet, and ourselves.

above-majestic-50507c84-cad0-4c55-8c4a-5.title: Above Majestic
above-majestic-50507c84-cad0-4c55-8c4a-5.description: A provocative look at what it takes to hide a multi-trillion dollar Secret Space Program from the public and the implications this has for humanity. Featuring David Wilcock, Corey Goode, John Desouza, Niara Isley, Jordan Sather, and more.

active-measures-81b31ed1-91b4-4133-91ad-.title: Active Measures
active-measures-81b31ed1-91b4-4133-91ad-.description: ACTIVE MEASURES chronicles the most successful espionage operation in Russian history, the US presidential election of 2016. Filmmakers expose an insidious plot devised by Putin to disrupt and control world events.

addicted-to-sexting-ca249e44-4039-4404-9.title: Addicted to Sexting
addicted-to-sexting-ca249e44-4039-4404-9.description: ADDICTED TO SEXTING is a compelling (and sometimes humorous) look at the rise and proliferation of this social phenomenon from several varying perspectives and how the lives of those engaged in it are affected.

after-parkland-84ce2472-25b9-489b-b09c-1.title: After Parkland
after-parkland-84ce2472-25b9-489b-b09c-1.description: In the days after the shooting at Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School in 2018 that killed 17 people and launched a nationwide student movement. filmmakers embedded with students and families whose lives were forever transformed.

after-the-screaming-stops-ae0a5650-fdf3-.title: After the Screaming Stops
after-the-screaming-stops-ae0a5650-fdf3-.description: A raw and emotional look into the aftermath of fame and the reconnection between two twins torn apart by their past.

alive-fec22ffe-7603-4e95-a79b-ed218146b7.title: Alive
alive-fec22ffe-7603-4e95-a79b-ed218146b7.description: Alive follows the journeys of a number of veterans who turn to adaptive athletics to help them heal both physically and emotionally from their battle wounds.

amazing-grace-fdfa744d-1fe1-4982-8a70-15.title: Amazing Grace
amazing-grace-fdfa744d-1fe1-4982-8a70-15.description: A documentary presenting the live recording of Aretha Franklin's album Amazing Grace at The New Temple Missionary Baptist Church in Watts, Los Angeles in January 1972.

the-amazing-johnathan-documentary-c71d92.title: The Amazing Johnathan Documentary
the-amazing-johnathan-documentary-c71d92.description: What begins as a seemingly ordinary profile of a dying magician becomes an unexpected and increasingly bizarre journey as filmmaker Ben Berman struggles to separate truth from illusion.

american-relapse-77cc46e0-0559-42e3-bae1.title: American Relapse
american-relapse-77cc46e0-0559-42e3-bae1.description:
Frankie and Allie fight to make a difference against the devastating heroin epidemic. The two recovering addicts spend their lives pulling needles out of the arms of active users. But after that problem is solved, the addicts must be placed into the proper treatment facility. Sadly, the corrupt billion-dollar treatment industry has made this choice difficult...and dangerous. 
It’s a struggle against the odds, in an “Us vs. the world” mentality. They allowed the film crew all access for one weekend. What transpires over 72 hours is a heartbreaking account of addicts struggling to survive.

amy-winehouse-a-final-goodbye-e6b4d6ba-5.title: Amy Winehouse: A Final Goodbye
amy-winehouse-a-final-goodbye-e6b4d6ba-5.description: A Final Goodbye is an intimate look into the life and times of Amy Winehouse from her rise to pop superstardom through to the inner demons that inspired her work and eventually caused her untimely death.

andy-irons-kissed-by-god-60dbaaf4-6abb-4.title: Andy Irons: Kissed by God
andy-irons-kissed-by-god-60dbaaf4-6abb-4.description: Three-time world champion surfer Andy Irons quietly battled bipolar disorder and opioid addiction throughout his life - demons that millions of others combat daily. His previously untold story tears down myths associated with the diseases.

apollo-11-8d0f469b-c184-488e-aff7-3bd206.title: Apollo 11
apollo-11-8d0f469b-c184-488e-aff7-3bd206.description: Crafted from a newly-discovered trove of 70mm footage, and more than 11,000 hours of uncatalogued audio recordings, Apollo 11 goes straight to the heart of NASA's most celebrated mission.

ask-dr-ruth-9dab1fcf-8f61-49f6-a2f1-5310.title: Ask Dr. Ruth
ask-dr-ruth-9dab1fcf-8f61-49f6-a2f1-5310.description: Ask Dr. Ruth chronicles the incredible life of Dr. Ruth Westheimer, a Holocaust survivor who became America's most famous sex therapist. As her 90th birthday approaches, she revisits her painful past and career at the forefront of the sexual revolution.

augie-4abb911a-adae-4c8b-bbde-46afef6e54.title: Augie
augie-4abb911a-adae-4c8b-bbde-46afef6e54.description: Augie Nieto embarks on an inspirational journey after being diagnosed with amyotrophic lateral sclerosis. With help from his wife, friends and colleagues, Nieto raises more than $55 million to fund scientific research to battle the disease.

back-in-time-0f359c96-299b-4924-8ab7-6ff.title: Back in Time
back-in-time-0f359c96-299b-4924-8ab7-6ff.description: Back in Time is a look at the impact the Back to the Future movies have had on our culture. From Spielberg to Zemeckis, Lloyd and Fox, paired with amazing trilogy fans, Back in Time features interviews and footage that must be seen.

bad-reputation-76c1ce29-f68c-4c0f-b092-8.title: Bad Reputation
bad-reputation-76c1ce29-f68c-4c0f-b092-8.description: The life and career of Joan Jett from her early years ripping it up onstage as the founder and backbone of hard-rock legends The Runaways, to her solo career and the enduring presence as a rock 'n' roll pioneer and mentor.

ballet-422-6430320a-08e2-479d-ad12-527b2.title: Ballet 422
ballet-422-6430320a-08e2-479d-ad12-527b2.description: Filmmaker Jody Lee Lipes follows emerging choreographer Justin Peck as he undertakes the difficult tasks of creating and dancing in the New York City Ballet's 422nd original piece.

ballet-now-94f5a525-5c12-4f26-9159-97b84.title: Ballet Now
ballet-now-94f5a525-5c12-4f26-9159-97b84.description: Featuring New York City Ballet’s Prima Ballerina Tiler Peck - the first ever woman to be asked to curate The Music Center’s famed BalletNOW program - and a diverse cast of world-class dancers from around the globe, the film follows Tiler as she tries to execute her groundbreaking vision of mashing together the worlds of tap, hip-hop, ballet and even clown artistry. With less than a week to pull it all off, Tiler faces the mounting pressures of not only dancing in multiple pieces but also producing and directing this high profile event. The success of the performances rests squarely on her shoulders. Will she pull it off?

banking-on-bitcoin-d5d4317c-2084-41a9-9b.title: Banking on Bitcoin
banking-on-bitcoin-d5d4317c-2084-41a9-9b.description: An ideological battle is underway between fringe utopists and mainstream capitalism. Banking on Bitcoin takes a look at what this revolutionary technology is and the players who are battling to define how it will shape our lives.

batman-bill-74e2e518-151c-4ee0-9635-1dfd.title: Batman & Bill
batman-bill-74e2e518-151c-4ee0-9635-1dfd.description: For years, Bob Kane has been credited as Batman's creator. As time passed, rumors swirled that the Caped Crusader had another father.  Who was this man? Batman & Bill tells the story of the uncredited creator of Batman, and a crusade to bring him justice.

the-beatles-eight-days-a-week-the-tourin.title: The Beatles: Eight Days a Week - The Touring Years
the-beatles-eight-days-a-week-the-tourin.description: In 1962 four young men John Lennon, Paul McCartney, George Harrison and Ringo Starr came together to form the 20th century musical phenomenon known as, "The Beatles."  The band stormed Europe in 1963, and, in 1964, they conquered America.

becoming-bond-c4bda460-f3a1-4f91-9b2f-2e.title: Becoming Bond
becoming-bond-c4bda460-f3a1-4f91-9b2f-2e.description: A Hulu Original Documentary chronicling the bizarre true story of George Lazenby, an Australian car mechanic, who managed to land the role of James Bond despite never acting a day in his life.

beers-of-joy-7acc7eb2-f07c-47b5-ac83-cf7.title: Beers of Joy
beers-of-joy-7acc7eb2-f07c-47b5-ac83-cf7.description: Beers of Joy is a fascinating, entertaining, and savory journey into our world’s favorite magical elixir. Feast upon stunning visuals from across the globe as four people immerse themselves in their passion for beer.

best-of-enemies-9966b952-a568-48e4-9e6a-.title: Best of Enemies
best-of-enemies-9966b952-a568-48e4-9e6a-.description: In 1968, ideological opposites William F. Buckley Jr. and Gore Vidal hold a series of riveting, nationally televised debates that usher in a new era of public discourse and pundit TV.

big-voice-2c01eed6-4303-4a3d-b5be-2a96b2.title: Big Voice
big-voice-2c01eed6-4303-4a3d-b5be-2a96b2.description: A year in the life of a demanding high school choir teacher who pushes his students to become “one big voice” in this inspiring musical documentary.

bigfoot-girl-9a1f563f-0fbc-40c2-839c-fb8.title: Bigfoot Girl
bigfoot-girl-9a1f563f-0fbc-40c2-839c-fb8.description: After encountering Bigfoot as a child, Kiana instantly felt a connection with the creature. With the help of other experiencers, she sets out to secret locations with recent sightings to find closure to the biggest question of her life.

the-biggest-little-farm-1c7a56bb-8f99-4f.title: The Biggest Little Farm
the-biggest-little-farm-1c7a56bb-8f99-4f.description: The Biggest Little Farm follows two dreamers and their beloved dog when they make a choice that takes them from their tiny L.A. apartment and into the countryside to build one of the most diverse farms of its kind in complete coexistence with nature.

blackfish-e9f8aeca-b88f-4eef-9789-9ae47e.title: Blackfish
blackfish-e9f8aeca-b88f-4eef-9789-9ae47e.description: Killer whales are beloved, majestic, friendly giants, yet infamous for their capacity to kill viciously. Blackfish unravels the complexities of this dichotomy, employing the story of the notorious performing whale Tilikum.

blue-gold-american-jeans-d3a489e3-4340-4.title: Blue Gold: American Jeans
blue-gold-american-jeans-d3a489e3-4340-4.description: BLUE GOLD: American Jeans is weaving together the story of how one garment is connecting us all. Starting our journey in the American West, we travel around the world with jeans hunter Eric Schrader. An ambassador of Americana, Eric is trading in the history and values that have made Blue Jeans the most expensive and sought after piece of vintage clothing on the planet. A symbol of youth, freedom, and rebellion, Blue Jeans leads us through fashion history, music, and subculture dreams, to the lost tradition of American manufacturing – exploring the responsibility of Americana in a globalized world of cultural exchange, transparency, and innovation.

bogalusa-charm-ff0725eb-0edf-403a-b817-a.title: Bogalusa Charm
bogalusa-charm-ff0725eb-0edf-403a-b817-a.description: Through the lens of an anachronistic charm school that has existed for almost three decades in rural Louisiana, we explore a town confronted with contemporary issues of class and race.

boom-for-real-the-late-teenage-years-of-.title: Boom for Real: The Late Teenage Years of Jean-Michel Basquiat
boom-for-real-the-late-teenage-years-of-.description: Follow Basquiat's life pre-fame and how New York City, the times, the people and the movements surrounding him formed the artist he became.

the-brink-2019-810956bd-bd53-48f6-ad0b-2.title: The Brink (2019)
the-brink-2019-810956bd-bd53-48f6-ad0b-2.description: The Brink follows Steve Bannon leading up to the 2018 mid-term elections in the United States. A keen manipulator of the press Bannon continues to draw headlines and protests wherever he goes, feeding the powerful myth on which his survival relies.

burden-ccae3f83-3944-4171-afdc-9efd563e6.title: Burden
burden-ccae3f83-3944-4171-afdc-9efd563e6.description: An unprecedented look into the life of conceptual artist and sculptor Chris Burden. Chris Burden guaranteed his place in art history in the 1970s with a series of often dangerous and at times stomach-churning performances. After having himself shot in Santa Ana, confined to a locker for five days in Irvine and crucified on the back of a VW bug in Venice, Burden reinvented himself as the creator of truly mesmerizing installations and sculptures, from a suspended gigantic flywheel that seemingly spins on its own to an assemblage of illuminated, antique streetlights outside the Los Angeles County Museum of Art, Urban Light (2008), which has become one of Los Angeles’ most photographed and iconic symbols. In Burden, Timothy Marrinan and Richard Dewey look at the artist’s work and private life with an innovative mix of still-potent videos of his 70s performances, personal films and audio recordings, latter day footage at his Topanga Canyon studio and comments from friends, fellow students, colleagues and critics, all peppered with Burden’s thoughts and musings from throughout the years.

burn-5645e8b9-b95f-4b3f-af7e-bbd60273a50.title: Burn
burn-5645e8b9-b95f-4b3f-af7e-bbd60273a50.description: An action-packed documentary about Detroit told through the eyes of firefighters charged with the thankless task of saving a city that many have written off as dead.

the-cage-fighter-759b6dcd-a284-48ba-b89a.title: The Cage Fighter
the-cage-fighter-759b6dcd-a284-48ba-b89a.description: A mixed martial arts competitor risks everything—his family, his marriage, even his life—to keep fighting in this riveting, true-life tale of resilience.

a-cam-life-b9a69bd3-8ae5-41c8-8260-f5056.title: A Cam Life
a-cam-life-b9a69bd3-8ae5-41c8-8260-f5056.description: An undaunted look into the cam business from performers and clients to website and studio owners.

cannabis-evolution-a25110e8-30bb-4fa9-ae.title: Cannabis Evolution
cannabis-evolution-a25110e8-30bb-4fa9-ae.description: Science has confirmed marijuana has the potential to treat physical and mental conditions, from cancer to PTSD. But the war on drugs has stifled millions in need of help - time to dispel the lies and address the facts.

cartel-land-b9c6779d-bb15-448c-874b-12d8.title: Cartel Land
cartel-land-b9c6779d-bb15-448c-874b-12d8.description: Filmmaker Matthew Heineman and Executive Producer Kathryn Bigelow (“The Hurt Locker”, “Zero Dark Thirty”) bring us this unprecedented look at two vigilante groups fighting the murderous drug cartels on both sides of the Mexican border.

the-cave-5c62213a-fa1d-4eeb-ac69-d3b3713.title: The Cave
the-cave-5c62213a-fa1d-4eeb-ac69-d3b3713.description: The Cave paints a stirring portrait of courage, resilience and female solidarity inside a subterranean hospital in Syria run by a young, female pediatrician.

the-challenge-d1277982-6c8d-4dd9-be31-58.title: The Challenge
the-challenge-d1277982-6c8d-4dd9-be31-58.description: Italian visual artist Yuri Ancarani’s exquisite documentary enters the surreal world of wealthy Qatari sheikhs with a passion for amateur falconry. The opulence of this Middle Eastern gas state  is on full display as the men race SUVs up and down sand dunes, fly their prized falcons around on private jets, and take their pet cheetahs out for desert spins in their souped-up Ferraris. The result is a film jaw-dropping not only for its displays of wealth, but for the pure cinematic beauty that won Ancarani the Filmmaker of the Present award at the 2016 Locarno Film Festival.

chef-flynn-dad35260-4907-44f4-93ef-3d54a.title: Chef Flynn
chef-flynn-dad35260-4907-44f4-93ef-3d54a.description: Ten-year-old Flynn McGarry transforms his living room into a supper club using his classmates as line cooks. Achieving sudden fame, Flynn outgrows his bedroom kitchen and sets out to challenge the hierarchy of the culinary world.

the-china-hustle-c53845f0-5822-4309-b1e1.title: The China Hustle
the-china-hustle-c53845f0-5822-4309-b1e1.description: From the producers of Enron: The Smartest Guys In The Room, a Wall Street heist story about Chinese companies, the US stock market and a still-unfolding financial crime so big, it has the power to affect all of our wallets.

citizen-jane-battle-for-the-city-c74ef6c.title: Citizen Jane: Battle for the City
citizen-jane-battle-for-the-city-c74ef6c.description: Citizen Jane is a timely tale of what can happen when engaged citizens fight the power for the sake of a better world. Arguably no one did more to shape our understanding of the modern American city than Jane Jacobs, the visionary activist and writer who fought to preserve urban communities in the face of destructive development projects. Director Matt Tyranuer (Valentino: The Last Emperor) vividly brings to life Jacobs' 1960s showdown with ruthless construction kingpin Robert Moses over his plan to raze lower Manhattan to make way for a highway, a dramatic struggle over the very soul of the neighborhood.

climate-warriors-bd258b2a-debf-4a8c-9487.title: Climate Warriors
climate-warriors-bd258b2a-debf-4a8c-9487.description: CLIMATE WARRIORS presents people who show resistance against the devastating effects of climate change. They show that we need a fast transition in order to save the environment and keep the human rights in balance in favor of peace.

the-clintons-an-american-odyssey-2e2d4df.title: The Clintons: An American Odyssey
the-clintons-an-american-odyssey-2e2d4df.description: There is no parallel to the remarkable lives of William and Hillary Clinton - it's all here in an insightful time capsule, telling one of America's greatest personal and political stories.

cold-case-hammarskjold-6617066a-8dc8-402.title: Cold Case Hammarskjöld
cold-case-hammarskjold-6617066a-8dc8-402.description: Danish director Mads Brügger and Swedish private investigator Göran Bjorkdahl are trying to solve the mysterious death of Dag Hammarskjöld. As their investigation closes in, they discover a crime with even farther reaching consequences.

comrades-cash-how-money-found-its-way-th.title: Comrades & Cash: How Money Found Its Way Through the Iron Curtain
comrades-cash-how-money-found-its-way-th.description: Communist East Germany is on the brink of bankruptcy, so it forges dark alliances and created a global businesses network which sold anything possible. This is the true story that inspired Deutschland ’86.

the-coolest-guy-movie-ever-return-to-the.title: The Coolest Guy Movie Ever: Return to the Scene of The Great Escape
the-coolest-guy-movie-ever-return-to-the.description: THE COOLEST GUY MOVIE EVER is the definitive look at the making of the 1963 classic, "The Great Escape."

crazy-about-tiffanys-3d53a4f1-7661-46c9-.title: Crazy About Tiffany's
crazy-about-tiffanys-3d53a4f1-7661-46c9-.description: A provocative and rare glimpse at the most iconic luxury jeweler in the world. From past to present, discovering the behind the scenes creation to those beholden to its charm, Crazy About Tiffany's unveils Tiffany & Co. like never before.

crime-punishment-f141e4b4-b89c-4bbd-a938.title: Crime + Punishment
crime-punishment-f141e4b4-b89c-4bbd-a938.description: This film chronicles the real struggles of a group of whistleblower cops in NYC as they fight back against the illegal arrest quotas they’re pressured to abide by.

culture-shock-a-conversation-with-direct.title: Culture Shock: A Conversation With Director Gigi Saul Guerrero
culture-shock-a-conversation-with-direct.description: Director Gigi Saul Guerrero talks through Culture Shock’s themes—immigration, filmmaking, and latinidad—in this one-on-one chat.

dancer-d7b408f8-e03f-46ab-a2c4-d4a322c8d.title: Dancer
dancer-d7b408f8-e03f-46ab-a2c4-d4a322c8d.description: Bad boy ballet superstar Sergei Polunin was the youngest principal male dancer in the Royal Ballet until stardom pushed him to the brink of self-destruction.

dancing-in-jaffa-15d8303d-defc-4866-8ed3.title: Dancing in Jaffa
dancing-in-jaffa-15d8303d-defc-4866-8ed3.description: Pierre Dulaine, an internationally renowned ballroom dancer, fulfills a life-long dream when he takes his program, Dancing Classrooms, back to his city of birth, Jaffa. Over a ten-week period, Pierre teaches 10-year-old Palestinian-Israeli and Jewish-Israeli children to dance and compete together. Dancing in Jaffa explores the complex stories of three different children, who are forced to confront issues of identity, segregation and racial prejudice as they dance with their enemy. The classroom becomes a microcosm of the Middle East's struggle to work together harmoniously while still caught in the politics of the region and race. With the guidance of Pierre, the children learn to dance together and trust one another. Dancing In Jaffa offers an up-close-and-personal perspective of how the future might unfold if the art of movement and dance could triumph over the politics of history and geography.

dealt-d8435e02-39f3-4afb-81ac-c025dd4a7e.title: Dealt
dealt-d8435e02-39f3-4afb-81ac-c025dd4a7e.description: Prepare to be inspired and amazed by Richard Turner, one of the world's most renowned card magicians, who met adversity head-on and refused to let his disability define him.

diana-vreeland-the-eye-has-to-travel-9af.title: Diana Vreeland: The Eye Has to Travel
diana-vreeland-the-eye-has-to-travel-9af.description: This is an intimate portrait and a vibrant celebration of one of the most influential women of the 20th century, an enduring icon whose influence changed the face of fashion, beauty, art, publishing, and culture forever.

dina-371c518b-1564-4350-b6bd-916457c7b21.title: Dina
dina-371c518b-1564-4350-b6bd-916457c7b21.description: In this 2017 Sundance and IDA award-winning film, Dina, an eccentric and outspoken suburban woman and Scott, a Walmart door greeter, navigate their evolving relationship in this unconventional love story.

dior-and-i-b3b6d3b8-90c7-4804-836f-e2dfc.title: Dior and I
dior-and-i-b3b6d3b8-90c7-4804-836f-e2dfc.description: Dior and I brings the viewer inside the storied world of the Christian Dior fashion house with a privileged, behind-the-scenes look at the creation of Raf Simons’ first haute couture collection as its new artistic director.

dirty-wars-ed24cad8-3e44-41a9-89d5-c8d8c.title: Dirty Wars
dirty-wars-ed24cad8-3e44-41a9-89d5-c8d8c.description: It's the dirty little secret of the War on Terror: all bets are off, and almost anything goes. We have fundamentally changed the rules of the game and the rules of engagement. Today drone strikes, night raids, and U.S. government–condoned torture occur in corners across the globe, generating unprecedented civilian casualties. Investigative reporter Jeremy Scahill (author of Blackwater: The Rise of the World's Most Mercenary Army) traces the rise of the Joint Special Operations Command, the most secret fighting force in U.S. history, exposing operations carried out by men who do not exist on paper and will never appear before Congress. No target is off-limits for the JSOC "kill list," even a U.S. citizen. Director Richard Rowley takes us on a chilling ride with whistle-blower Scahill. Dirty Wars is a battle cry for the soul and conscience of an America few of us know exists.

divide-and-conquer-the-story-of-roger-ai.title: Divide and Conquer: The Story of Roger Ailes
divide-and-conquer-the-story-of-roger-ai.description: The rise and fall of Roger Ailes, controversial Fox News mogul and Republican king-maker. One of the most powerful and divisive figures in media, Ailes would go down in flames amid scandal, paranoia, and multiple sexual harassment allegations.

do-i-sound-gay-a6fcd94e-b97d-4bda-b16a-2.title: Do I Sound Gay?
do-i-sound-gay-a6fcd94e-b97d-4bda-b16a-2.description: What makes a voice "gay?" This witty, entertaining look at a controversial topic features candid interviews with Dan Savage, David Sedaris, George Takei, and Margaret Cho.

dr-feelgood-dealer-or-healer-5cb786ce-76.title: Dr. Feelgood: Dealer or Healer?
dr-feelgood-dealer-or-healer-5cb786ce-76.description: The story of Dr. William Hurwitz - a preeminent pain specialist sentenced to 25 years in prison - provides a window into the ethical dilemma of opioid prescriptions. Painkillers give doctors tremendous power to relieve pain, a primary goal of any physician. But this power begets trouble when the same drugs can lead to addiction, abuse and death. The documentary traces Dr. Hurwitz's trial, detailing the events that lead to his arrest. Testimonies from witnesses in the case contradict one another - some revere him, while others condemn him. Taken together, their accounts reveal a portrait of a compassion yet flawed doctor. The film underscores the tension between every patient's right to pain relief and the lawful need for drug control. In 2016 prescription drugs kill more Americans than HIV or homicide, and more than heroin and cocaine combined. There could not be a more critical time to spark a discussion on this topic and call for careful though and action.

dumb-the-story-of-big-brother-magazine-c.title: Dumb: The Story of Big Brother Magazine
dumb-the-story-of-big-brother-magazine-c.description: The history of the boundary-pushing, taboo-breaking, crassly-humorous Big Brother magazine, that spawned MTV's "Jackass" and a generation of skaters.

dust-2-glory-29ec07e0-2822-4aac-8a57-bc4.title: Dust 2 Glory
dust-2-glory-29ec07e0-2822-4aac-8a57-bc4.description: Filmmaker Dana Brown explores the SCORE Baja 1000, the world's toughest, point-to-point desert race.

eating-animals-db898262-e4f7-40fe-bbb4-2.title: Eating Animals
eating-animals-db898262-e4f7-40fe-bbb4-2.description: What's on your plate? Natalie Portman and Jonathan Safran Foer present this eye-opening look at the food industry and an ethical future free of factory farming.

el-pantera-51d79ad0-bd48-4be5-a898-680ea.title: El Pantera
el-pantera-51d79ad0-bd48-4be5-a898-680ea.description: EL PANTERA is a documentary film that chronicles the rise of Mexican MMA star Yair Rodriguez aka El Pantera as he embarks on his journey to become the first ever Mexican born UFC Champion.

far-from-the-tree-6671d350-16ef-481e-af0.title: Far From the Tree
far-from-the-tree-6671d350-16ef-481e-af0.description: Discover the courage of compassion through the eyes of parents journeying towards acceptance of their unique children. Based on The New York Times bestseller.

fighter-f5948328-3eba-4cae-a0cd-ce6c1109.title: Fighter
fighter-f5948328-3eba-4cae-a0cd-ce6c1109.description: Filmmaker Amir Bar-Lev follows two Czech Holocaust survivors, Jan Weiner and Arnost Lustig, as they revisit Terezin, a labor camp where Arnost was interned for five years and Jan's mother was murdered.

the-first-monday-in-may-6f120a25-bd6b-4b.title: The First Monday in May
the-first-monday-in-may-6f120a25-bd6b-4b.description: Follows the creation of The Metropolitan Museum of Art's most attended fashion exhibition in history, "China: Through The Looking Glass," an exploration of Chinese-inspired Western fashions by Costume Institute curator Andrew Bolton.

fittest-on-earth-a-decade-of-fitness-e90.title: Fittest on Earth: A Decade of Fitness
fittest-on-earth-a-decade-of-fitness-e90.description: Forty of the world's top athletes battle through 15 events and five grueling days of competition for the title of Fittest on Earth. Who will rise to the top and prove the fittest?

food-choices-7064e086-10e2-4a7c-ae56-95f.title: Food Choices
food-choices-7064e086-10e2-4a7c-ae56-95f.description: This new ground-breaking documentary explores the impact that food choices have on people’s health, the health of our planet and on the lives of other living species. And also discusses several misconceptions about food and diet.

food-evolution-93e62906-5b4e-4b76-a306-9.title: Food Evolution
food-evolution-93e62906-5b4e-4b76-a306-9.description: Amidst a brutally polarized debate marked by passion, suspicion and confusion, FOOD EVOLUTION, by Academy Award®-nominated director Scott Hamilton Kennedy (The Garden, Fame High, OT: Our Town), explores the controversy surrounding GMOs and food. Traveling from Hawaiian papaya groves, to banana farms in Uganda to the cornfields of Iowa, the film, narrated by esteemed science communicator Neil deGrasse Tyson, wrestles with the emotions and the science driving one of the most heated arguments of our time.

food-inc-1beef04f-564c-444f-bcc2-a483eb6.title: Food, Inc.
food-inc-1beef04f-564c-444f-bcc2-a483eb6.description: Food Inc. reveals surprising - and often shocking - truths about what we eat, how it's produced, and who we have become as a nation.

framing-john-delorean-8eacd109-e343-47a4.title: Framing John DeLorean
framing-john-delorean-8eacd109-e343-47a4.description: Money, power, politics, drugs, scandal, and fast cars. Discover the untold story of the controversial automaker's meteoric rise and shocking fall. Featuring Alec Baldwin.

frank-serpico-52c93fa8-9c54-4d81-94c5-06.title: Frank Serpico
frank-serpico-52c93fa8-9c54-4d81-94c5-06.description: The courageous police officer known for exposing corruption within the NYPD and inspiring the Al Pacino classic recounts his incredible story in his own words.

free-solo-5bc87ba3-cda0-4f46-b81c-4c3ea1.title: Free Solo
free-solo-5bc87ba3-cda0-4f46-b81c-4c3ea1.description: Free solo climber Alex Honnold prepares to achieve his lifelong dream: scaling the 3,200-foot El Capitan in Yosemite National Park without a rope.

funke-a83e6cea-348e-47d9-95e2-6f9e55625e.title: Funke
funke-a83e6cea-348e-47d9-95e2-6f9e55625e.description: Acclaimed Chef Evan Funke mounts his culinary comeback - an ode to the dying art of handmade pasta - on the most competitive street in America where he finds himself fighting to fulfill his artistic destiny while battling the impossibly volatile LA restaurant industry.

fyre-fraud-e47078f3-1c0e-49a8-9da9-c571a.title: FYRE FRAUD
fyre-fraud-e47078f3-1c0e-49a8-9da9-c571a.description: Fyre Festival was the defining scam of the millennial generation, at the nexus of social media influence, late-stage capitalism, and morality in the post-truth era. Marketing for the 2017 music event went viral with the help of rapper Ja Rule, Instagram stars, and models, but turned epic fail after stranding thousands in the Bahamas. Featuring an exclusive interview with Billy McFarland, the convicted con-man behind the festival; FYRE FRAUD is a true-crime comedy bolstered by a cast of whistleblowers, victims, and insiders going beyond the spectacle to uncover the power of FOMO and an ecosystem of enablers, driven by profit and a lack of accountability in the digital age.

the-gardener-3f5aa716-61f9-4eba-b316-563.title: The Gardener
the-gardener-3f5aa716-61f9-4eba-b316-563.description: Created over 75 years and three generations, Les Quatre Vents stands as an enchanted place of beauty and surprise, a horticultural masterpiece of the 21st century. See how Frank Cabot gave birth to one of the greatest gardens in the world.

gilbert-fb924702-2181-412a-b453-7c2d65ee.title: Gilbert
gilbert-fb924702-2181-412a-b453-7c2d65ee.description: Gilbert Gottfried rose to fame in the 1980’s thanks to his brash stand-up act and personality. Now, after decades of flying solo in both his work and in his personal life, Gilbert has shockingly reinvented himself…as a family man.

glen-campbell-ill-be-me-dbccd743-fa49-44.title: Glen Campbell: I'll Be Me
glen-campbell-ill-be-me-dbccd743-fa49-44.description: This film documents Glen's amazing "Goodbye Tour" as he and his family attempt to navigate the wildly unpredictable nature of his progressing Alzheimer's disease using love, laughter and music as their medicine of choice.

go-tigers-d38e667a-5053-499d-85ff-371f91.title: Go Tigers!
go-tigers-d38e667a-5053-499d-85ff-371f91.description: The residents of Massillon, Ohio live and breathe through their high school football team. This documentary shows how three young football stars carry the burden of victory for their team, their school and their town.

hail-satan-88dd0321-84b5-426d-a57d-bb787.title: Hail Satan?
hail-satan-88dd0321-84b5-426d-a57d-bb787.description: Hail Satan? offers a look at a group of misunderstood outsiders whose commitment to social and political justice has empowered thousands of people. An inspiring and entertaining documentary from acclaimed director Penny Lane (Nuts!, Our Nixon).

havana-motor-club-bca8a805-e005-48c7-869.title: Havana Motor Club
havana-motor-club-bca8a805-e005-48c7-869.description: Cuban drag racers prepare for the first sanctioned race in their country since 1960. This documentary offers a fascinating glimpse at the ingenuity of the competitive spirit.

hillbilly-71f8ec29-1a46-4e0c-a729-b07ea1.title: Hillbilly
hillbilly-71f8ec29-1a46-4e0c-a729-b07ea1.description: Hillbilly seeks to expand understanding of Appalachia, tracing the evolution of the `hillbilly' stereotype in media and culture by connecting it to corporate exploitation of the region's natural resources.

honeyland-3c74b61a-71f5-4ca0-8a65-7bfbcd.title: Honeyland
honeyland-3c74b61a-71f5-4ca0-8a65-7bfbcd.description: Hatidze lives with her ailing mother in Macedonia, making a living cultivating honey using ancient beekeeping traditions. When an unruly family moves in next door, what at first seems like a balm for her solitude becomes a source of tension.

hot-grease-59ba60a2-a77e-426e-a65b-b93f6.title: Hot Grease
hot-grease-59ba60a2-a77e-426e-a65b-b93f6.description: The surprising story of how the bio-diesel industry is turning an ostensibly worthless raw material- spent kitchen grease- into a green energy source capable of fueling all of the trains, ships, and trucks throughout the country.

hunt-for-the-skinwalker-febbdb4c-d231-49.title: Hunt for the Skinwalker
hunt-for-the-skinwalker-febbdb4c-d231-49.description: Hundreds of reports of phenomena at Skinwalker Ranch have made it one of the most famous paranormal hotspots in the world. Previously unreleased footage and interviews from the scientific study piece together what could be happening there.

hurley-88b86fbd-1b81-40ca-aacc-59e4b6155.title: Hurley
hurley-88b86fbd-1b81-40ca-aacc-59e4b6155.description: In the 1970’s, Hurley Haywood was the dominant force in motor racing, but his personal life remained a mystery. Hurley chronicles a remarkable life, revealing a greater insight into the tightrope walk between career and personal life.

i-know-a-woman-like-that-370b6ad2-b9af-4.title: I Know a Woman Like That
i-know-a-woman-like-that-370b6ad2-b9af-4.description: I KNOW A WOMAN LIKE THAT brings to its audience interviews with 17 exceptional and vigorous women who share an extraordinary attitude about how to live the upper decades of one's life.

in-search-of-greatness-2723f48d-11b9-492.title: In Search of Greatness
in-search-of-greatness-2723f48d-11b9-492.description: IN SEARCH OF GREATNESS is a groundbreaking documentary that reveals the true nature and nurture of the greatest athletes of all time

iris-2014-7972a9d2-f61c-4338-863f-d42c33.title: Iris (2014)
iris-2014-7972a9d2-f61c-4338-863f-d42c33.description: From legendary documentarian Albert Maysles (GREY GARDENS, GIMME SHELTER), IRIS pairs the late 88-year-old filmmaker with Iris Apfel, the quick-witted, flamboyantly dressed 93-year-old style maven who has had an outsized presence on the New York fashion scene for decades. More than a fashion film, the documentary is a story about creativity and how a soaring free spirit continues to inspire.

jaco-79314ccb-de7c-427d-b885-0980cd9e066.title: JACO
jaco-79314ccb-de7c-427d-b885-0980cd9e066.description: "JACO" tells the story of Jaco Pastorius, a self-taught, larger-than-life musician who single-handedly changed the course of modern music by redefining the sound and the role of the electric bass guitar.

jane-ccfc963c-6cf9-4d52-a513-6236265bc21.title: Jane
jane-ccfc963c-6cf9-4d52-a513-6236265bc21.description: Director Brett Morgen presents an intimate portrait of Jane Goodall's groundbreaking chimpanzee research.

jawline-97faaa95-943e-4258-9573-bac4790d.title: Jawline
jawline-97faaa95-943e-4258-9573-bac4790d.description: This film follows 16-year-old Austyn Tester, a rising star in the live-broadcast ecosystem who built his following on wide-eyed optimism and teen girl lust, as he tries to escape a dead-end life in rural Tennessee.

jerry-lewis-the-man-behind-the-clown-232.title: Jerry Lewis: The Man Behind the Clown
jerry-lewis-the-man-behind-the-clown-232.description: While Americans viewed Lewis as nothing more than just a clown, others like the French recognized him as a true auteur, giving birth to questions that have perplexed American pop culture for over 50 years: Why do Europeans love Jerry Lewis?

jiro-dreams-of-sushi-ca4ffa60-88a5-4fc6-.title: Jiro Dreams of Sushi
jiro-dreams-of-sushi-ca4ffa60-88a5-4fc6-.description: This is the story of 85-year-old Jiro Ono, considered by many to be the world’s greatest sushi chef. He is the proprietor of Sukiyabashi Jiro, a 10-seat, sushi-only restaurant inauspiciously located in a Tokyo subway station.

joe-strummer-the-future-is-unwritten-338.title: Joe Strummer: The Future Is Unwritten
joe-strummer-the-future-is-unwritten-338.description: Julien Temple's electrifying Sundance rock-doc is about The Clash's Joe Strummer, the punk icon whose message has inspired Bono, Johnny Depp, John Cusack and more.

julian-schnabel-a-private-portrait-6741b.title: Julian Schnabel: A Private Portrait
julian-schnabel-a-private-portrait-6741b.description: Julian Schnabel: A Private Portrait chronicles the personal life and public career of the celebrated painter and filmmaker Julian Schnabel, whose acclaimed work has turned him into a superstar in the international art world.

k2-beyond-the-comfort-zone-615be1ae-9960.title: K2: Beyond the Comfort Zone
k2-beyond-the-comfort-zone-615be1ae-9960.description: Adventurer Mike Horn and his friends travel through 13 countries in an  attempt  to  ascend the  most  difficult mountain  in  the world. Immersing  into different cultures and breathtaking landscapes, they get closer to climbing K2.

keepers-of-the-magic-afa7965c-22db-4674-.title: Keepers of the Magic
keepers-of-the-magic-afa7965c-22db-4674-.description: This groundbreaking documentary explores our fascination with moving images and provides insight into how cinema's most iconic moments came to be.

killing-for-love-72736cbb-e944-4c6f-8fcc.title: Killing for Love
killing-for-love-72736cbb-e944-4c6f-8fcc.description: What could drive an innocent man to take the fall for a crime he didn't commit? A shocking true tale of obsessive love, betrayal, and murder.

killing-them-safely-2bff12d3-29b0-492b-a.title: Killing Them Safely
killing-them-safely-2bff12d3-29b0-492b-a.description: Electronic guns, the high-tech alternative to bullets, are used by every police officer nationwide. Are they saving lives? Or killing people? This is the eye-opening story.

kim-dotcom-caught-in-the-web-999c9eaf-cc.title: Kim Dotcom: Caught in the Web
kim-dotcom-caught-in-the-web-999c9eaf-cc.description: Kim Dotcom, the "most wanted man online," battles the U.S. government and entertainment industry over issues of ownership, privacy and piracy in the digital age.

kusama-infinity-b3d0bfc5-3b1e-4132-808f-.title: Kusama: Infinity
kusama-infinity-b3d0bfc5-3b1e-4132-808f-.description: The top-selling female artist in the world, Yayoi Kusama overcame impossible odds to bring her radical artistic vision to the world stage. People are experiencing her installation Infinity Mirrored Rooms, as she continues to create new work every day.

kygo-stole-the-show-directors-cut-de1487.title: Kygo: Stole the Show - Director's Cut
kygo-stole-the-show-directors-cut-de1487.description: Stole The Show, featuring Bono, Steve Aoki, and Martin Garrix, drops us into the heart of the music streaming revolution, using Kygo's first arena show as a lens to examine not only Kygo's rise but the rise of streaming.

larger-than-life-the-kevyn-aucoin-story-.title: Larger Than Life: The Kevyn Aucoin Story
larger-than-life-the-kevyn-aucoin-story-.description: A pioneer of contour techniques, makeup artist Kevyn Aucoin’s meteoric rise to fame in the 80’s and 90’s was legendary. Iconic clients, friends, and family retrace his life, career, and mysterious death at the height of his fame in 2002.

the-last-race-3d0bf526-20de-44c6-b6ef-96.title: The Last Race
the-last-race-3d0bf526-20de-44c6-b6ef-96.description: The DNA of NASCAR, independent stock car racing is a dying art that’s still hanging on at an iconic Long Island track. Electrifying racing footage is intertwined with the story of a small town trying to retain its identity.

leaning-into-the-wind-andy-goldsworthy-2.title: Leaning Into the Wind: Andy Goldsworthy
leaning-into-the-wind-andy-goldsworthy-2.description: Sixteen years after the groundbreaking film Rivers and Tides director Thomas Riedelsheimer returns to work with the artist. The film follows Andy on his exploration of the layers of his world and the impact of the years on himself and his art.

legion-of-brothers-c63568d7-3353-4924-b9.title: Legion of Brothers
legion-of-brothers-c63568d7-3353-4924-b9.description: Immediately after the 9/11 attacks, less than 100 US Troops were sent on a secret mission to overthrow the Taliban. What happens next is equal parts war origin story & cautionary tale, illuminating the impact of 15 years of constant combat.

life-animated-7d7a015c-60d9-48e4-af89-7f.title: Life, Animated
life-animated-7d7a015c-60d9-48e4-af89-7f.description: From Academy Award® winning director Roger Ross Williams comes the story of Owen Suskind, a young man who couldn’t speak as a child until he discovered a unique way to communicate by immersing himself in the world of Disney animated films.

light-in-the-water-8e8a9e32-550d-4344-83.title: Light in the Water
light-in-the-water-8e8a9e32-550d-4344-83.description: In 1982 soon after the first Gay Games, West Hollywood Aquatics registered as the first openly gay masters swim team in the world. This athletic powerhouse fought injustice in the world of competitive sports, and ultimately became a family.

lo-and-behold-reveries-of-the-connected-.title: Lo and Behold: Reveries of the Connected World
lo-and-behold-reveries-of-the-connected-.description: Oscar®-nominated documentarian Werner Herzog (Grizzly Man, Cave of Forgotten Dreams) chronicles the virtual world from its origins to its outermost reaches.

long-time-coming-a-1955-baseball-story-6.title: Long Time Coming: A 1955 Baseball Story
long-time-coming-a-1955-baseball-story-6.description: Sixty years after integrating Little League baseball in the South, the pioneering players embark on a personal journey and question the ballgame’s historic significance while trying to navigate America’s lingering racial divisions.

love-gilda-6529b3ee-7a33-4f25-9b21-0e924.title: Love, Gilda
love-gilda-6529b3ee-7a33-4f25-9b21-0e924.description: A joyous, moving celebration of the life of the first superstar of Saturday Night Live. Gilda Radner's jubilant spark is captured through private audiotapes, home movies and diaries in this salute to her indomitable spirit.

madonna-and-the-breakfast-club-4dcf7a04-.title: Madonna and the Breakfast Club
madonna-and-the-breakfast-club-4dcf7a04-.description: The incredible untold story of pop icon Madonna’s struggling pre-fame years in New York City with her musician boyfriend, Dan Gilroy, and their first band Breakfast Club.

making-a-killing-guns-greed-and-the-nra-.title: Making a Killing: Guns, Greed, and the NRA
making-a-killing-guns-greed-and-the-nra-.description: This powerful documentary tells the stories of tragic shootings through the eyes of survivors and family members and how National Rifle Association (NRA) has lobbied for gun manufacturers who pay their bills and set their agenda.

march-of-the-penguins-2-the-next-step-a9.title: March of the Penguins 2: The Next Step
march-of-the-penguins-2-the-next-step-a9.description: Filmmaker Luc Jacquet returns to the Antarctic to visit the Emperor Penguins who call the frozen continent home. March of the Penguins 2, tells the story of two penguins, as they face the unimaginable challenges of life in this hostile land.

margaret-atwood-a-word-after-a-word-afte.title: Margaret Atwood: A Word After a Word After a Word is Power
margaret-atwood-a-word-after-a-word-afte.description: Poet and novelist, Margaret Atwood is a household name. Yet few know the private Margaret Atwood. Who is the woman and writer behind these stories?

meeting-gorbachev-d0224007-f613-443e-8c9.title: Meeting Gorbachev
meeting-gorbachev-d0224007-f613-443e-8c9.description: Werner Herzog meeting Mikhail Gorbachev opens a fresh door to some of the most significant happenings of the late 20th Century from nuclear disarmament to the reunification of Germany and the end of the Cold War.

michael-jackson-life-death-and-legacy-37.title: Michael Jackson: Life, Death and Legacy
michael-jackson-life-death-and-legacy-37.description: Following the recent imprisonment of Jackson's doctor Conrad Murray for involuntary manslaughter, we are taken on a journey through the extraordinary life of Michael Jackson from his debut in the Jackson 5 to his untimely death in 2009.

mike-wallace-is-here-8d1c884c-7093-4c27-.title: Mike Wallace Is Here
mike-wallace-is-here-8d1c884c-7093-4c27-.description: An unflinching look at the legendary reporter, who interrogated the 20th century’s biggest figures in his over fifty years on air, and his aggressive reporting style and showmanship that redefined what America came to expect from broadcasters.

minding-the-gap-efcd9be9-9541-46b4-abbc-.title: Minding the Gap
minding-the-gap-efcd9be9-9541-46b4-abbc-.description: Filmmaker Bing Liu searches for correlations between his skateboarder friends' turbulent upbringings and the complexities of modern-day masculinity.

monkey-business-the-adventures-of-curiou.title: Monkey Business: The Adventures of Curious George’s Creators
monkey-business-the-adventures-of-curiou.description: Featuring a narrow escape from the Nazis on makeshift bicycles, MONKEY BUSINESS explores the extraordinary lives of Hans and Margret Rey, the authors of the beloved Curious George children’s books.

neat-the-story-of-bourbon-a9dcfc54-c59f-.title: Neat: The Story of Bourbon
neat-the-story-of-bourbon-a9dcfc54-c59f-.description: "Neat" dives into the rich and storied world of bourbon. Exploring its colorful history, charismatic characters, and uniquely American process, the film is a celebration of the artistry that makes America’s only native spirit.

noma-my-perfect-storm-ff23bb03-64cc-45c5.title: Noma My Perfect Storm
noma-my-perfect-storm-ff23bb03-64cc-45c5.description: Creative genius René Redzepi is renowned as one of the world’s best chefs. His restaurant Noma was voted best restaurant in the world four times.

nothing-is-truer-than-truth-2768b072-1e5.title: Nothing Is Truer Than Truth
nothing-is-truer-than-truth-2768b072-1e5.description: Nothing Is Truer than Truth introduces Edward de Vere, A-list party boy on the continental circuit, who travels to Venice in 1575 and becomes Shakespeare. The film argues that the author’s bisexuality is the reason for the pseudonym.

obey-giant-26c3c7ca-412b-49e0-a075-7b369.title: Obey Giant
obey-giant-26c3c7ca-412b-49e0-a075-7b369.description: A documentary that profiles the life and work of artist Shepard Fairey, following his roots in punk rock and skateboarding to his creation of the iconic Obama HOPE poster and the controversy that surrounds it.

off-label-311c7dd2-dfe3-4244-b1b8-95a11c.title: Off Label
off-label-311c7dd2-dfe3-4244-b1b8-95a11c.description: A probing exposé of an over medicated, misdiagnosed, and drug-addled America, OFF LABEL takes us on an emotional journey through 8 uniquely personal experiences to shed light on an unknown and often camouflaged plague affecting our nation.

the-other-f-word-7117ec0c-46b0-4cbb-8f28.title: The Other F Word
the-other-f-word-7117ec0c-46b0-4cbb-8f28.description: Oscilloscope Laboratories presents a revealing and touching look at what happens when a generation's ultimate anti-authoritarians - punk rockers -become society's ultimate authorities - dads. Featuring Blink-182, Everclear, Pennywise. (234)

the-panama-papers-f0cf44b0-0892-4664-bbd.title: The Panama Papers
the-panama-papers-f0cf44b0-0892-4664-bbd.description: Director Alex Winter goes inside the biggest global corruption scandal in history that was uncovered by hundreds of journalists, working in secret and at enormous risk.

passage-to-mars-1576441a-6a0d-4279-b3e9-.title: Passage to Mars
passage-to-mars-1576441a-6a0d-4279-b3e9-.description: Incredible true story of a NASA arctic expedition designed to be the first Martian road trip on Earth becomes an epic two-year odyssey of survival. Voiceover from Buzz Aldrin.

pick-of-the-litter-ac9a6fd7-e2f9-498b-a9.title: Pick of the Litter
pick-of-the-litter-ac9a6fd7-e2f9-498b-a9.description: Five spirited Labrador puppies embark on an incredible journey to become guide dogs for the blind. Which ones will have what it takes?

public-figure-4cfcb6f1-26eb-490e-8a19-e9.title: Public Figure
public-figure-4cfcb6f1-26eb-490e-8a19-e9.description: A documentary that investigates the psychological effects of everyday social media use while exploring how our influencers deal with the fame, money, hate, and obsession that comes with it.

the-push-89815c25-567d-4cbb-8758-c1cef8d.title: The Push
the-push-89815c25-567d-4cbb-8758-c1cef8d.description: Two years after a debilitating accident, Grant Korgan becomes the first spinal cord injured athlete to actually push himself 100 miles to the geographic South Pole.

the-quest-of-alain-ducasse-b144dc77-d4da.title: The Quest of Alain Ducasse
the-quest-of-alain-ducasse-b144dc77-d4da.description: Alain Ducasse is one of the world’s most renowned chefs and culinary mentors. He tirelessly travels the world smelling, tasting, touching and fearlessly creating ground-breaking new cuisine. French, subtitled in English.

the-quiet-one-e4bc3d45-6552-4730-be61-e3.title: The Quiet One
the-quiet-one-e4bc3d45-6552-4730-be61-e3.description: He was the bassist for The Rolling Stones and known as the "quiet one." Now, Bill Wyman speaks out about life in the world’s greatest rock band through a tour of his personal archive.

raise-hell-the-life-and-times-of-molly-i.title: Raise Hell: The Life and Times of Molly Ivins
raise-hell-the-life-and-times-of-molly-i.description: Raise Hell: The Life and Times of Molly Ivins tells the story of media firebrand Molly Ivins, six feet of Texas trouble who took on the Good Old Boy corruption wherever she found it.

ramen-heads-b0d14db4-8260-48a5-8d98-a855.title: Ramen Heads
ramen-heads-b0d14db4-8260-48a5-8d98-a855.description: Japan's king of ramen opens his kitchen and five other prestige ramen shops to share recipes and trade secrets in this savory homage to noodles and broth.

rbg-6a9a3cff-3d98-4236-be1d-8e55cb35b4c1.title: RBG
rbg-6a9a3cff-3d98-4236-be1d-8e55cb35b4c1.description: An intimate portrait of an unlikely rock star: Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg. With unprecedented access, the filmmakers explore how her early legal battles changed the world for women.

the-reagan-show-6f8a20d6-0b99-4cd0-9fd4-.title: The Reagan Show
the-reagan-show-6f8a20d6-0b99-4cd0-9fd4-.description: Told solely through archival footage and set against the backdrop of the Cold War, The Reagan Show presents the pageantry, absurdity, and charisma of a prolific actor’s defining role: Leader of the Free World.

the-reckoning-fd20c468-31ea-4917-b460-ce.title: The Reckoning
the-reckoning-fd20c468-31ea-4917-b460-ce.description: Powerful, personal and uncensored, The Reckoning explores the most explosive scandal in pop culture’s history: sexual misconduct in Hollywood.

the-riot-and-the-dance-earth-537c8c03-0b.title: The Riot and the Dance: Earth
the-riot-and-the-dance-earth-537c8c03-0b.description: Join in the glorious uproar of creation with Dr. Gordon Wilson as he traverses the planet, basking in God’s masterpieces found throughout the animal kingdom.

roller-dreams-65fdba88-7db9-422d-9a0a-14.title: Roller Dreams
roller-dreams-65fdba88-7db9-422d-9a0a-14.description: It's 1984 and Venice Beach, CA, is at the epicenter of a pop culture explosion. Young people of color seeking refuge from the turmoil of inner city life flock to the eclectic ocean community to create a brand new phenomenon: roller dancing!

saving-jaws-4727da6a-16b1-42d2-9ae6-6d8a.title: Saving Jaws
saving-jaws-4727da6a-16b1-42d2-9ae6-6d8a.description: Biologist OCEAN RAMSEY (“Shark Whisper") credits her connection with sharks to years of research, but others feel it’s something more. Join Ocean and a team of biologists as they travel the globe trying to halt their looming extinction.

school-life-95fb9599-d651-48a2-a7a4-6f7c.title: School Life
school-life-95fb9599-d651-48a2-a7a4-6f7c.description: This documentary follows a year in the lives of two inspirational teachers at the only primary-age boarding school in Ireland. For nearly half a century they have shaped thousands of minds, but the unthinkable looms: what would retirement mean?

scotch-a-golden-dream-2039c8c0-b06c-40b6.title: Scotch: A Golden Dream
scotch-a-golden-dream-2039c8c0-b06c-40b6.description: For more than a century, Scotch whisky has been the premier international spirit of choice. With a backdrop of stunning Scottish landscapes, explore the artistic and scientific building blocks of making whisky; the stuff dreams are made of.

sea-of-shadows-162533ad-fea6-4eb0-833e-1.title: Sea of Shadows
sea-of-shadows-162533ad-fea6-4eb0-833e-1.description: Sea of Shadows uncovers a black market that threatens the extinction of the vaquita.

seymour-an-introduction-848c7e65-5bcd-4c.title: Seymour: An Introduction
seymour-an-introduction-848c7e65-5bcd-4c.description: Meet Seymour Bernstein: a virtuoso pianist, veteran New Yorker, and true original who gave up a successful concert career to teach music.

sharp-edges-1cda5551-3b91-4f99-b870-494f.title: Sharp Edges
sharp-edges-1cda5551-3b91-4f99-b870-494f.description: Sharp Edges is an intimate look into the early years of figure skater, Tonya Harding. Featuring early interviews with Tonya, as well as her coaches and mother (portrayed by Oscar (R)-winning Allison Janney in I, TONYA).

shut-up-and-play-the-hits-c0093123-ca68-.title: Shut Up and Play the Hits
shut-up-and-play-the-hits-c0093123-ca68-.description: LCD final show at MSG: frontman James Murphy had made the conscious decision to disband one of the most celebrated and influential bands of its generation at the peak of its popularity, ensuring that the band would go out on top.

sneakerheadz-7bfcf67f-3658-4138-9135-a7d.title: Sneakerheadz
sneakerheadz-7bfcf67f-3658-4138-9135-a7d.description: An in-depth look into the exploding subculture of sneaker collecting and the widespread influence it has had on popular culture around the world.

somm-219a6b78-b899-4713-81c5-7d9a4ca3a87.title: Somm
somm-219a6b78-b899-4713-81c5-7d9a4ca3a87.description: The story of four sommeliers attempting to pass the prestigious Master Sommelier exam, a test with one of the lowest pass rates in the world.

somm-3-02059ed3-972d-42ef-b806-8f8b488e8.title: Somm 3
somm-3-02059ed3-972d-42ef-b806-8f8b488e8.description: Three of the greatest legends in wine meet to drink the rarest bottles of their careers, while the best blind tasters of today gather to settle an age-old argument. The results could change the world of wine forever.

somm-into-the-bottle-331f36c6-3cf2-46c1-.title: Somm: Into The Bottle
somm-into-the-bottle-331f36c6-3cf2-46c1-.description: The seldom seen world that surrounds the wine we drink. How is it grown? What goes on in the cellar? This is a never before seen look into the world of wine.

soul-boys-of-the-western-world-1aa5980b-.title: Soul Boys of the Western World
soul-boys-of-the-western-world-1aa5980b-.description: Relive the music, fashion, and spirit of the 80s via the incredible, behind-the-scenes saga of the rise, fall, and comeback of chart-topping New Wave legends Spandau Ballet.

soul-of-a-banquet-7289db19-7edf-4d90-acd.title: Soul of a Banquet
soul-of-a-banquet-7289db19-7edf-4d90-acd.description: In this mouth-watering documentary, director Wayne Wang (The Joy Luck Club) profiles Cecilia Chiang, the matriarch of modern Chinese cooking, as she relates her fascinating history and cooks up a sumptuous, once-in-a-lifetime banquet.

standing-in-the-shadows-of-motown-9bfa17.title: Standing in the Shadows of Motown
standing-in-the-shadows-of-motown-9bfa17.description: In 1959, Berry Gordy Jr. gathered the best musicians from Detroit's thriving jazz and blues scene to begin cutting songs for his new record company - Motown. This documentary tells the unforgettable story of the Funk Brothers.

steve-jobs-the-man-in-the-machine-b4d427.title: Steve Jobs: The Man in the Machine
steve-jobs-the-man-in-the-machine-b4d427.description: Academy Award®-winning director Alex Gibney [Going Clear: Scientology and the Prison of Belief] pulls no punches in his portrait of Apple founder Steve Jobs and his legacy.

take-every-wave-the-life-of-laird-hamilt.title: Take Every Wave: The Life of Laird Hamilton
take-every-wave-the-life-of-laird-hamilt.description: Experience the white-knuckle thrill of big wave surfing through the eyes of Laird Hamilton, a living legend who conquers the world's mightiest tides.

take-my-nose-please-b2065bcb-52fd-41f5-8.title: Take My Nose... Please!
take-my-nose-please-b2065bcb-52fd-41f5-8.description: Two comedians, Emily Askin and Jackie Hoffman, debate the merits and pitfalls of plastic surgery as they deliberate about going under the knife.

tea-with-the-dames-9cb07ffd-77d0-405c-93.title: Tea With the Dames
tea-with-the-dames-9cb07ffd-77d0-405c-93.description: Spend a delightfully bawdy afternoon with 4 legends of British stage & cinema. Dames Maggie Smith, Judi Dench, Eileen Atkins, and Joan Plowright spill the tea on life, love, and art.

tell-them-anything-you-want-a-portrait-o.title: Tell Them Anything You Want: A Portrait of Maurice Sendak
tell-them-anything-you-want-a-portrait-o.description: A loving look at one of the most cherished and controversial figures in children's literature. In this deeply moving tribute to Sendak, Lance Bangs and Spike Jonze (acclaimed director of WHERE THE WILD THINGS ARE) bring you a portrait of the seminal talent whose conficts with success and lifelong obsession with death have subtly influenced his work.

that-summer-6c7dd4c4-49cd-4666-b794-e00a.title: That Summer
that-summer-6c7dd4c4-49cd-4666-b794-e00a.description: Welcome to GREY GARDENS...as you've never seen it before. Discover the long-lost film featuring Big and Little Edie before they were cultural icons. With Andy Warhol.

this-ones-for-the-ladies-311f8a53-09d6-4.title: This One's for the Ladies
this-ones-for-the-ladies-311f8a53-09d6-4.description: Every Thursday night, hundreds of women gather for a potluck celebration and the chance to throw singles at the hottest dancers in New Jersey. This One's for the Ladies isn't just about  dancing, it's a heartwarming story of friendship and community.

three-days-of-glory-ae7224b7-d955-48bb-a.title: Three Days of Glory
three-days-of-glory-ae7224b7-d955-48bb-a.description: Three Days of Glory takes you behind the scenes for one of the most legendary celebrations in the world of wine during a year when the humble winemaker-farmers of Burgundy faced the most difficult season on record.

three-identical-strangers-438d26ae-629e-.title: Three Identical Strangers
three-identical-strangers-438d26ae-629e-.description: Identical triplets become separated at birth and adopted by three different families. Years later, their amazing reunion becomes a global sensation but also unearths an unimaginable secret that has radical repercussions.

tickled-a2fc2fb1-a76c-479d-8136-95888846.title: Tickled
tickled-a2fc2fb1-a76c-479d-8136-95888846.description: In this shocking documentary you have to see to believe, a pop-culture journalist investigates 'competitive endurance tickling.'

tiny-shoulders-rethinking-barbie-d1a7351.title: Tiny Shoulders: Rethinking Barbie
tiny-shoulders-rethinking-barbie-d1a7351.description: In her 59 years, Barbie has become a fashion icon, a lightning rod, and a target for feminists. Tiny Shoulders: Rethinking Barbie, featuring newly discovered footage and unprecedented access to the inner workings of a toy giant during Barbie’s biggest reinvention, surveys 60 years of women in popular culture through the lens of this 11.5 inch, Zelig-like plastic icon. Featuring interviews with Gloria Steinem, Roxane Gay, Peggy Orenstein, Mattel insiders and cultural historians, the documentary reveals, through both funny and crushing archival material, and fly-on-the-wall observations of Barbie’s current architects, the progression and regression in women’s fight for equality.

toni-morrison-the-pieces-i-am-8af70ef3-0.title: Toni Morrison: The Pieces I Am
toni-morrison-the-pieces-i-am-8af70ef3-0.description: This artful and intimate meditation on legendary storyteller Toni Morrison examines her life, her work and the powerful themes she has confronted throughout her literary career.

transgender-nation-4c3911c2-1d65-4df5-93.title: Transgender Nation
transgender-nation-4c3911c2-1d65-4df5-93.description: Gender identification is changing rapidly, causing heated division between the left and the right. Transgender Nation lifts the veil on the world of the Transgender and explore the secrets of a world most misunderstand.

two-trains-runnin-174df9c1-cf21-4c8a-909.title: Two Trains Runnin'
two-trains-runnin-174df9c1-cf21-4c8a-909.description: Two Trains Runnin' is about the search for two forgotten blues singers, set in Mississippi during the height of the civil rights movement. Directed by Sam Pollard, narrated by Common, and featuring the music of Gary Clark Jr.

ulam-main-dish-5ad3aa96-78e5-4988-a5ba-e.title: ULAM: Main Dish
ulam-main-dish-5ad3aa96-78e5-4988-a5ba-e.description: In this delicious documentary, Filipino-American filmmaker Alexandra Cuerdo answers this question -- and follows the rise of the Filipino food movement via the chefs crossing over to the center of the American table.

unbanned-the-legend-of-aj1-4b83093f-e354.title: Unbanned: The Legend of AJ1
unbanned-the-legend-of-aj1-4b83093f-e354.description: Unbanned explores the dynamic life of AJ1 from its unlikely origins to its role in disrupting NBA rules, birthing sneaker culture, and influencing a social and cultural revolution. This is the story of a shoe that changed the world.

an-unreasonable-man-12072aeb-7626-4e9c-b.title: An Unreasonable Man
an-unreasonable-man-12072aeb-7626-4e9c-b.description: Ralph Nader: preeminent liberal, consumer advocate, election spoiler. This Sundance festival gem explores the meaning of democracy and idealism in today's world.

untouchable-0204d474-dcce-44f3-af25-d1cc.title: Untouchable
untouchable-0204d474-dcce-44f3-af25-d1cc.description: The inside story of the rise and fall of Harvey Weinstein reveals how, over decades, he acquires and protects his power even as scandal threatens to engulf him.

waiting-for-superman-300bd9d7-c376-4adf-.title: Waiting for Superman
waiting-for-superman-300bd9d7-c376-4adf-.description: The compelling stories of five unforgettable students such as Emily, a Silicon Valley eighth-grader who is afraid of being labeled as unfit for college and Francisco, a Bronx first-grader whose mom will do anything to give him a better life.

walk-away-renee-9cbd4365-084d-4b1e-b624-.title: Walk Away Renee
walk-away-renee-9cbd4365-084d-4b1e-b624-.description: A sweet and affecting film about filmmaker Jonathan Caouette's journey of self-discovery on a transformative road trip with his mother.

we-are-columbine-88681ff5-c0dd-4577-a1dd.title: We Are Columbine
we-are-columbine-88681ff5-c0dd-4577-a1dd.description: On April 20, 1999, Columbine High School in Littleton, Colorado experienced one of the most deadly school shootings in United States history. The incident shocked a country that could scarcely imagine the epidemic of teen violence it foreshadowed.

whitney-6446db39-4297-4d32-bca3-23403f1a.title: Whitney
whitney-6446db39-4297-4d32-bca3-23403f1a.description: From Oscar®-winning filmmaker Kevin Macdonald comes an intimate, unflinching portrait of Whitney Houston and her family that probes beyond familiar tabloid headlines and sheds new light on the spellbinding trajectory of Houston’s life.

who-fed-up-the-internet-e3d50cae-5d8c-42.title: Who F***ed up the Internet?!
who-fed-up-the-internet-e3d50cae-5d8c-42.description: A hilarious look at a topic that effects all of our lives - net neutrality.

the-wolfpack-dd544cc9-9a25-4551-af62-cbb.title: The Wolfpack
the-wolfpack-dd544cc9-9a25-4551-af62-cbb.description: The Wolfpack is a coming of age story following the six Angulo brothers who have spent their entire lives locked away from society in an apartment on the Lower East Side of Manhattan.

the-wrecking-crew-b134de13-ce12-47d8-bcd.title: The Wrecking Crew
the-wrecking-crew-b134de13-ce12-47d8-bcd.description: Music lovers will be astonished at the influence The Wrecking Crew wielded over rock and pop music in the 1960s and early 1970s. These unsung instrumentalists were the de-facto backing band on hit records by The Beach Boys, Phil Spector, Frank Sinatra, Nancy Sinatra, Sonny & Cher, Elvis, The Monkees and many more. These dedicated musicians brought the flair and musicianship that made the American “West Coast Sound” a dominant cultural force around the world.

wrinkles-the-clown-2e0a9f6f-86a7-4818-ba.title: Wrinkles the Clown
wrinkles-the-clown-2e0a9f6f-86a7-4818-ba.description: It started with a YouTube video: a sleeping child, oblivious to the clown slowly emerging from under her bed. Soon, more mysterious videos surfaced. Wrinkles The Clown explores the internet phenomenon and the hysteria it inspired.

zero-days-5fa78cb7-97b1-4582-95a7-2d9b4b.title: Zero Days
zero-days-5fa78cb7-97b1-4582-95a7-2d9b4b.description: Documentary that explores the phenomena of a famed computer virus.

24-hour-love-4fa80205-dcd3-48f4-82c1-527.title: 24 Hour Love
24-hour-love-4fa80205-dcd3-48f4-82c1-527.description: Seven people (Lynn Whitfield, Darius McCrary, Angell Conwell) experience laughter, life and matters of the heart.

28-days-later-83d001f9-979e-4a5b-99c1-95.title: 28 Days Later
28-days-later-83d001f9-979e-4a5b-99c1-95.description: A deadly virus transforms humans into bloodthirsty, rage-filled zombies that leave a handful of survivors on the run for their lives.

28-hotel-rooms-1b51f0a1-3dd3-47de-a085-b.title: 28 Hotel Rooms
28-hotel-rooms-1b51f0a1-3dd3-47de-a085-b.description: On a business trip a married woman and a novelist have a 1 night stand.  Their affair turns into a relationship when they run into each other a year later.

a-2nd-chance-5780d6a3-a897-4107-8728-501.title: A 2nd Chance
a-2nd-chance-5780d6a3-a897-4107-8728-501.description: A young girl and her coach overcome adversity to make their way into the National Gymnastics Competition.

4-lovers-ceeaa387-0155-4a26-9778-bac7985.title: 4 Lovers
4-lovers-ceeaa387-0155-4a26-9778-bac7985.description: In this sexy, French romantic drama, two couples decide to explore the boundaries of their relationships by swapping partners.

acrimony-c138d3ce-b6c7-4d78-94f5-6f2e889.title: Acrimony
acrimony-c138d3ce-b6c7-4d78-94f5-6f2e889.description: In Tyler Perry's sexy and electrifying thriller, a faithful wife (Taraji. P. Henson) is driven over the edge when it becomes clear she has been betrayed.

affairs-of-state-eafe112b-8ba3-4e6c-b4ee.title: Affairs of State
affairs-of-state-eafe112b-8ba3-4e6c-b4ee.description: A young DC aide kickstarts his government career by sleeping with powerful women. But after seducing a candidate's daughter, he learns the game of politics can be a deadly one.

after-darkness-abfafb77-e809-46a7-a7c3-7.title: After Darkness
