after-darkness-abfafb77-e809-46a7-a7c3-7.description: Natalia Dyer ("Stranger Things") and Kyra Sedgwick ("The Closer") highlight this apocalyptic sci-fi thriller about a family's fight to survive a solar disaster.

allure-47153631-2440-4c6b-95f3-03b2231cc.title: Allure
allure-47153631-2440-4c6b-95f3-03b2231cc.description: Although Laura works as a house cleaner for her father's company, her personal life is not so pristine. Rough around the edges, looking for love in all the wrong places, her behavior points to hardships of the past. One day Laura meets Eva, a quiet teenager who is unhappy with her disciplined life. In Eva, Laura rediscovers an innocent tenderness. In Laura, Eva finds a thrilling rebel who can bring her into unknown territories. Their mutual attraction soon morphs into obsession.

along-came-the-devil-7d081314-859f-4270-.title: Along Came the Devil
along-came-the-devil-7d081314-859f-4270-.description: Ashley (Sydney Sweeney, “The Handmaid’s Tale”) contacts the spirit world to speak to her dead mother and unknowingly unearths a demonic force.

american-buffalo-2a3d4c64-440a-4231-84d1.title: American Buffalo
american-buffalo-2a3d4c64-440a-4231-84d1.description: A pair of crooks and their young intern plot the theft of a valuable Buffalo-head nickel. Based on a 1975 play by David Mamet.

american-folk-e81b10c0-ef57-482a-a249-66.title: American Folk
american-folk-e81b10c0-ef57-482a-a249-66.description: Two strangers, both musicians, are grounded in California in the aftermath of 9/11 and embark on a hopeful, cross-country road trip set to a soundtrack of classic folk.

american-gun-e5bdad20-709e-40d4-affe-c77.title: American Gun
american-gun-e5bdad20-709e-40d4-affe-c77.description: A series of interwoven story lines brings to light how the proliferation of guns in America dramatically influence and shape every day lives.

american-venus-0f9f4167-5ae2-4459-9ef2-a.title: American Venus
american-venus-0f9f4167-5ae2-4459-9ef2-a.description: Jenna Lane (Jane McGregor) is a young woman trying to escape family pressure to become an Olympic athlete and define her own individuality. Her mother is Celia (Rebecca De Mornay), a deeply disturbed, emotionally abusive woman with a thing for handguns. As she attempts to manipulate Jenna and feed her addictions, Celia grows increasingly irrational and ultimately spirals out of control.

anesthesia-46536a0f-d860-42a5-9d5e-d613e.title: Anesthesia
anesthesia-46536a0f-d860-42a5-9d5e-d613e.description: Kristen Stewart & Sam Waterston lead a great ensemble cast in this provocative drama about a shocking crime on a snowy New York night that changes one man's life forever.

angel-of-mine-16be459b-139c-4d28-a565-7c.title: Angel of Mine
angel-of-mine-16be459b-139c-4d28-a565-7c.description: In this intense thriller, Noomi Rapace stars as a woman on the edge who believes the daughter of a neighbor is actually her own.

angel-of-mine-97945fd2-f4ce-480e-bca0-9f.title: Angel of Mine
angel-of-mine-97945fd2-f4ce-480e-bca0-9f.description: Elsa is fighting to keep custody of her son Thomas. One day while picking her son up from a birthday party, she notices a 6 year-old girl. Immediately, Elsa is convinced the girl is the daughter she lost in a hospital fire and becomes fixated on finding her again. Obsessed by this uncontrollable feeling, she manipulatively inches her way into the girl's life. The girl's mother progressively finds Elsa's behavior disturbing to the point of insisting that she stop intruding in their lives. Elsa, seemingly crazy, challenges the girl's mother by asking for DNA tests. The rivalry between the two women begins. A psychological face-off between two women who should never have met.

angels-in-the-snow-e2997e33-5f48-4069-89.title: Angels in the Snow
angels-in-the-snow-e2997e33-5f48-4069-89.description: The dysfunctional Montgomery family go to their cabin for Christmas where a blizzard traps them inside. When the Tucker family arrives needing shelter, they are welcomed inside and remind the Montgomery family how to love each other.

aniara-5b4ead06-f178-43fb-9f5f-5c03ddd45.title: Aniara
aniara-5b4ead06-f178-43fb-9f5f-5c03ddd45.description: A spaceship carrying settlers to Mars is knocked off course, causing the consumption-obsessed passengers to consider their place in the universe.

animals-495fe40f-24d4-4a06-92f5-fc09f256.title: Animals
animals-495fe40f-24d4-4a06-92f5-fc09f256.description: A young couple addicted to heroin must confront the difficult truth.

arbitrage-79e45b74-5059-4b8d-a4e3-1ce2b5.title: Arbitrage
arbitrage-79e45b74-5059-4b8d-a4e3-1ce2b5.description: Richard Gere leads an all-star cast in an electrifying thriller about a hedge-fund magnate whose fortunes turn when a deadly error threatens to destroy both his financial empire and his family.

astronaut-80f8b0dd-f1f3-443d-adf5-a36c38.title: Astronaut
astronaut-80f8b0dd-f1f3-443d-adf5-a36c38.description: One old man, one last dream - one golden ticket to the stars.

awol-253b8dcd-8d2c-41e0-be43-1ddfac389b9.title: AWOL
awol-253b8dcd-8d2c-41e0-be43-1ddfac389b9.description: Joey joins the Army as a way out of Pennsylvania coal country just as she falls in love with magnetic housewife Rayna. A splendid meditation on the boundless possibilities of first love constricted by the trials of poverty.

back-to-christmas-4aeea26d-08bf-4169-a0b.title: Back to Christmas
back-to-christmas-4aeea26d-08bf-4169-a0b.description: Ali wakes realizing she's reliving a past Christmas allowing her to change the path of her love life with her ex or with someone entirely unexpected!

bare-135cb152-d341-4c88-b8e4-384653d0c11.title: Bare
bare-135cb152-d341-4c88-b8e4-384653d0c11.description: An innocent young girl in a small Nevada town falls in love with a female drifter who leads her into a life of stripping, drugs, and psychedelic spiritual experiences.

beach-rats-138dda70-73ff-4ac4-b53e-4804f.title: Beach Rats
beach-rats-138dda70-73ff-4ac4-b53e-4804f.description: BEACH RATS follows a teenage Frankie (Harris Dickinson) on the outer edges of Brooklyn as he struggles to reconcile his competing sexual desires, leaving him hurtling towards irreparable consequences.

before-i-go-to-sleep-cbdfe49f-f647-4800-.title: Before I Go to Sleep
before-i-go-to-sleep-cbdfe49f-f647-4800-.description: A woman wakes up every day, remembering nothing as a result of a traumatic accident in her past. One day, new terrifying truths emerge that force her to question everyone around her.

ben-is-back-a7ec019d-d22a-474e-9045-1c49.title: Ben Is Back
ben-is-back-a7ec019d-d22a-474e-9045-1c49.description: Holly (Julia Roberts) is swept into a race against time after her 19-year old son (Lucas Hedges) returns home for Christmas – and suddenly disappears.

beyond-paradise-20caa197-ed7f-4e33-ab8f-.title: Beyond Paradise
beyond-paradise-20caa197-ed7f-4e33-ab8f-.description: Shahrzad, a talented music student, flees Iran and agrees to marry a man in Los Angeles. Her new life is quickly threatened by a passionate relationship with her piano teacher's gardener.

big-fish-716b502d-362e-4a97-a9a2-3c62f24.title: Big Fish
big-fish-716b502d-362e-4a97-a9a2-3c62f24.description: Tim Burton's delightful fantasy about a young man trying to understand his dying father whose life is defined by the tall stories he tells.

blind-fc96d142-8037-4a01-be67-693e027b3b.title: Blind
blind-fc96d142-8037-4a01-be67-693e027b3b.description: A bestselling novelist (Alec Baldwin) loses his sight in a vicious car crash. Five years later, a Socialite (Demi Moore) is forced to read to the novelist as a plea bargain for her husband's insider trading. A passionate affair ensues.

bolden-9ce97827-c933-48e7-bc9d-a879d26d2.title: Bolden
bolden-9ce97827-c933-48e7-bc9d-a879d26d2.description: BOLDEN imagines the compelling, powerful and tragic journey of Buddy Bolden, the unsung American hero who invented Jazz.

the-bookshop-543eb07e-f404-47dd-be58-acd.title: The Bookshop
the-bookshop-543eb07e-f404-47dd-be58-acd.description: Free-spirited widow Florence Green risks everything to open a bookshop in a conservative East Anglian coastal town. While bringing about a surprising cultural awakening through works by Ray Bradbury and Vladimir Nabokov.

the-boost-26e702b4-745b-4aa9-8da4-5ba7d2.title: The Boost
the-boost-26e702b4-745b-4aa9-8da4-5ba7d2.description: A real estate developer who enjoyed short-lived success seeks to regain his edge by using cocaine, but takes himself to new lows as he gets lost in the downward spiral of drug addiction.

borg-vs-mcenroe-95852fe0-1222-495b-85af-.title: Borg vs McEnroe
borg-vs-mcenroe-95852fe0-1222-495b-85af-.description: It's the summer of 1980, and Björn Borg is the top tennis player in the world, dominating the sport both on and off the court. A powerful and rigorously disciplined player, there is only one obstacle in his pursuit of a record-breaking fifth Wimbledon championship: the highly talented but ferociously abrasive young American John McEnroe. With three days until the tournament begins, Borg trains religiously in his lavish Monaco home, aided by his coach and mentor Lennart and girlfriend Mariana.

bpm-beats-per-minute-61ebd1b6-eda5-4b9a-.title: BPM (Beats Per Minute)
bpm-beats-per-minute-61ebd1b6-eda5-4b9a-.description: Nathan is a young man who joins an AIDS activist group in 1990s Paris. As he attends the weekly meetings, he learns that some members prefer a more radical approach to their protests.

brian-banks-fae60290-4b61-4fec-a6d7-9df1.title: Brian Banks
brian-banks-fae60290-4b61-4fec-a6d7-9df1.description: An All-American football player's dreams to play in the NFL are halted when he is wrongly convicted and sent to prison. Years later, he fights to clear his name within an unjust system.

catching-faith-4f04839d-5e9e-430d-af10-1.title: Catching Faith
catching-faith-4f04839d-5e9e-430d-af10-1.description: Alexa Taylor has a seemingly perfect life: Her daughter is an excellent student and her son is a star football player. But when things go wrong and friends turn their backs, Alexa learns that faith and family matters most.

the-childhood-of-a-leader-216bc3d7-688b-.title: The Childhood of a Leader
the-childhood-of-a-leader-216bc3d7-688b-.description: Robert Pattinson and Bérénice Bejo lead a powerhouse cast in this dark coming-of-age story in which a Hitler-esque dictator is born amid the rising tide of fascism.

christmas-belle-2f2867b2-7fa6-4c49-b4de-.title: Christmas Belle
christmas-belle-2f2867b2-7fa6-4c49-b4de-.description: It's "Beauty and the Beast" for Christmas when auctioneer Belle goes to catalog and finalize Hunter's estate sale. Hunter begins to soften as they work together, though, putting both the estate sale and Belle's heart in jeopardy.

the-christmas-calendar-f5dc2716-13c1-4a6.title: The Christmas Calendar
the-christmas-calendar-f5dc2716-13c1-4a6.description: When Emily, a small town baker, receives a Christmas Calendar from a secret admirer, it attracts the attention of the locals. With financial problems looming, the calendar turns out to be a Christmas miracle for Emily and the bakery.

christmas-perfection-c2dd3a4b-a72a-4c07-.title: Christmas Perfection
christmas-perfection-c2dd3a4b-a72a-4c07-.description: A woman magically wakes up in her perfect Christmas village in Ireland.

coffin-rock-44301331-d1a2-4384-81d2-01c7.title: Coffin Rock
coffin-rock-44301331-d1a2-4384-81d2-01c7.description: A married woman's careless one-night-stand becomes a nightmare when her lover ruthlessly stalks her family, in this edge-of-your-seat thriller.

the-cokeville-miracle-bb4c548d-523b-4a20.title: The Cokeville Miracle
the-cokeville-miracle-bb4c548d-523b-4a20.description: Children who were held hostage in their elementary school tell stories of miraculous things, but many adults are skeptical that the Cokeville Miracle ever truly happened.

the-commune-9d2a731a-ad87-49f0-b86e-dcce.title: The Commune
the-commune-9d2a731a-ad87-49f0-b86e-dcce.description: From Oscar-nominated director Thomas Vinterberg (The Celebration, The Hunt), comes a funny and moving story of family and free love set in a freewheeling 1970s commune. Danish with English subtitles.

the-conspirator-261deebf-1eb5-40a1-bfe1-.title: The Conspirator
the-conspirator-261deebf-1eb5-40a1-bfe1-.description: Abraham Lincoln's assassination is viewed from the perspective of the lone female conspirator charged in the case.

the-cooler-fb8d8fcf-2bc3-465f-b3cc-471ae.title: The Cooler
the-cooler-fb8d8fcf-2bc3-465f-b3cc-471ae.description: A Las Vegas casino employee who is paid to pass his bad luck onto streaking gamblers goes on a roll thanks to a pretty cocktail waitress.

the-counterfeit-traitor-bda922af-d8fd-43.title: The Counterfeit Traitor
the-counterfeit-traitor-bda922af-d8fd-43.description: There's no way out for American-raised Swede Eric Erickson. Either he becomes an Allied spy, or he faces a trumped-up charge of Nazi collaboration. "How does one get to be so cold-blooded?"

cover-versions-407ac53d-620e-4ecc-963f-4.title: Cover Versions
cover-versions-407ac53d-620e-4ecc-963f-4.description: Four band members tell varying accounts of a night of sex, drugs, and murder before their first big show at a popular music festival.

creed-ii-4fa1a602-83b4-4cd1-95cd-9e52c17.title: Creed II
creed-ii-4fa1a602-83b4-4cd1-95cd-9e52c17.description: Life has become a balancing act for Adonis Creed (Michael B. Jordan). Between personal obligations and training for his next fight, he is up against the challenge of his life

a-crooked-somebody-be1f4c87-efb8-4c8c-ad.title: A Crooked Somebody
a-crooked-somebody-be1f4c87-efb8-4c8c-ad.description: Michael Vaughn, a phony psychic medium, is kidnapped by a guilt-ridden murderer who believes Michael can help him make peace with the spirit of his dead victim.

cruise-f3a8b4f5-83c2-41b8-9455-46ccc6907.title: Cruise
cruise-f3a8b4f5-83c2-41b8-9455-46ccc6907.description: Set in the 1980s, a young Italian-American from the "wrong side of the tracks" falls for a Jewish girl from Long Island.

crypto-8cc65e63-46ab-4482-914e-e815dd77c.title: Crypto
crypto-8cc65e63-46ab-4482-914e-e815dd77c.description: In this cyber-thriller starring Kurt Russell and Beau Knapp, a Wall Street banker connects a small-town art gallery to a global conspiracy, putting his own family in grave danger.

dans-paris-80d88c07-cd20-4e01-8e00-da7e5.title: Dans Paris
dans-paris-80d88c07-cd20-4e01-8e00-da7e5.description: Depression has never looked so hip as it does in this Parisian youth pic, about two brothers: one goes through a breakup, the other on a tour of women's bedrooms.

dark-shadows-the-haunting-of-collinwood-.title: Dark Shadows: The Haunting of Collinwood
dark-shadows-the-haunting-of-collinwood-.description: Barnabas Collins and Dr. Julia Hoffman attempt to uncover the mysterious happenings at the haunted Collinwood estate when the children become possessed by an evil spirit.

dark-shadows-the-vampire-curse-ac8a003c-.title: Dark Shadows: The Vampire Curse
dark-shadows-the-vampire-curse-ac8a003c-.description: Cursed by the scorned witch Angelique, Barnabas Collins rises from the dead as a vampire. He seeks to reclaim his true love and save his family from further destruction.

the-den-d6a06f6a-5d7f-4da0-a5ec-83234b6c.title: The Den
the-den-d6a06f6a-5d7f-4da0-a5ec-83234b6c.description: After receiving a grant for her graduate thesis, Elizabeth Benton (Melanie Papalia) logs onto a video-chat site known as The Den, on a mission to explore the habits of its users.  During one of her random video-chats, Elizabeth watches in horror as a teenage girl is gruesomely murdered in front of her webcam. While the police dismiss it as a viral prank, Elizabeth believes what she saw is real and takes it upon herself to find the truth.  Her life quickly spirals out of control as she gets pulled deeper into the darkest recesses of the internet.  And eventually, Elizabeth finds herself trapped in a twisted game in which she and her loved ones are targeted for the same grisly fate as the first victim.

denial-a3246acd-58e3-48c0-9023-bd132e92d.title: Denial
denial-a3246acd-58e3-48c0-9023-bd132e92d.description: A historian must battle for historical truth when she is sued for libel.

diane-bd1341ee-262c-4bef-9f48-0021e09460.title: Diane
diane-bd1341ee-262c-4bef-9f48-0021e09460.description: Mary Kay Place is extraordinary as a woman coming to terms with her troubled past in this beautiful story of redemption.

digging-for-fire-c07dc922-d7cf-4c75-85c2.title: Digging for Fire
digging-for-fire-c07dc922-d7cf-4c75-85c2.description: The discovery of a bone and a rusty old gun send a husband and wife on separate adventures over the course of a weekend.

the-disappointments-room-7c98d711-2d58-4.title: The Disappointments Room
the-disappointments-room-7c98d711-2d58-4.description: A mother and her young son release unimaginable horrors from a hidden room in the attic of their rural dream home.

disorder-5f03ec70-117a-41e0-b80b-30bea28.title: Disorder
disorder-5f03ec70-117a-41e0-b80b-30bea28.description: Suffering from post-traumatic stress disorder, a security guard (Matthias Schoenaerts) utilizes his training as a French special forces soldier to protect the wife (Diane Kruger) and son (Zaïd Errougui-Demonsant) of a shady Lebanese businessman.

dont-go-bbc84ef9-b7af-400a-a78e-242b2f44.title: Don't Go
dont-go-bbc84ef9-b7af-400a-a78e-242b2f44.description: Between dreams and reality lies a terrifying hidden truth… A grieving father's nightmare holds the key to his daughter's death in this tantalizing psychological puzzle.

downhill-racer-9c61b6b6-7584-4800-aac2-5.title: Downhill Racer
downhill-racer-9c61b6b6-7584-4800-aac2-5.description: An ambitious American Skier gains a place on the team competing in Europe.

driverx-95031ca6-99a6-407e-9f40-d036b8d9.title: DriverX
driverx-95031ca6-99a6-407e-9f40-d036b8d9.description: Follow rideshare driver Leonard on a voyage through LA's late-night, temptation-filled party scene, where you never know who's going to get into your car next.

the-duchess-of-langeais-89e3b310-6208-4e.title: The Duchess of Langeais
the-duchess-of-langeais-89e3b310-6208-4e.description: Antoinette (Balibara) is the Duchess, a married coquette who frequents the most extravagant balls in 1820's Paris during The Restoration. Hypocrisy and vanity reign. Handsome general Armand de Montriveau (Guillaume Depardieu) feels true love upon first meeting the Duchess. Flattered, the alluring Antoinette orchestrates a calculated game of seduction, but repeatedly refuses the general. Despite his sincere romantic declarations, Montriveau's passion remains unfulfilled. When he eventually seeks revenge, Antoinette's love awakens. But it may well be too late for the star-crossed lovers.

the-duke-of-burgundy-26e7793d-9635-45c0-.title: The Duke of Burgundy
the-duke-of-burgundy-26e7793d-9635-45c0-.description: Sex, bondage, and butterflies: two women explore the extremes of carnal desire in this kinky, deliciously twisted tale of erotic obsession. In a crumbling European estate, butterfly researcher Cynthia (Sidse Babett Knudsen) and her lover Evelyn (Chiara D'Anna) repeatedly enact a sadomasochistic role-playing game, with Cynthia as the stern mistress and Evelyn her subservient sex slave. But as the lines between fantasy and reality begin to blur, and Cynthia grows increasingly uneasy with Evelyn’s insatiable appetite for punishment, their relationship is pushed to the limit. Dripping with dreamlike imagery, Gothic atmosphere, and a lush chamber pop score by Cat’s Eyes, this critically-acclaimed, darkly comic erotic fantasia is a seductive feast for the senses.

errors-of-the-human-body-f7ce69d1-3fb2-4.title: Errors of the Human Body
errors-of-the-human-body-f7ce69d1-3fb2-4.description: Haunted by a personal loss, a brilliant geneticist working on a top-secret project unwittingly unleashes a new virus in this intense sci-fi thriller.

the-escape-d9235d73-ad4a-48b1-b59f-d597c.title: The Escape
the-escape-d9235d73-ad4a-48b1-b59f-d597c.description: A struggling housewife sets out to reclaim her life in this stirring, emotionally rich look at what it means to become yourself. Gemma Arterton and Dominic Cooper star.

every-day-023037e1-3133-47d0-9fe2-68f2b5.title: Every Day
every-day-023037e1-3133-47d0-9fe2-68f2b5.description: "Every Day" tells the story of Rhiannon, a 16-year old girl who falls in love with a mysterious spirit named "A" that inhabits a different body every day.

every-other-holiday-90bf447b-5579-4bd9-9.title: Every Other Holiday
every-other-holiday-90bf447b-5579-4bd9-9.description: A young divorced mom takes her ex-husband home for the holidays to fulfill the one Christmas wish of her children, but finds herself caught between her protective mother and the ex she discovers she still loves.

evolution-051b2fd5-ddbc-44cd-91da-fcadae.title: Evolution
evolution-051b2fd5-ddbc-44cd-91da-fcadae.description: In this sci-fi thriller, a remote island is inhabited by young boys who are subjected to strange medical treatments. Soon one boy makes a disturbing discovery beneath the waves.

experimenter-db2f4121-0b66-4683-a081-af3.title: Experimenter
experimenter-db2f4121-0b66-4683-a081-af3.description: Yale University, 1961. Stanley Milgram (Peter Sarsgaard) designs a psychology experiment that remains relevant to this day, in which people think they’re delivering painful electric shocks to an affable stranger (Jim Gaffigan) strapped into a chair in another room. Disregarding his pleas for mercy, the majority of subjects do not stop the experiment, administering what they think are near-fatal electric shots, simply because they’ve been told to. Milgram’s exploration of authority and conformity strikes a nerve in popular culture and the scientific community. Celebrated in some circles, he is also accused of being a deceptive, manipulative monster. His wife Sasha (Winona Ryder) anchors him through it all.

eyes-of-an-angel-a279bcae-e411-4a5e-a971.title: Eyes of an Angel
eyes-of-an-angel-a279bcae-e411-4a5e-a971.description: Bobby Allen (John Travolta) is a small-time crook working as a bagman for the mob in Chicago. When circumstances force Bobby to turn against his brother-in-law, he realizes Chicago is no longer a safe place for him.

eyes-wide-shut-02010788-317e-46ed-8703-d.title: Eyes Wide Shut
eyes-wide-shut-02010788-317e-46ed-8703-d.description: Tom Cruise and Nicole Kidman star as a married couple entangled in an intricate web of jealousy and sexual obsession in Stanley Kubrick's final cinematic offering.

fast-color-503cbc32-eede-4095-ac1a-f78d7.title: Fast Color
fast-color-503cbc32-eede-4095-ac1a-f78d7.description: Hunted by mysterious forces and a local sheriff, a young woman with supernatural abilities flees back to her family-and unearths the depths of the power within her.

fathers-daughters-3ad6427a-486a-426b-aee.title: Fathers & Daughters
fathers-daughters-3ad6427a-486a-426b-aee.description: A Pulitzer-winning writer grapples with being a widower and father after a mental breakdown, while, 27 years later, his grown daughter struggles to forge connections of her own.

the-field-guide-to-evil-a7d40372-06d8-44.title: The Field Guide to Evil
the-field-guide-to-evil-a7d40372-06d8-44.description: This global anthology of eight narratives explores dark folklore through a series of myths and tales that have captivated, galvanized and frightened communities throughout history.

fierce-people-9631d751-6807-4497-bbe1-9a.title: Fierce People
fierce-people-9631d751-6807-4497-bbe1-9a.description: A massage therapist and her son move into the mansion of a wealthy client, but a shocking event changes their lives.

the-final-cut-e8e19eec-dd4f-4dd9-b1f4-d7.title: The Final Cut
the-final-cut-e8e19eec-dd4f-4dd9-b1f4-d7.description: In world with memory recording implants, Alan Hakman's job is to edit people's recorded histories. But his latest assignment puts him in grave danger.

first-girl-i-loved-ec5f5be9-60a4-471d-95.title: First Girl I Loved
first-girl-i-loved-ec5f5be9-60a4-471d-95.description: In this Sundance award-winner, high-school misfit Anne falls in love with Sasha, the beautiful star of the softball team. When Anne tells her best friend Clifton about her new crush, his jealousy threatens more than just the girls' budding romance.

flight-of-the-red-balloon-62f7c11c-1a74-.title: Flight of the Red Balloon
flight-of-the-red-balloon-62f7c11c-1a74-.description: A boy is followed by a mysterious balloon around Paris, a city that has never looked so beautiful as when shot by the world's most lauded director, Hou Hsiao Hsien.

forever-my-girl-0a025c38-2907-4cf5-ac67-.title: Forever My Girl
forever-my-girl-0a025c38-2907-4cf5-ac67-.description: A country music super-star returns to his hometown after leaving his love behind 8 years ago.

foxfire-b7f09cf7-06d8-4687-870f-b38b312a.title: Foxfire
foxfire-b7f09cf7-06d8-4687-870f-b38b312a.description: Four high school girls form a gang when an enigmatic 17-year-old female drifter comes to town. The girls learn about lesbianism, drug addiction and empowerment, all of which transforms them forever.

free-willy-00fb6502-6451-4e1c-9940-ea898.title: Free Willy
free-willy-00fb6502-6451-4e1c-9940-ea898.description: When maladjusted orphan Jesse (Jason James Richter) vandalizes a theme park, he is placed with foster parents and must work at the park to make amends. There he meets Willy, a young Orca whale who has been separated from his family. Sensing kinship, they form a bond and, with the help of kindly whale trainer Rae Lindley (Lori Petty), develop a routine of tricks. However, greedy park owner Dial (Michael Ironside) soon catches wind of the duo and makes plans to profit from them.

free-willy-2-the-adventure-home-12971a0e.title: Free Willy 2: The Adventure Home
free-willy-2-the-adventure-home-12971a0e.description: It's been two years since a brave 12-year-old boy rescued a majestic orca whale named Willy, but their reunion is marred when an oil spill threatens Willy's pod.

the-frozen-ground-fef057d6-c315-4355-aff.title: The Frozen Ground
the-frozen-ground-fef057d6-c315-4355-aff.description: Inspired by the incredible true story that follows Alaskan State Trooper Jack Halcombe as he sets out to end the murderous rampage of Robert Hansen, a serial killer who has gone unnoticed for 13 years.

gemini-f993a2e8-4b6a-455a-9965-ce7250188.title: Gemini
gemini-f993a2e8-4b6a-455a-9965-ce7250188.description: A heinous crime tests the complex relationship between a Hollywood starlet and her tenacious personal assistant. As the assistant unravels the mystery, she must confront her own understanding of friendship, truth and celebrity.

the-german-doctor-e269e628-7f0f-4766-98c.title: The German Doctor
the-german-doctor-e269e628-7f0f-4766-98c.description: A German physician meets an Argentinean family who is gradually won over by his charisma, manners, knowledge and money—until they discover they are living with one of the most heinous criminals of all time.

getting-go-the-go-doc-project-5e8dc808-c.title: Getting Go: The Go Doc Project
getting-go-the-go-doc-project-5e8dc808-c.description: After becoming infatuated with a hunky New York go-go dancer, college boy Doc devises a plan to get close to his crush by asking him to be the main subject in a makeshift documentary.

the-girl-king-0a988f5c-629e-40c3-b5cb-8d.title: The Girl King
the-girl-king-0a988f5c-629e-40c3-b5cb-8d.description: Sweden’s Queen Kristina, a flamboyant and unpredictable woman who ascended the throne at age six, was raised as a prince and strived to bring peace and education to her country—all while pursuing an illicit romance with her female royal attendant.

the-girl-under-the-waves-a079d6d2-0d34-4.title: The Girl Under the Waves
the-girl-under-the-waves-a079d6d2-0d34-4.description: A man and a woman begin a romance when they mistakenly move into the same apartment. The film uses innovative techniques including actor improvised lines, long takes, title cards and on camera director interaction.

golden-exits-9c9cdec7-3fde-4686-ba8d-8d8.title: Golden Exits
golden-exits-9c9cdec7-3fde-4686-ba8d-8d8.description: An intersectional narrative of two families in Brooklyn and the unraveling of unspoken unhappiness that occurs when a young woman spending time abroad upsets the balance on both sides.

golden-gate-63a122da-a798-4902-8f12-6b6e.title: Golden Gate
golden-gate-63a122da-a798-4902-8f12-6b6e.description: Golden Gate is a stylish, compelling tale of mystery, intrigue and revenge! As a brash young F.B.I. agent comes to terms with his past, he unexpectedly falls in love with the beautiful daughter of a man he unjustly sent to prison years before!

gone-f56430cc-d65c-4610-8460-9ee8db80c27.title: Gone
gone-f56430cc-d65c-4610-8460-9ee8db80c27.description: The police don't believe her, so a woman (Amanda Seyfried) sets out alone to track the serial killer she escaped from in the past and who she now believes has abducted her sister.

good-will-hunting-0bf6e2a3-4a3f-40f3-b0c.title: Good Will Hunting
good-will-hunting-0bf6e2a3-4a3f-40f3-b0c.description: Robin Williams is a therapist who comes to the aid of a brilliant, but troubled Boston youth played by Matt Damon.

goodbye-first-love-03ea915e-b3d7-4334-88.title: Goodbye First Love
goodbye-first-love-03ea915e-b3d7-4334-88.description: Mia Hansen-Love returns with GOODBYE FIRST LOVE, an acutely perceptive portrait of a bright young woman in the wake of her first romance. Fifteen-year-old Camille (Lola Creton) is a serious girl who has fallen in love with the cheerful Sullivan (Sebastian Urzendowsky), an older boy who returns her feelings, mostly, but wants to be free to explore the world. When he leaves her to travel, she is devastated, but develops over the following years, into a more fully formed woman, with new interests and a new love - and the possibility that she'll be less defenseless when Sullivan enters her life again. Hansen-Love's follow up to the award-winning THE FATHER OF MY CHILDREN is filled with scenes that showcase her extraordinary ability to evoke moods and feelings. The story of a young woman's first romance is made into a singular experience, familiar in its broad strokes and yet so specific that it feels uniquely personal.

gorky-park-d038ef12-305c-4aa9-851d-80236.title: Gorky Park
gorky-park-d038ef12-305c-4aa9-851d-80236.description: An detective on the Moscow police force relentlessly pursues the killer of a triple homicide in Moscow's Gorky Park only to find his investigation uncovers a political conspiracy that no one wants exposed.

grace-unplugged-652f1efd-0431-4b47-b179-.title: Grace Unplugged
grace-unplugged-652f1efd-0431-4b47-b179-.description: Having just turned 18, Grace Trey (AJ Michalka) aspires to more than just singing at her church, where the worship leader is her father (James Denton), a former pop star.

greater-e79f512c-b3b6-4be9-ae6c-c8d51ecd.title: Greater
greater-e79f512c-b3b6-4be9-ae6c-c8d51ecd.description: Told he lacked the skills to play on his school's football team, University of Arkansas student Brandon Burlsworth made the team as a walk-on, eventually becoming a captain and star offensive lineman for the illustrious Arkansas Razorbacks.

haze-0f4d4a13-4f92-444f-9cda-9c4ea8a3d0b.title: Haze
haze-0f4d4a13-4f92-444f-9cda-9c4ea8a3d0b.description: In the aftermath of a brutal hazing death, a college freshman's desire to join a fraternity is threatened when his older brother launches an anti-hazing crusade.

the-heart-of-christmas-7cb55098-8e2c-432.title: The Heart of Christmas
the-heart-of-christmas-7cb55098-8e2c-432.description: Megan (Candace Cameron Bure) re-examines her priorities after she sees people decorating for Christmas in October to help a family celebrate Christmas with their dying son.

henry-gambles-birthday-party-210490f1-55.title: Henry Gamble's Birthday Party
henry-gambles-birthday-party-210490f1-55.description: Henry Gamble is turning 17 today. As Henry treads through various sexual possibilities trying to finally come into his own, so too do the adults and teenagers at the party.

the-hero-79d096f4-f785-4b4a-8b23-5181c9f.title: The Hero
the-hero-79d096f4-f785-4b4a-8b23-5181c9f.description: World-renowned icon Sam Elliott stars as an aging actor confronting mortality in THE HERO, a beautifully poignant celebration of life and the legacies we leave behind.  Also starring Laura Prepon, Nick Offerman, and Krysten Ritter.

high-strung-b9bbfdf6-4442-46f8-a2d7-48c5.title: High Strung
high-strung-b9bbfdf6-4442-46f8-a2d7-48c5.description: When a Midwest dancer and a street-wise British musician meet in New York, they immediately clash but there’s an undeniable attraction as well. The two must navigate their differences for a competition that will change their lives forever.

hollow-in-the-land-f17b5b10-11db-401f-ad.title: Hollow in the Land
hollow-in-the-land-f17b5b10-11db-401f-ad.description: When Alison's brother goes missing after being named the primary suspect in a trailer park murder, she must unearth the truth before her brother ends up behind bars or inside a casket. The harder she looks, the more people turn up dead.

the-housemaid-4f60c539-f412-413c-a166-68.title: The Housemaid
the-housemaid-4f60c539-f412-413c-a166-68.description: Eun-yi (Do-yeon Jeon), a poor Korean woman, takes a job as a domestic servant in the lavish home of Hoon Goh (Jung-jae Lee), a handsome businessman whose wife Hae-ra (Seo Woo) is pregnant. Under the tutelage of her new boss, longtime employee and familial confidant Byung-sik (Yeo-Jong Yun), Eun-yi quickly learns the ways of the house -- and that Hoon's word is law. But when Eun-yi allows Hoon to seduce her, the benefits of her new position become dwarfed by the consequences of her actions.

the-housemaid-53ea3f7f-d81f-45de-b106-ac.title: The Housemaid
the-housemaid-53ea3f7f-d81f-45de-b106-ac.description: A forbidden passion awakens vengeful spirits within a haunted mansion in this bloodcurdling, erotic tour-de-force.

howl-eecb4126-366f-40e8-906c-9589ba51f0d.title: Howl
howl-eecb4126-366f-40e8-906c-9589ba51f0d.description: James Franco delivers a career-defining performance as poet Allen Ginsberg. Through his search for personal and creative expression, Ginsberg writes HOWL, and must contend with attorney Jake Ehrlich (Jon Hamm) during HOWL'S bizarre obscenity trial.

the-hunchback-of-notre-dame-1dc3e7c8-746.title: The Hunchback of Notre Dame
the-hunchback-of-notre-dame-1dc3e7c8-746.description: In fifteenth century Paris, the brother of the archdeacon plots with the gypsy king to foment a peasant revolt. Meanwhile, a freakish hunchback falls in love with the gypsy queen.

hungry-hearts-69081f68-edd2-4b69-a606-2e.title: Hungry Hearts
hungry-hearts-69081f68-edd2-4b69-a606-2e.description: A new mother's increasingly unstable behavior threatens her relationship with her husband (Adam Driver) and the life of her infant.

i-can-only-imagine-f3cdf020-4ad7-474f-87.title: I Can Only Imagine
i-can-only-imagine-f3cdf020-4ad7-474f-87.description: The inspiring true story behind Christian band MercyMe's beloved, chart topping song that brings ultimate hope to so many with the power of true love and forgiveness.

i-kill-giants-025e53a2-4539-4784-a42a-8b.title: I Kill Giants
i-kill-giants-025e53a2-4539-4784-a42a-8b.description: A teen must face her fears in increasingly dangerous ways when horrible giants threaten to destroy her small town.

i-killed-my-bff-the-preachers-daughter-8.title: I Killed My BFF: The Preacher's Daughter
i-killed-my-bff-the-preachers-daughter-8.description: Inspired by true events, Lily Miller is the perfect preacher's daughter until wild child Rae Farwell meets and starts dating Lily's twin brother Jason.

i-trapped-the-devil-824979b4-53c5-4501-8.title: I Trapped the Devil
i-trapped-the-devil-824979b4-53c5-4501-8.description: After trapping what he believes to be the devil, a man caught in a spiral of paranoia, trauma and evil unravels when his estranged family shows up for Christmas.

ill-come-running-a6d811bc-61af-422f-9b94.title: I'll Come Running
ill-come-running-a6d811bc-61af-422f-9b94.description: A young American woman finds herself drawn to a last-minute trip to Denmark, so that she can learn more about the man she loves.

it-5fe80e90-748e-4c2e-ace2-b0b37f591a41.title: I.T.
it-5fe80e90-748e-4c2e-ace2-b0b37f591a41.description: Mike Regan (Pierce Brosnan) is a successful, self-made man. But he soon finds himself in a deadly game of cat-and-mouse when his I.T. consultant uses his skills to endanger Mike’s family, business and life.

the-intended-40789903-3bf7-4856-b61e-59a.title: The Intended
the-intended-40789903-3bf7-4856-b61e-59a.description: A woman and her young lover arrive at a Malaysian ivory trading post, unleashing greed, murder and madness onto the outpost's inhabitants. This riveting drama stars Janet McTeer, Olympia Dukakis and Brenda Fricker.

ismaels-ghosts-543755b7-3beb-4eba-a5d9-3.title: Ismael's Ghosts
ismaels-ghosts-543755b7-3beb-4eba-a5d9-3.description: Twenty-one years ago, she ran away. And twenty-one years later, Carlotta (Marion Cotillard) is back from the void. But Ismael (Mathieu Amalric) has been busy rebuilding his life with Sylvia (Charlotte Gainsbourg) and working on his next feature film.

johnny-mad-dog-134a81fa-db26-4e61-abb3-3.title: Johnny Mad Dog
johnny-mad-dog-134a81fa-db26-4e61-abb3-3.description: An African child soldier fights to rediscover his humanity.

just-charlie-07ee528d-5e9e-426f-977b-742.title: Just Charlie
just-charlie-07ee528d-5e9e-426f-977b-742.description: Young soccer star Charlie has the world at his feet. With a top club desperate to sign him, his future is seemingly mapped out. But the teenager sees only a nightmare. Trapped in the body of a boy, Charlie is torn between wanting to live up to her father’s expectations and shedding this ill-fitting skin. Charlie’s next move will tear the family apart and threaten everything they hold dear.

killer-grandma-b5a4fedc-6600-4f4c-b82f-4.title: Killer Grandma
killer-grandma-b5a4fedc-6600-4f4c-b82f-4.description: Melissa, a happily married woman with an eight-year-old daughter invites her husband's mother to live with them.

the-killer-next-door-16260e6a-84f7-4c75-.title: The Killer Next Door
the-killer-next-door-16260e6a-84f7-4c75-.description: After Julie's husband dies in a car crash, she moves across the country to start fresh with her son Matty and build a closer relationship with her late husband's twin sister, Alison. Little does she know, Alison blames Julie for her brother's death.

kinsey-019b117b-3eb5-4883-a8f2-5dcd4cd36.title: Kinsey
kinsey-019b117b-3eb5-4883-a8f2-5dcd4cd36.description: Liam Neeson stars in this critically acclaimed drama that details Professor Alfred Kinsey's groundbreaking work on human sexual behavior.

knives-and-skin-f048d4fa-eb0f-4261-8437-.title: Knives and Skin
knives-and-skin-f048d4fa-eb0f-4261-8437-.description: A small-town collapses into disarray after a teenage girl goes missing and her friends and their families become ensnared in a web of lies, suspicion, and depravity.

lady-in-a-cage-cd815b8e-25ba-4302-80f1-5.title: Lady in a Cage
lady-in-a-cage-cd815b8e-25ba-4302-80f1-5.description: When her home elevator breaks, trapping her inside, a sophisticated widow becomes a desperate prisoner of the cage like elevator and invading hoodlums

leaving-0201d488-878d-4416-8c41-929f8973.title: Leaving
leaving-0201d488-878d-4416-8c41-929f8973.description: Kristin Scott Thomas plays a married woman whose forbidden, adulterous affair with a handyman prompts her jealous husband to launch a revengeful campaign of blackmail.

legendary-24f9d714-c931-4ea7-a9ca-d8ca1e.title: Legendary
legendary-24f9d714-c931-4ea7-a9ca-d8ca1e.description: A book-smart teenager joins his school's wrestling team as a way to reunite his surviving family members, who split apart after the death of his father, a college wrestling legend, 10 years ago.

little-men-8bc95a25-67d2-4417-9c7b-3e0b9.title: Little Men
little-men-8bc95a25-67d2-4417-9c7b-3e0b9.description: When 13-year-old Jake’s (Theo Taplitz) grandfather dies, his family moves from Manhattan back into his father’s Brooklyn home.

little-richard-bd6f5fbc-8ca9-47f3-9f30-b.title: Little Richard
little-richard-bd6f5fbc-8ca9-47f3-9f30-b.description: The story of the music icon's extraordinary life on stage and off - highlighted by original recordings of some of the most popular rock 'n' roll songs of all time.

little-woods-731bbb18-2a1e-45cb-812d-181.title: Little Woods
little-woods-731bbb18-2a1e-45cb-812d-181.description: Ollie (Tessa Thompson) is at the end of her probation after running prescription pills. But when her mother dies, she is thrust back into the life of her sister Deb (Lily James), who is contending with an unplanned pregnancy and a deadbeat ex.

liz-in-september-59a73887-ccd4-4726-ac31.title: Liz in September
liz-in-september-59a73887-ccd4-4726-ac31.description: Every year, Liz, a hardcore party girl and womanizer, celebrates her birthday with her friends at a Caribbean beach retreat. This year is different.

lords-of-chaos-75256b5c-9098-45b2-8fdd-3.title: Lords of Chaos
lords-of-chaos-75256b5c-9098-45b2-8fdd-3.description: A teenager's quest to launch Norwegian Black Metal in Oslo in the early 1990s results in a very violent outcome.

loro-7542336b-4958-40c8-b5db-3a3cf9df0b2.title: Loro
loro-7542336b-4958-40c8-b5db-3a3cf9df0b2.description: Sex, drugs, power, and vice: the latest from Oscar(R)-winning director Paolo Sorrentino is a dazzling, audacious plunge into the scandalous world of Silvio Berlusconi.

love-mercy-bd3e7930-987f-4670-b0f2-a93c1.title: Love & Mercy
love-mercy-bd3e7930-987f-4670-b0f2-a93c1.description: John Cusack and Paul Dano star as Beach Boys genius Brian Wilson in this film that intimately examines the unique journey and ultimate salvation of the musical icon.

love-after-love-9e17c18a-f106-4b61-8a35-.title: Love After Love
love-after-love-9e17c18a-f106-4b61-8a35-.description: Andie MacDowell shines as a mother exploring a new beginning while watching her sons' lives fall apart in this funny and inspiring drama.

low-down-1ebecafc-b493-4a93-a139-00bd518.title: Low Down
low-down-1ebecafc-b493-4a93-a139-00bd518.description: Jazz pianist Joe Albany (John Hawkes) and his daughter Amy-Jo (Elle Fanning) battle insurmountable odds in seedy 1970s Los Angeles in this compassionate and compelling story of the unwavering love between a father and a daughter.

luce-0af00f9d-02ea-41ad-9354-20725f44a60.title: Luce
luce-0af00f9d-02ea-41ad-9354-20725f44a60.description: An all-star high school athlete and accomplished debater, Luce is a poster boy for the new American Dream. When Luce’s teacher makes a shocking discovery his stellar reputation is called into question.

ma-ma-81e1fb1d-4baf-476b-9e29-756a50b06b.title: Ma Ma
ma-ma-81e1fb1d-4baf-476b-9e29-756a50b06b.description: Oscar-winner Penelope Cruz delivers the performance of her career as Magda, a woman who is determined to live life to the fullest in the face of her recent breast cancer diagnosis. In Spanish w/ English subtitles.

mad-to-be-normal-c41f0c91-32e5-437f-8547.title: Mad to Be Normal
mad-to-be-normal-c41f0c91-32e5-437f-8547.description: Scottish psychiatrist R.D. Laing performs various daring experiments on people who were diagnosed as mentally disturbed.

the-man-who-could-cheat-death-a3caa619-7.title: The Man Who Could Cheat Death
the-man-who-could-cheat-death-a3caa619-7.description: A man experimenting with immortality must have a gland operation every ten years to keep from reverting to his true age and dying a horrible death.

manglehorn-002e4b9d-541a-4d01-a1d8-b994a.title: Manglehorn
manglehorn-002e4b9d-541a-4d01-a1d8-b994a.description: Al Pacino and Holly Hunter give moving performances as a cat loving locksmith and a lovelorn bank teller who are both transformed by a new romance in this magical love story.

mapplethorpe-0a6f7629-c251-499b-bfa2-791.title: Mapplethorpe
mapplethorpe-0a6f7629-c251-499b-bfa2-791.description: A portrait of the celebrated yet controversial photographer Robert Mapplethorpe whose relationship with Patti Smith and other icons of the '70s New York influenced his photographs.

margarita-with-a-straw-834c0fbe-b30a-4cd.title: Margarita with a Straw
margarita-with-a-straw-834c0fbe-b30a-4cd.description: A beautiful and personal story of a luminous Indian teenager (Kalki Koechlin) with cerebral palsy who leaves her homeland to study in New York, falls in love with a young blind woman, and begins a remarkable journey to self-discovery and independence.

marguerite-julien-37ab22e2-cd9f-484f-8a4.title: Marguerite & Julien
marguerite-julien-37ab22e2-cd9f-484f-8a4.description: Forbidden passion blazes between a brother and sister in this feverishly sexy romance.

meeks-cutoff-bc14e4ca-951a-4085-af10-da4.title: Meek's Cutoff
meeks-cutoff-bc14e4ca-951a-4085-af10-da4.description: Set in 1845, this drama follows a group of settlers as they embark on a punishing journey along the Oregon Trail. When their guide leads them astray, the expedition is forced to contend with the unforgiving conditions of the high plain desert.

meet-joe-black-a9bfaf80-254c-49eb-a463-c.title: Meet Joe Black
meet-joe-black-a9bfaf80-254c-49eb-a463-c.description: Brad Pitt and Anthony Hopkins give stellar performances in this film about a powerful man who receives a visit from Death and agrees to serve as his earthly guide in exchange for more time.

megan-leavey-c256c312-9b49-4f9e-a60c-389.title: Megan Leavey
megan-leavey-c256c312-9b49-4f9e-a60c-389.description: MEGAN LEAVEY is based on the true life story of a young marine corporal (Kate Mara) whose unique discipline and bond with her military combat dog saved many lives during their deployment in Iraq. When she is assigned to clean up the K9 unit after a disciplinary hearing, Leavey identifies with a particularly aggressive dog, Rex, and is given the chance to train him. Over the course of their service, Megan and Rex completed more than 100 missions until an IED explosion injures them, putting their fate in jeopardy. Directed by Gabriela Cowperthwaite (BLACKFISH) from a screenplay by Pamela Gray and Annie Mumolo & Tim Lovestedt, the film also stars Edie Falco, Ramón Rodríguez, Bradley Whitford, and Common.

a-mermaids-tale-0022e623-1662-41fa-b53a-.title: A Mermaid's Tale
a-mermaids-tale-0022e623-1662-41fa-b53a-.description: Twelve-year-old Ryan is despondent about moving to a dying seacoast village until she forms an unlikely friendship with a quirky teenage mermaid.

the-messenger-a9dd4361-c1c0-41d7-a0ab-aa.title: The Messenger
the-messenger-a9dd4361-c1c0-41d7-a0ab-aa.description: Will, an Iraq War veteran, struggles with his new post at the Casualty Notification Office. Under mentorship of fellow officer, Tony, the two men form a bond that will ultimately help them to readjust to "normal" life.

the-miracle-season-ef17e19c-2743-4bde-93.title: The Miracle Season
the-miracle-season-ef17e19c-2743-4bde-93.description: Based on the inspiring true story of West High girls' volleyball team. After the loss of the their star player, Caroline "Line" Found, in an accident, the remaining team players must band together in hopes of winning the state championship.

monogamy-e0697737-97e9-48ab-882c-7f53a9b.title: Monogamy
monogamy-e0697737-97e9-48ab-882c-7f53a9b.description: Brooklyn photographer Theo - miserable shooting weddings for a living - starts up a cool new business, taking surveillance-style photos of clients. But when an alluring female hires his services, the shutterbug falls into a world of lust and jealousy.

the-mountain-56903c2a-ed61-4d59-a765-c95.title: The Mountain
the-mountain-56903c2a-ed61-4d59-a765-c95.description: Set against the 1950’s "golden age" of American male supremacy, an introverted young photographer (Tye Sheridan) joins a renowned lobotomist (Jeff Goldblum) on a tour to promote the doctor’s recently-debunked procedure.

ms-purple-bbd3aa64-b82a-4caf-9fd2-f9ae85.title: Ms. Purple
ms-purple-bbd3aa64-b82a-4caf-9fd2-f9ae85.description: Working as a karaoke hostess in Los Angeles' Koreatown, young Kasie isn't equipped to care for her dying father. With no other choice, she turns to her estranged brother for help, and the two begin a wary reconciliation.

my-killer-client-7b29525d-5f70-4aeb-aa42.title: My Killer Client
my-killer-client-7b29525d-5f70-4aeb-aa42.description: Christa Bright is an aspiring personal stylist who has an instant connection with new client Kat Niven, a shy woman who needs help gaining confidence.

nico-1988-b75d81cf-ccda-479c-9bfe-a50c9f.title: Nico, 1988
nico-1988-b75d81cf-ccda-479c-9bfe-a50c9f.description: Nico, 1988 is the story of an artist, a mother, and the woman behind the icon. Approaching 50, Nico's life and career are on the ropes, a far cry from her glamorous days as a Warhol superstar and celebrated vocalist for The Velvet Underground.

nina-8ab911a1-f4f5-4da4-aee1-aff3827ef01.title: Nina
nina-8ab911a1-f4f5-4da4-aee1-aff3827ef01.description: Nina Simone (Zoe Saldana) was one of the century’s most extraordinary talents, but fame and fortune came with a price. Rediscovering the meaning of her life and work took courage, strength and one true friend: Clifton Henderson (David Oyelowo).

no-one-knows-about-persian-cats-4c721beb.title: No One Knows About Persian Cats
no-one-knows-about-persian-cats-4c721beb.description: Based on true events, two music-obsessed teens risk their lives to form an underground indie rock band in Iran.

nobody-knows-ec490a08-7d17-4ed1-96c7-f95.title: Nobody Knows
nobody-knows-ec490a08-7d17-4ed1-96c7-f95.description: Four young siblings are forced to rely solely on each other when they are left alone by their loving, yet immature mother.

notes-on-a-scandal-b4d0311c-0b8c-4f3c-a7.title: Notes on a Scandal
notes-on-a-scandal-b4d0311c-0b8c-4f3c-a7.description: Barbara Covett (Judi Dench), a veteran teacher at St. George's, senses a kindred spirit in Sheba Hart (Cate Blanchett), the school's new art teacher. The younger woman's charisma intensely draws in the older, and the two become friends. Then Barbara learns of Sheba's affair with a teenage student and becomes the keeper of the explosive secret.

once-upon-a-time-2def14f6-3399-4026-be36.title: Once Upon a Time
once-upon-a-time-2def14f6-3399-4026-be36.description: Based on the best-selling fantasy novel Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossoms, ONCE UPON A TIME is a story of epic battles, deep passion, and the powerful forces that drive mortals and gods alike toward revenge, loyalty, and eternal love.

operation-finale-afd7bb55-a4b8-429c-a5c0.title: Operation Finale
operation-finale-afd7bb55-a4b8-429c-a5c0.description: This thrilling true story follows the 1960 covert mission of legendary Mossad agent Peter Malkin as he infiltrates Argentina and captures Adolf Eichmann.

the-other-man-932c9886-74bb-4b14-bc7c-7c.title: The Other Man
the-other-man-932c9886-74bb-4b14-bc7c-7c.description: A taut thriller, The Other Man is an intimate tale of a man who discovers his wife's infidelity and sets out to track down his rival. Driven to pursue the mystery surrounding his wife’s adultery, Liam Neeson embarks on a global pursuit with a haunted passion that begins to probe the nature not simply of jealousy, but of loss and forgiveness. The film is beautifully shot on location in Milan and Lake Como as well as in London and Ely by renowned cinematographer Harris Zambarloukos (Mama Mia!, Heart in the Sand.)

paper-covers-rock-af105f18-ae8e-4164-aaa.title: Paper Covers Rock
paper-covers-rock-af105f18-ae8e-4164-aaa.description: In this gripping drama, a young woman is pushed to the brink as she fights to regain custody of her six-year-old daughter.

pawn-sacrifice-87c658b7-e48f-4b62-a1d8-a.title: Pawn Sacrifice
pawn-sacrifice-87c658b7-e48f-4b62-a1d8-a.description: American chess legend Bobby Fischer (Tobey Maguire) and Soviet Grandmaster Boris Spassky (Liev Schreiber) enthrall the world with their intense battle of wills and strategy during the 1972 World Chess Championship.

the-pawnbroker-6f28ebff-646d-44c5-a6f8-c.title: The Pawnbroker
the-pawnbroker-6f28ebff-646d-44c5-a6f8-c.description: Sol, the embittered survivor of a Nazi death camp, is now a Harlem pawnbroker. He harshly condemns his clientele as the dregs of society, and ridicules his idealistic assistant, Ortiz. But when Ortiz risks his life for Sol, he learns the truth about hop

pegasus-pony-with-a-broken-wing-48c7c290.title: Pegasus: Pony with a Broken Wing
pegasus-pony-with-a-broken-wing-48c7c290.description: When tween girl Sydney and a neighbor boy find a mysterious pony with an injured wing, they secretly heal the creature while racing to save Sydney’s family ranch from developers.

the-phantom-of-the-opera-68f3a855-ca2a-4.title: The Phantom of the Opera
the-phantom-of-the-opera-68f3a855-ca2a-4.description: Deep in the passageways below the Paris Opera lives a lonely, talented, horribly disfigured man who revels in terrorizing the theater's employees as The Phantom of the Opera.

pi-3aecfe03-9ef3-44dd-aa3a-7d48a848c40a.title: Pi
pi-3aecfe03-9ef3-44dd-aa3a-7d48a848c40a.description: Max is a genius mathematician who built a supercomputer that provides the key for understanding all existence. Representatives from a Hasidic cabalistic sect and high-powered Wall Street firm hear of the secret and attempt to seduce him.

pray-for-rain-eef5a2cd-cf72-422f-b5c4-c4.title: Pray for Rain
pray-for-rain-eef5a2cd-cf72-422f-b5c4-c4.description: Young New York journalist, Emma Gardner, returns to the idyllic Central California farming community where she was raised to investigate the suspicious circumstances of her father's death even though it puts her in great danger.

precious-e089e4d1-f4c2-4bfb-a1fd-8dcf7eb.title: Precious
precious-e089e4d1-f4c2-4bfb-a1fd-8dcf7eb.description: In Harlem, an overweight, illiterate teen who is pregnant with her second child is invited to enroll in an alternative school in hopes that her life can head in a new direction.

princess-cyd-2b402b16-180c-4923-bcff-798.title: Princess Cyd
princess-cyd-2b402b16-180c-4923-bcff-798.description: Eager to escape life with her single father, 16-year-old athlete Cyd visits her novelist aunt in Chicago over the summer. There, she falls for a girl in the neighborhood, while she and her aunt gently challenge each other in the realms of sex and spirit.

professor-marston-and-the-wonder-women-0.title: Professor Marston and the Wonder Women
professor-marston-and-the-wonder-women-0.description: The story of psychologist William Moulton Marston, and his polyamorous relationship with his wife and his mistress who would inspire his creation of the superheroine, Wonder Woman.

proxy-9fe5f43d-d2c3-493b-9d3b-2cf0f82a65.title: Proxy
proxy-9fe5f43d-d2c3-493b-9d3b-2cf0f82a65.description: While walking home Esther Woodhouse is brutally attacked and disfigured by a hooded assailant. This horrible event seems to be a blessing in disguise when Esther finds consolation in a support group. Her life of sadness and solitude is opened up to friendship, understanding, and even acceptance. However, friendship and understanding can be very dangerous things when accepted by the wrong people, as Esther soon embarks down a dark path of obsession.

a-puppy-for-christmas-bd9b4afe-26d0-4cad.title: A Puppy for Christmas
a-puppy-for-christmas-bd9b4afe-26d0-4cad.description: All Noelle wants for Christmas is a puppy. But her furry friend is mischievous and gets them both evicted. Spending the holidays with her coworker, sparks begin to fly. When Noelle's ex shows up, she must decide which man she wants.

pyewacket-c4626974-5fe4-495a-aa5a-4e7c8d.title: Pyewacket
pyewacket-c4626974-5fe4-495a-aa5a-4e7c8d.description: When you're dealing with demons, be careful what you wish for... A teenager's death curse plunges her into an unholy occult nightmare. From the director of Backcountry.

the-quiet-ones-0f7f286d-1bb0-48eb-a31c-1.title: The Quiet Ones
the-quiet-ones-0f7f286d-1bb0-48eb-a31c-1.description: When a crazed university professor and his team of students set out to cure a patient, the unthinkable happens. Trusting in their leader and his motives, Brian and his fellow students find themselves far from help...

a-quiet-place-dd89e42d-56b8-497e-b108-bb.title: A Quiet Place
a-quiet-place-dd89e42d-56b8-497e-b108-bb.description: In a post-apocalyptic world, a family is forced to live in silence while hiding from monsters with ultra-sensitive hearing.

rain-b00c7df5-840f-45bd-b1e4-636acebc8fd.title: Rain
rain-b00c7df5-840f-45bd-b1e4-636acebc8fd.description: A chance encounter during a traffic jam, changes two people's lives forever in this gripping drama.

renoir-ef04bbe4-ec3d-4832-a1e9-565594908.title: Renoir
renoir-ef04bbe4-ec3d-4832-a1e9-565594908.description: Set on the French Riviera in the summer of 1915, RENOIR tells the story of celebrated impressionist painter Pierre-Auguste Renoir, and his middle son Jean, who returns home to convalesce after being wounded in World War I.

the-resident-de1c81a6-cba5-459a-ae99-c8d.title: The Resident
the-resident-de1c81a6-cba5-459a-ae99-c8d.description: Juliet, has found the perfect New York apartment to start a new life after separating from her husband. It's got spacious rooms, and a handsome landlord. But there are secrets behind every wall as Juliet gets the feeling that she is not alone.

romeo-and-juliet-99accc6f-6b41-460f-86ab.title: Romeo and Juliet
romeo-and-juliet-99accc6f-6b41-460f-86ab.description: Romeo and Juliet secretly wed despite the sworn contempt their families hold for each other. It is not long, however, before a chain of fateful events changes the lives of both families forever.

run-the-race-f6382750-0379-40ac-a930-38f.title: Run the Race
run-the-race-f6382750-0379-40ac-a930-38f.description: Two desperate brothers sacrifice to earn a college scholarship and the brothers' ticket out of town. When a devastating injury puts Zach-and his dreams-on the sidelines, David laces up his track cleats to salvage their future and point Zach toward hope.

sangre-de-mi-sangre-ad9ff2a2-6bab-44ff-b.title: Sangre de Mi Sangre
sangre-de-mi-sangre-ad9ff2a2-6bab-44ff-b.description: Winner at Sundance, this dog-eat-dog thriller is about a Mexican boy whose identity is stolen on his way to finally meet his father. Now he must prove he is the real son.

scenic-route-f02e7dce-3afa-4db9-9a7d-be6.title: Scenic Route
scenic-route-f02e7dce-3afa-4db9-9a7d-be6.description: Stranded on an isolated desert road, two life-long friends fight for survival as their already strained relationship spirals into knife-wielding madness.

the-second-mother-27fcf4c3-2a7d-4d05-815.title: The Second Mother
the-second-mother-27fcf4c3-2a7d-4d05-815.description: The longtime housekeeper for a wealthy São Paulo family, Val is committed to loyalty and respect. But her values and the dynamic of the whole household, are challenged when her teen daughter visits in this astute, socially conscious comedy.

serena-94fcaee7-1eb1-49a0-96ce-7db6e5cdc.title: Serena
serena-94fcaee7-1eb1-49a0-96ce-7db6e5cdc.description: In Depression-era North Carolina, the barren wife (Jennifer Lawrence) of an ambitious timber baron (Bradley Cooper) sets out to murder the woman who bore her husband an illegitimate son.

sidewalls-0a474a01-93e5-4817-98d7-bbceb3.title: Sidewalls
sidewalls-0a474a01-93e5-4817-98d7-bbceb3.description: Martin and Mariana are destined for one another; they're passionate about the same subjects, love the same movies and enjoy the same hobbies—only they have yet to meet.

silent-tongue-4f8e1f07-3e44-4115-a539-5c.title: Silent Tongue
silent-tongue-4f8e1f07-3e44-4115-a539-5c.description: Silent Tongue is a mute Kiowa who is raped by Eamon McCree, the owner of the Kickapoo Traveling Medicine Show. Eamon attempts to make up for his crime by marrying her. Instead, she enacts a bitter retribution through daughters.

the-simone-biles-story-courage-to-soar-5.title: The Simone Biles Story: Courage to Soar
the-simone-biles-story-courage-to-soar-5.description: Based on her book, this World Premiere film follows Simone Biles through the sacrifices and hard work that led her to win 19 Olympic and World Championship medals and ultimately cemented her stake as one of the greatest gymnasts of all time.

skate-kitchen-955af1b7-1c72-4350-b427-a3.title: Skate Kitchen
skate-kitchen-955af1b7-1c72-4350-b427-a3.description: Camille's life as a lonely suburban teenager changes dramatically when she befriends a group of girl skateboarders. As she journeys deeper into this raw New York City subculture, she begins to understand the true meaning of friendship.

so-b-it-d4c28fe6-8914-4c55-afd9-230611f8.title: So B. It
so-b-it-d4c28fe6-8914-4c55-afd9-230611f8.description: Based on the New York Times Best-selling novel, a young prodigy named Heidi has a lucky streak that has a way of pointing her in the right direction.

the-sound-of-silence-bfde20b5-f708-41f6-.title: The Sound of Silence
the-sound-of-silence-bfde20b5-f708-41f6-.description: Peter Sarsgaard and Rashida Jones star in this quietly moving tale of a successful "house tuner" who becomes stifled when he meets a client he can't quite tune into.

the-spirit-of-christmas-b92deeff-75d6-44.title: The Spirit of Christmas
the-spirit-of-christmas-b92deeff-75d6-44.description: Kate is sent to broker the sale of Hollygrove Inn where she discovers Daniel and agrees to help him solve the mystery of his murder to help him move on, but she didn’t plan on falling in love along the way.

starfish-af238ef3-9e4c-4590-a0a3-a32458d.title: Starfish
starfish-af238ef3-9e4c-4590-a0a3-a32458d.description: With reality fraying at the edges, Aubrey (Virginia Gardner) finds herself following a string of mixtapes left by her dead friend. The clues unravel the secrets of a mysterious Signal; one that could either save the world... or condemn it.

still-17eb3c69-572f-406f-85b1-a70e507311.title: Still
still-17eb3c69-572f-406f-85b1-a70e507311.description: A lost hiker in the Appalachian Mountains is taken in by a couple holding a deep secret.

the-strange-ones-c6dce1c7-28e0-4548-8af3.title: The Strange Ones
the-strange-ones-c6dce1c7-28e0-4548-8af3.description: Mysterious events surround two travelers, presumably brothers, as they make their way across a remote American landscape. On the surface all seems normal, but what appears to be a simple vacation soon gives way to a dark and complex web of secrets.

the-taste-of-money-7b9c553a-6bc4-44cd-83.title: The Taste of Money
the-taste-of-money-7b9c553a-6bc4-44cd-83.description: When the private assistant of a wealthy socialite reveals her husband's salacious affair, he is entangled in a web of sex, love & deceit that could threaten his life & career.

a-teacher-47989f6b-29e1-4905-868b-95bfd7.title: A Teacher
a-teacher-47989f6b-29e1-4905-868b-95bfd7.description: A popular young high school teacher engaged in a passionate secret affair with one of her students gets pulled deeper into their mutual fantasy world, even as the danger of discovery threatens their relationship.

teen-spirit-31747604-1eb0-4899-8bdc-7c13.title: Teen Spirit
teen-spirit-31747604-1eb0-4899-8bdc-7c13.description: Violet (Elle Fanning) is a shy teenager who dreams of escaping her small town and pursuing her passion to sing. With the help of an unlikely mentor, she enters a local singing competition that will test her integrity, talent and ambition.

the-tenant-ff4174ad-5d54-44c5-8288-e0267.title: The Tenant
the-tenant-ff4174ad-5d54-44c5-8288-e0267.description: A lonely young man rents a flat that was formerly occupied by a girl who committed suicide. Gradually he begins to assume her identity, dressing in her clothes, and eventually throwing himself out of the same window from which she jumped to her death.

thelma-cc6cd86b-b0bd-4476-b2a8-2e128d2ed.title: Thelma
thelma-cc6cd86b-b0bd-4476-b2a8-2e128d2ed.description: Thelma is a powerful supernatural thriller about a young student who, upon falling in love for the first time, discovers that she has terrifying and inexplicable powers.

those-people-2692dec6-e2f7-4790-9eeb-f12.title: Those People
those-people-2692dec6-e2f7-4790-9eeb-f12.description: On Manhattan’s gilded Upper East Side, Charlie, a young painter, finds the man of his dreams in Tim, an older pianist from across the globe.

the-time-that-remains-f23336df-a78f-4dc8.title: The Time That Remains
the-time-that-remains-f23336df-a78f-4dc8.description: A vividly entertaining and moving drama about one family's courageous fight for survival in war-torn Israel.

tom-of-finland-4f8a4fc0-816c-44da-8f95-7.title: Tom of Finland
tom-of-finland-4f8a4fc0-816c-44da-8f95-7.description: Finnish artist Touko Laaksonen becomes famous for his homoerotic works.

the-tomorrow-man-7374d356-e602-430b-aae2.title: The Tomorrow Man
the-tomorrow-man-7374d356-e602-430b-aae2.description: Ed spends his life preparing for a disaster that may never come. Ronnie spends her life shopping for things she may never use. In a small town somewhere in America, they try to find love while trying not to get lost in each other's stuff.

touched-with-fire-54820077-cd4b-4f6f-b4c.title: Touched With Fire
touched-with-fire-54820077-cd4b-4f6f-b4c.description: From Executive Producer Spike Lee. Katie Holmes and Luke Kirby star as bipolar poets who begin a romance that puts their hearts (and minds) to the ultimate test.

tracktown-9deed8c1-e075-4c4d-98ed-2a413b.title: Tracktown
tracktown-9deed8c1-e075-4c4d-98ed-2a413b.description: A young long-distance runner twists her ankle during her first Olympic Trials and must do something she’s never done before: take a day off.

turtles-can-fly-914f0355-430e-4a28-8152-.title: Turtles Can Fly
turtles-can-fly-914f0355-430e-4a28-8152-.description: In a Kurdish refugee camp in 2003, residents await the U.S. invasion of Iraq, hoping for Saddam's defeat but fearing a violent aftermath. Satellite (Soran Ebrahim) organizes children into work gangs, disarming and selling land mines to arms dealers. Satellite falls for Agrin (Avaz Latif), who comes to the camp with one-armed brother Hengov (Hiresh Feysal Rahman) and baby brother Riga (Abdol Rahman Karim). As the invasion starts, Satellite looks for a satellite dish so the camp can watch the war.

unforgettable-7a06e901-f6c6-471f-b9d9-fe.title: Unforgettable
unforgettable-7a06e901-f6c6-471f-b9d9-fe.description: A forensics expert (Ray Liotta) is thrust into a heart-stopping adventure when he takes an experimental 'memory' drug in the hopes of discovering his wife's murderer.

urban-country-b3f66dec-341b-40a0-8032-f8.title: Urban Country
urban-country-b3f66dec-341b-40a0-8032-f8.description: Faith, a troubled 18-year-old city girl, moves to a horse ranch in the country to help her sick mother. While there, Faith learns to embrace the country lifestyle and the importance of family, hard work and helping others.

vincere-3addea18-8fcc-45f9-ba40-514d8479.title: Vincere
vincere-3addea18-8fcc-45f9-ba40-514d8479.description: In this provocative, erotic romance, Benito Mussolini's feisty mistress will stop at nothing to be in the arms of her powerful lover.

vita-virginia-3b941090-e95a-4944-8f2c-d1.title: Vita & Virginia
vita-virginia-3b941090-e95a-4944-8f2c-d1.description: The seductive true story of Virginia Woolf's love affair with socialite Vita Sackville-West, who inspired one of Woolf's greatest works of literature.

vox-lux-07fb7449-263b-4620-abe2-bcb2d853.title: Vox Lux
vox-lux-07fb7449-263b-4620-abe2-bcb2d853.description: An unusual set of circumstances brings unexpected success to a pop star (Natalie Portman).

we-are-what-we-are-d5692c27-f78c-4e6a-b9.title: We Are What We Are
we-are-what-we-are-d5692c27-f78c-4e6a-b9.description: In this riveting horror-thriller, a family of cannibals takes extreme measures to find their next meal.

we-need-to-talk-about-kevin-4c60e008-a73.title: We Need to Talk About Kevin
we-need-to-talk-about-kevin-4c60e008-a73.description: Tilda Swinton stars in this taut psychological thriller as Eva, whose relationship with her son Kevin has been difficult from the beginning. When his cruel streak erupts into violence, Eva wonders how much blame she deserves for his actions.

weightless-234f7545-4124-4a37-8f5f-b4fed.title: Weightless
weightless-234f7545-4124-4a37-8f5f-b4fed.description: An emotionally troubled man is forced to care for the obese 10-year-old son he has never met. Together they embark on a high-stakes journey to determine their future together, even as the world tries to tear them apart.

welcome-to-the-rileys-04a213bf-0258-4f2b.title: Welcome to the Rileys
welcome-to-the-rileys-04a213bf-0258-4f2b.description: Seeking refuge from his grief and crumbling marriage, a salesman (James Gandolfini) becomes a surrogate father to an underage stripper (Kristen Stewart).

what-they-had-0ac2c5a1-17f5-4a77-be9b-1b.title: What They Had
what-they-had-0ac2c5a1-17f5-4a77-be9b-1b.description: Bridget (Hilary Swank) returns home at her brother’s (Michael Shannon) urging to deal with her ailing mother (Blythe Danner) and her father’s (Robert Forster) reluctance to let go of their life together.

where-hands-touch-8bdd8bbe-87f2-4b50-940.title: Where Hands Touch
where-hands-touch-8bdd8bbe-87f2-4b50-940.description: When the daughter of a white German mother and an African father meets a member of the Hitler Youth - compulsory for all Aryan boys in 1944 Germany, they must battle against the fates laid out before them during the most brutal of times.

where-we-go-from-here-cf22c3ab-5aa7-4306.title: Where We Go from Here
where-we-go-from-here-cf22c3ab-5aa7-4306.description: Three acts of terror disrupt ordinary lives. A teacher dealing with domestic abuse finds even greater violence at school. Two lovers drifting apart may be separated by the hate of another. And, friends on a night out are caught up in brutal madness

wonder-93373adb-2564-4281-be08-9ac027af2.title: Wonder
wonder-93373adb-2564-4281-be08-9ac027af2.description: Julia Roberts, Owen Wilson, and Jacob Tremblay star in an inspiring story of a loving family whose son, born with facial differences, enters a mainstream school for the first time.

xxxy-413cad1b-2fe3-49be-9cf9-104317444f7.title: xx/xy
xxxy-413cad1b-2fe3-49be-9cf9-104317444f7.description: A man finds himself having to decide between one of two women, not once, but twice. This drama stars Mark Ruffalo and was nominated for the Grand Jury Prize at Sundance.

a-year-ago-in-winter-29e321b9-4378-4cab-.title: A Year Ago in Winter
a-year-ago-in-winter-29e321b9-4378-4cab-.description: When a seductive and beautiful ballerina poses for a painter, the lines between friendship, love and attraction become dangerously blurred.

the-yellow-handkerchief-6f228cfe-b815-4b.title: The Yellow Handkerchief
the-yellow-handkerchief-6f228cfe-b815-4b.description: A road trip through Louisiana transforms three strangers who were originally brought together by their respective feelings of loneliness.

young-beautiful-30af84a9-49b7-4c8a-b81c-.title: Young & Beautiful
young-beautiful-30af84a9-49b7-4c8a-b81c-.description: Acclaimed director François Ozon (Swimming Pool, 8 Women) helms this erotic tale of sexual awakening. After losing her virginity, 17-year-old budding beauty Isabelle (Marine Vacth) takes up a secret life as a call girl, meeting her older gentlemen clients for erotic hotel room trysts. Throughout, she remains curiously aloof, showing little interest in the encounters themselves or the money she makes, while Ozon slyly refrains from offering easy answers. As the enigmatic Isabelle, Marine Vacth is magnetic, delivering a star-making breakout performance in this sleek and sexy coming-of-age drama.

albert-033d93ac-c0ba-449b-9f5f-1c323515f.title: Albert
albert-033d93ac-c0ba-449b-9f5f-1c323515f.description: Albert, a little Douglas fir tree who loves Christmas more than anyone, goes on a road trip from his little nursery to the big city to make his dreams come true.

barbie-and-the-three-musketeers-70af952f.title: Barbie and the Three Musketeers
barbie-and-the-three-musketeers-70af952f.description: It’s “all for one and one for all” in this action-filled adventure as Barbie stars as Corinne, a young country girl headed to Paris to pursue her big dream – to become a musketeer!

barbie-in-a-christmas-carol-df813e11-1eb.title: Barbie in A Christmas Carol
barbie-in-a-christmas-carol-df813e11-1eb.description: Barbie™ stars in her first holiday movie in this heart-warming adaptation of the classic Dickens story filled with cherished Christmas carols, fabulous fashions and lots of laughs!

charlottes-web-c653679a-9d12-471e-87ba-d.title: Charlotte's Web
charlottes-web-c653679a-9d12-471e-87ba-d.description: Miracles do happen! E.B. White's timeless children's story comes to life in this colorful animated musical. You'll laugh and sing along as Charlotte the Spider teaches Wilbur the Pig, Templeton the Rat and the other barnyard animal lessons on friendship, trust and love.

curious-george-a-halloween-boo-fest-7050.title: Curious George: A Halloween Boo Fest
curious-george-a-halloween-boo-fest-7050.description: A Fun-Filled Halloween Adventure! Hang on to your hats and get ready for a spook-tacular good time with Curious George - in his first-ever Halloween movie. Autumn is here, bringing colorful leaves, hay rides, pumpkin patches, and the annual Boo Festival. After hearing about a legendary scarecrow who steals hats, the inquisitive monkey and his friends set out to find him. By the time George gets to the festival, he realizes that it's not always easy to pick the perfect pumpkin, and that winning the prize for best costume may be as difficult as catching the mysterious scarecrow. Curious George: A Halloween Boo Fest - it's a bewitching treat for the whole family!

curious-george-a-very-monkey-christmas-b.title: Curious George: A Very Monkey Christmas
curious-george-a-very-monkey-christmas-b.description: George and The Man in The Yellow Hat are having a merry time counting down to Christmas. But neither can decide what to give each other. Will they find the answers before Christmas morning?

dr-seuss-dr-seuss-on-the-loose-b0c5215d-.title: Dr. Seuss: Dr. Seuss on the Loose
dr-seuss-dr-seuss-on-the-loose-b0c5215d-.description: Dr. Seuss on the Loose, a trilogy of allegorical classics by the world's best-known author of books for children: The Sneetches, The Zax and Green Eggs and Ham comprises the newest half-hour animated cartoon special written by Theodor Geisel.

dr-seuss-the-cat-in-the-hat-36d09b33-9fc.title: Dr. Seuss: The Cat in the Hat
dr-seuss-the-cat-in-the-hat-36d09b33-9fc.description: Two children left home alone for a short while one afternoon are visited by a very interesting yet troublesome cat wearing a tall striped hat. The cat succeeds in creating a huge mess in their house - can they get it cleaned up before Mom gets home?

dr-seuss-the-lorax-35d313e6-79db-4c41-be.title: Dr. Seuss: The Lorax
dr-seuss-the-lorax-35d313e6-79db-4c41-be.description: A ruined industrialist tells his tale of his environmentally self-destructive greed despite the warnings of an old forest creature.

el-principe-de-egipto-cd95ebca-eb38-4972.title: El Príncipe de Egipto
el-principe-de-egipto-cd95ebca-eb38-4972.description: Dos hermanos, uno nacido de la realeza y el otro huérfano con un pasado secreto, crecieron como los mejores amigos, pero cuando sus vidas toman un rumbo distinto surge una fuerte enemistad.

the-festive-menace-6b5df916-708b-4991-b8.title: The Festive Menace
the-festive-menace-6b5df916-708b-4991-b8.description: After Santa Claus is accidently zapped by Bubbles’ invention – the ‘Naughty/Nice’ machine – Christmas Eve is thrown into chaos.  It’s up to the Oddbods to rally together and reverse the effects in order to save Santa and more importantly… Christmas Day!

how-to-train-your-dragon-snoggletog-log-.title: How to Train Your Dragon: Snoggletog Log
how-to-train-your-dragon-snoggletog-log-.description: Come settle by the warmth of a roaring fire in Hiccup & Astrid's home. You never know who is going to stop by for a sip of Yak Nog!

jorge-el-curioso-66a0c1c5-f167-43dd-a946.title: Jorge el Curioso
jorge-el-curioso-66a0c1c5-f167-43dd-a946.description: Llega tu monito favorito, Jorge el Curioso, en ¡una nueva película animada! Descubre cómo Jorge el Curioso, el monito más aventurero, encuentra al Hombre del Sombrero Amarillo, y le sigue hasta la gran ciudad.

jorge-el-curioso-3-de-regreso-a-la-jungl.title: Jorge el Curioso 3: De regreso a la Jungla
jorge-el-curioso-3-de-regreso-a-la-jungl.description: El juramento reciente de Ted de “cero aventuras con monos” se pone en tela de duda cuando le ofrecen una misión espacial a Jorge. El preocupado Ted busca a Jorge después de su aterrizaje forzoso en África.

jorge-el-curioso-el-festival-de-hallowee.title: Jorge el Curioso: El Festival de Halloween
jorge-el-curioso-el-festival-de-hallowee.description: ¡Una divertidísima aventura de Halloween! Agárrate el sombrero y prepárate para una pasarla en grande con Jorge el Curioso en su primera película de Halloween.

jorge-el-curioso-una-navidad-de-monos-c3.title: Jorge el Curioso: Una Navidad de Monos
jorge-el-curioso-una-navidad-de-monos-c3.description: Jorge y el hombre del sombrero amarillo la están pasando muy bien contando los días que faltan para Navidad. Solo hay un enigma: ninguno de los dos sabe qué regalarle al otro.

my-little-pony-crystal-princess-the-runa.title: My Little Pony Crystal Princess: The Runaway Rainbow
my-little-pony-crystal-princess-the-runa.description: The Rainbow Celebration is almost near as everyone in Ponyville prepares and awaits the first rainbow of the season.

party-monsters-d7d68c1a-baac-4773-90a9-5.title: Party Monsters
party-monsters-d7d68c1a-baac-4773-90a9-5.description: Marv the magician unleashes a powerful spell cursing the Oddbods and turning them into their actual Halloween costume monsters. It’s up to Slick, as Sherlock Holmes, to save the day, and track down werewolves, witches and a ketchup obsessed vampire.

pinocchio-2012-8bc62bf2-6353-42dc-8e0e-2.title: Pinocchio (2012)
pinocchio-2012-8bc62bf2-6353-42dc-8e0e-2.description: In this dazzling, delightful reimagining of the classic family legend, a playful puppet comes to life and experiences incredible adventures in his struggle to become human.

the-polar-express-cfaafa9b-a8e0-4d0a-88b.title: The Polar Express
the-polar-express-cfaafa9b-a8e0-4d0a-88b.description: Late on Christmas Eve, after the town has gone to sleep, a boy boards the mysterious train that waits for him--The Polar Express.

pollitos-en-fuga-5c6ed467-0345-4ea2-8c19.title: Pollitos En Fuga
pollitos-en-fuga-5c6ed467-0345-4ea2-8c19.description: Mientras que las gallinas de la granja de la malévola Sra. Tweedy sueñan con una mejor vida, una astuta gallina llamada Ginger está empollando un plan para volar del nido, ¡para siempre!

the-prince-of-egypt-afdc4f53-bde6-4473-9.title: The Prince of Egypt
the-prince-of-egypt-afdc4f53-bde6-4473-9.description: An epic adventure of two brothers- one the ruler of a powerful empire and the other the chosen leader of his people. Their final confrontation will forever change the world.

the-swan-princess-6f56dd8d-ea38-458c-be4.title: The Swan Princess
the-swan-princess-6f56dd8d-ea38-458c-be4.description: From the director of The Fox and the Hound comes THE SWAN PRINCESS, a magical animated adventure (based on the classic fairytale SWAN LAKE) that has captured the hearts of audiences around the world!

the-swan-princess-and-the-secret-of-the-.title: The Swan Princess and the Secret of the Castle
the-swan-princess-and-the-secret-of-the-.description: Princess Odette is once again transformed into a swan as Prince Derek prepares to battle an evil magician.

the-tayo-movie-mission-ace-f9561d1d-ef2c.title: The Tayo Movie: Mission Ace
